comments: Touch screen Pacman never as good as joystick. This app way too many popup vid ads. Graphics not the greatest either. But offers several additional mazes and options than standard Pacman layout. The constant forced ads cause me to close app and play something else.
Came for Sonic, stayed for a good game. I suggest adding new ways to use coins, like for different variations of pacman or the ghosts. The only complaint i have is the loading time is quite slow

This games accuracy is worse than my atari 2600 and is 1000 times worse than my 5200. It seems like in 38 years with all the technology we have today , someone would finally figure out that when you go up, You go up and not right and when you go right it goes right and not down. Not the case here. Man we have games that live life for you basically. But still cant figure out how to fix pac man. REALLY? And the ads an ad after every board. Ads ads ads and then guess what? Another ad. Very shameless
Great game but I'm a lefty so I pause a lot on accident. Messes up my game. Still love it though.
It would be nice if there were more challenges that utilize every level. Not just the same challenges and levels that I've already competed 5 times over

I am really surprised. The amount of new mazes I've never seen before just blows me away. Of course you can just play the classic version thats why I downloaded it but wow love this game. And you don't have to spend money unless you want to its very kick back. Adds of course but whats a dollar to you?

comments: Unable to play the game at all first time opening the app I get the welcome message but I'm unable to press the next button it's completely unresponsive. description: Ever wanted to be Mayor? Ever wanted to run a town, develop the land, and see a metropolis grow? Well, look no further than Merge Town!, the newest title from Gram Games. The concept of the game is simple - you have a plot of land, and it‚Äôs your job to turn it into a town. Every so often, you‚Äôll be gifted with a house. Each house can be merged with other houses of the same variety to form a bigger home. Every house built on the land will earn you money - the bigger the home, the more you will earn. The more you earn, the more houses you can purchase, and the more you can push the clock to develop faster. Use your spoils to discover new homes, and to expand into all new towns.You have a singular goal: make your towns the best they can be. The bar at the top of the screen measures development - Merge buildings to earn XP and level up. Higher levels will unlock more space in your plot for you to develop, which will only allow you to develop your town to even further greatness. Once you develop into new towns, keep an eye on all your land, ensuring that you‚Äôre merging and developing to your full potential.Merge, build, and develop your very own towns with Merge Town!

comments: So nice to sit and enjoy a game of challenge. Almost as much fun as chess, but easier to carry. Great way to relax while waiting for the zombie apocalypse or the bus to come. Thank-you and keep up the awesome work.  *UPDATE* 17 FEB 2018.  Have started my friends and family trying to get Top Score. No one is really trying as they are all enjoying playing the app to care. Brought a tear to my eye. Once again, "Thank-you"  for a truly  wonderful game.

Simple tile game with a nice learning curve. Easy enough to be able to relax while playing and challenging enough to not be boring.  Instant gratification for finishing levels, packs, and difficulty ratings.  There are 'rolling points' that I haven't figured out the use for yet. Coins to purchase hints and other stuff. The ball can have different 'skins' that you unlock as you complete grpups of packs.  TLDR?  I'm having fun. Maybe you can too.

The graphics, controls, n the gameplay are ALL 5 by me. I was expecting this game to be boring but finally, i downloaded it n it was a BLAST! I could NEVER take my eyes off this game as its AMAZINGLY fun. I was not expecting it to be THAT fun, but it was!!! There is absouloutly NOTHING WRONG about this game. The only  thing that is wrong is when people say bad things about this game. But there are NO glitches, barely no adds n NO expectations! This game is absouloutly my MOST favourite  game OF ALL the others.üëç

Great game. Starts easy so you can get your eye in and then gets harder. Fun to play and not so difficult that you give up and uninstal. Ads are over fairly quickly and I like that you can choose to watch some to get extra coins.
I love this game and I just start playing and I already have the iron ball!how cool is that!..........but there is ad after I pass every levels.If you can please fix this thing! :)
Its not like the first revolution i don't know what you doing? if I could be wrong with the first one was in a few hours ago I was just going to find piano lessons

descriptionHTML:
AN EPIC BALL ROLLING TIME
Roll the Ball: Hidden Path is a simple but addictive ball game for casual game enthusiasts!
Rolling ball was never this challenging; it's a classic ball game at its best!

You need:
• Thought-provoking puzzle game to train your brain, but can't manage to miss out on entertaining yourself
• A mobile game to keep you occupied, but won't have to feel guilty because it provides a great learning experience
• A Match-3 Puzzle game, easy to play but difficult to master
• A puzzle game that requires speed and attention to smoothly pass through
• A game for everyone in the family, also great for children

HOW TO PLAY
• Roll your ball by tapping on any blocks that you wish to move your ball to
• A number is engraved on each block which indicates the number of times the ball can go through
• Your goal is to leave no numbered blocks as your ball reaches its way to the finishing line!

FEATURES
• You only need blocks, balls, and some brain powers to play! A simple gameplay, but tons of fun!
• WIFI not required: you can enjoy the game anytime, and anywhere!
• No fuzziness, an easy to navigate game graphics suitable for everyone!

• OPTIMIZED for ANDROID & GOOGLE PLAY GAMES
- Designed for tablets & phones.
- Support both ARM & x86 DEVICES.
- New updates available

NOTES
• "Roll the Ball: Hidden Path" contains ads like banners, interstitials, video and house ads.
• "Roll the Ball: Hidden Path" is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like AD FREE, hints or coins.

E-MAIL
• contact@bitmango.com

HOMEPAGE
• https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=6249013288401661340

Like us on FACEBOOK
• https://www.facebook.com/BitMangoGames

Tap the blocks with your finger to create a path for your ball to reach the goal!
You ready to roll the ball?

Pretty cool..It was actually a little more than i expected.  The bikes are cool. They seem to be modeled after actual bikes, but perhaps didnt want to pay 4 the licensing to use actual manufacturer names.

One of the best motorcycle game to date, weather conditions are great, bikes are great and handling is great, but the bad ai on higher difficulty level a few times are ridiculous and messes up everything.  Sometimes a truck speeds up to 150km/h just to close off that small gap, where you could slip through, but next time all cars in all lane slow down at once, so you can't pass anywhere, even though there's nothing in front of them. This is really annoying, when every second counts and there's no way to pass them for 4-7 seconds. Apart from this the game is great. The keep changing weather conditions is great too.
description: Another masterpiece from the creators of Traffic Racer. This time, you are behind the wheels of a motorbike in a much more detailed gaming experience, but also retaining the old school fun and simplicity.Traffic Rider takes the endless racing genre to a whole new level by adding a full career mode, first person view perspective, better graphics and real life recorded bike sounds. The essence of smooth arcade racing is still there but in the shell of the next generation. Ride your bike in the endless highway roads overtaking the traffic, upgrade and buy new bikes to beat the missions in career mode.Now it is time to hit the roads with a motorcycle!FEATURES- First person camera view- 26 motorbikes to choose from- Real motor sounds recorded from real bikes- Detailed environments with day and night variations- Career mode with 70+ missions- Online leaderboards and 30+ achievements- Support for 19 languages TIPS- The faster you ride, the more scores you get- When driving over 100 kmh, overtake traffic cars closely to get bonus scores and cash- Driving in opposite direction in two-way gives extra score and cash- Do wheelies to get extra score and cashFOLLOW US* http://facebook.com/trafficridergame* http://twitter.com/traffic_rider*** No Timers, No Fuel ***  Just pure endless fun!Traffic Rider will be updated regularly with your suggestions. Don't forget to leave a review with your feedback.
descriptionHTML:
Another masterpiece from the creators of Traffic Racer. This time, you are behind the wheels of a motorbike in a much more detailed gaming experience, but also retaining the old school fun and simplicity.

Traffic Rider takes the endless racing genre to a whole new level by adding a full career mode, first person view perspective, better graphics and real life recorded bike sounds. The essence of smooth arcade racing is still there but in the shell of the next generation. Now it is time to hit the roads with a motorcycle!

FEATURES

- 26 motorbikes to choose from
- Real motor sounds recorded from real bikes
- Detailed environments with day and night variations
- Career mode with 70+ missions

TIPS

comments: This is a very fun game. It got me hooked for hours. However, there are still some things that need improvement. For example, when walking sideways along fences you can get over them. This is an issue as once i did this and fell into the water not being able to get back on. Also, the spikes do not seem to have an effect on the shark so they are useless. I do believe that the developer needs to continue to work on this game and introduce new items and uses for them.

It's honestly a pretty good game, it's fun, even though there's no real end goal and a lack of side quests. Although many improvements can be made to the game, the worst part is the ads, it's really bad, and it's insulting as a player that they try to milk this much out of us. You have constant random ads that take over your game at any moment. 5 ads per chest you craft to unlock each slot, ads when you switch to the map, floating treasure chests that require ads to open, even more pointless ads at every crafting bench, and the list goes on. I would gladly even pay to play an ad free version, but this is just ridiculous.
I never get any mission do to. Give me an update plz
When will there be quests?  I'm up to level 10 and have a badass raft but there is nothing to do and I can't build the chemistry table. I have no way to get mortar and pedestal.

Please update the game.i just died and couldn't watch a video to revive and had no dablooms.i was very very far in the game.my raft was all metal with metal walls.i had alot of stuff.im very pissed that i had to start over.please fix the video system.or make it so if you die you can just revive,that simple.not start over completely.love the game just not some functions.please fix and update asap.thanks

description: Discover! Create! Survive!Your home is an endless ocean. Your neighbors ‚Äì ruthless sharks, sea creatures and relentless nature. The only refuge is a raft. descriptionHTML:
Discover! Create! Survive!
Your home is an endless ocean. Your neighbors – ruthless sharks, sea creatures and relentless nature. The only refuge is a raft. Improve it, craft everything you need to escape from the ocean trap, survive by all means!

🐋 Our survival on the raft advantages:

🌎 Real-life survival simulator
Check your health, hunger and thirst indicators, struggle sharks attacks. Meet the challenges and try to survive, it’s all up to you!

⚓ Resources hunting
Use a hook and catch necessary resources: wreckage, chests and barrels from the ocean. They will help you to survive!

🔨 Build and upgrade your raft
Expand, develop and protect your raft. If you need more place, build a first floor!

📜 Lot’s of crafting recipes
Fish, cook and collect drinking water. Craft building materials, clothes, weapons, chests and other necessary things to survive!

🚣 Solve the puzzle of an endless ocean
What happened in this apocalyptic world? Why are people destined to live in the ocean. Training and quest system help you to find answers and escape.

🌗 Great plans
We carefully examine all proposals according our favorite game improving. We’ll add dynamic Day-Night Cycle and weather condition, exciting plot, underwater world and other interesting events in the future updates!

Find out more advantages of the app:

🌊 VARIABLE WORLDS OF RAFT SURVIVAL
Each of survival adventure games has its own world with unique difficulties and challenges. Our survivor simulator generates unlimited numbers of worlds. Explore Pacific islands, reefs, and bottomless ocean trenches in raft games free!
No two worlds are alike: you can generate completely new and randomized world at any time in the survival free.

🌊 CLOSE TO REAL-LIFE EXPERIENCE
Raft survival free is a 3D game designed to give survival games free lovers the closest to real life gameplay. That’s why Day-Night Cycle was added. Survivor app has treacherous weather conditions that allow to enjoy sunny days and beware of stormy ones. If you’d like to get new skills in survive games, try raft games!

🌊 YOUR LIFE IS IN YOUR HANDS
Raft building games offer the chance to craft new weapons and equipments. Search for shipwreck parts and improve your raft in survival escape. Craft a spear and protect yourself from murderous sharks that follow you everywhere.

Bearing in mind all these qualities of build and survive games, you’d not forget about your health status in the harsh conditions. Fishing and hunting is the only way to succeed and not to starve to death in raft survival in the ocean.

RAFT: Original Survival Game features:
• 3D interface of raft free
• Realistic experience of survival base building games
• Complex and amazing challenges of survivor games free

Let your brain work at high speed and do everything within your power to win in one of the survival apps! If you want to go on raft craft survival games and turn it into an adventure of a lifetime, then play RAFT: Original Survival Game.

Join our social networking site and take part in expecting updates discussions and offer your ideas to improve the game!
Make screenshots, record videos, share your achievements with other players!

👉Our Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/RaftOriginal/
recentChanges: We fixed some shortcomings and improved the gameplay
summary: Explore! Craft! Survive! RAFT is your only chance to survive in boundless ocean!
title: RAFT: Original Survival Game

comments: Why is it that when you add new levels, I get kicked back to the first round in the legends arena? Totally unfair that all the progress I've made gets completely erased. Now that this has happened for about the 3rd time, it makes me want to uninstall

Seems like they took away the tree house and treasure map for this legend thing. It's nice to have extra levels to play while waiting for new levels, but I liked the side challenges too. It's basically impossible to earn gold now.

Really enjoyed the game until I was entered in a two week tournament.  Now, the boards are incredibly difficult and I can no longer earn prizes on a regular basis. Of course, I suppose that's by design so I spend money. Which I won't do. I just want some "bubblegum" to past the time.  Now, it's making my blood pressure rise...  Also amazing how many 5 ‚≠ê ratings they get in one day without the user giving explanations on why. Seems suspicious...  Oh, how I hate the legends arena stages...

Love this game! Fun, addictive, challenging. I only wish lives weren't limited. I hate getting stuck on a level for days or even weeks because you only get 5 lives at a time... unless you want to buy more with cash :(
Love it. Addicting. Some levels were hard but by taking a break I'd usually get it when I went back to play or have my sister beat the level for me
Use to love this game. But once you get up in level 1500's, you're forced to play in an "arena" for 12 days. And when it ends, you have to update app. Pretty disappointing.

descriptionHTML:
THE ULTIMATE MATCHING PUZZLE GAME WITH UNIQUE MAGIC POWERS AND BOOSTS!

♥ Join the fun world of Amy and help collect her precious toys! ♥

Match two or more blocks of the same color to clear the level and collect the toys from where they stuck. But be careful! It is not that easy to save all the toys while your moves are limited! Your talent in solving puzzles will be your best tool while playing this super addictive game. Bust the blocks and enjoy this colorful adventure!

Discover Amy’s world to make her smile. Play with the sweetest toys that will drag you to Amy’s enjoyable world. Crunch all the same colored cubes by using various boosters such as brick-busting blasts, rechargeable power-ups and many more!

Toy Blast Features:

● Stunning graphics and unique gameplay
● All kinds of cutest toys; cars, rockets, dolls, stuffed animals and many more...
● So many levels with exciting puzzles
● Numerous boosters along the way to help Amy; vacuums, drills, buckets, paintbrushes, tnts, rotors and so on...
● Spectacular rewards and extra bonuses unlocked after levels passed
● Easy and fun to play but challenging to master
● Facebook Leaderboards to compete with your friends and competitors!
● COMPLETELY FREE TO PLAY

comments: The game in my opinion is very rewarding. For example you get an Elite Cristiano Ronaldo at the beginning but they could add multiple updates to make it better. I actually have a no like about this game which is that it drains your battery usage fast and that's not good. The overall of the game is OK but they can add updates to make it better.

I request the developers to consider the following points... 1.The team can't be substituted while playing season games. 2.The game shows unknown errors sometimes while playing and crashes. 3.It would be good if getting the elite players become easier.. Rest it's surely one of the best game of EA and undoubtedly for the football lovers..Keep updating... I would like it more if you improve the physics of the game like curving the ball etc....please make it....

Vs mod is so bad after update. I have ovr 99. After update i lost many games from some guys who have ovr 94-95 because u didn't give me as many great chances as u predict. Once i played against 98 ovr player. He had 2 great and 6 good chances, i had 6 good chances and 0 great. It isnt ok.

The only I wanted to tell is that the game shows that the master players are very rare and we have a chance of getting them but trust I have been playing fifa for a lot of time and I never got like a player in like chance or in free packs I do not even get silver players. So I suggest that you increase the chances of getting these kind of players.

Well EA after the latest update;  1) Yr server connection still suxs. 2) The VS attack gameplay still unfair.  What's next?? To all players, please dont use real money to buy anything from these game coz, EA will cheat every single cent that u purchase from them. Not worth spending real money on them.

descriptionHTML:
FIFA Mobile has been reimagined to bring you the most authentic and exciting mobile soccer game you’ll ever experience! Get a free Cristiano Ronaldo item to start building and managing your team. Train any player to superstar status, attack opponents, and keep coming back for daily content all season long. Plus, get into the game on the go with a download size of under 100 MB. Whether you’re a savvy veteran or just starting out on the pitch, FIFA Mobile is your source for soccer.

BUILD YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM™
Develop the most competitive squad when you choose any 11 players from over 550 real teams, including stars from past and present, and train them to over 100 OVR. Add depth to your roster, manage your lineup on the fly, and quickly tweak tactics before every match. Make the right calls and watch your club become the Ultimate Team.

ATTACK TO WIN
Take on thrilling matches that drop you into your offensive possessions with VS Attack mode. This innovative level of competition kicks your game into high gear while you strive to dominate 90-second matches, climb the leaderboards, and earn seasonal rewards year-round.

KEEP UP WITH REAL-WORLD EVENTS

Test your skills in inter-league championships, or take on the best gamers worldwide in League vs. League Tournaments to climb the leaderboards and prove your talent on the pitch.

comments: I think this game is a really fun addicting game. The main reason why I got it was because of 8 ball pool. That game is also very fun. The only thing I don't like about football strike is that when I get on sometimes it won't let me click the spinner. So it's like my phone froze. But my phone didn't freeze. It's just the app. So can you guys please fix this.

At first I was skeptical about this game. I had downloaded it and went without playing for a couple of weeks. Then,one day I just happen to open the app and play. Best move I ever made for an app! This game is just flat out addicting, fun and challenging.  I was pleasantly surprised about how much fun it is and that there is, most of the time, something new.  Chalkenign friends and new people always makes for a challenging and fun time waster. Even if I don't have the time to play, I still make time!! Haha

There is a bug in your game I went first of my league, supposingly I am entitled to 350 cash, but it wasn't there.  How could you make it so unfair for someone. Why bother having a prizes if not given to the right person.

Uninstalled and reinstalled app because the update made it to where the game was unplayable. Went to login, using Facebook credentials. It says it failed because I would not allow them access to my friends list. Something doesn't seem right about that. Never had a game NOT allow me to login, after denying access to my friends list. Sorry, would prefer you not send messages to all my friends with my name tagged on it.

description: Yoga Challenge is a new app that can be really funny. Complete as many solo or team poses as you can before the time runs out. You can see the photos or videos it takes afterwards.This app is full featured and contains many features which increase the fun. You can view side by side comparison of the yoga challenge poses you made using your camera. There are multiple difficulties, the yoga challenge for two can be completed solo or with a friend co-op. Save photos/video to view afterwards or share. You can unlock great prizes like avatars and backgrounds.There are many different styles of poses and disciplines. Yoga asanas, Yoga Nidra,  Bikram Yoga, Kundalini Yoga, Acro Yoga, Vinyasa Yoga and more.Team Mode(2 Player): Master yoga poses with a friend in a yoga challenge for two. Solo Mode(1 Player): Practice your yoga in various different disciplines.Special Features:-Take pictures and video of your poses.-Yoga Challenge GO, has Yoga for beginners, Yoga for kids, yoga for dummies and Yoggies.-Difficulty Modes: Beginner Yoga, Easy Yoga, Medium Yoga. Hard Yoga poses.-Weight Loss Goals: Encourages a healthy lifestyle, physical exercise and breathing techniques.-Yoga Friend/Family Party: You can play this with one and two player modes.-60+ Yoga physical exercise poses.-Can share your yoga challenge videos and photos.-Artistic hand drawn poses.-Unlock avatars and backgrounds.Please ,leave a review and feedback on what you love about that app and what we can improve :)
descriptionHTML:
Yoga Challenge is a new app that can be really funny. Complete as many solo or team poses as you can before the time runs out. You can see the photos or videos it takes afterwards.

This app is full featured and contains many features which increase the fun. You can view side by side comparison of the yoga challenge poses you made using your camera. There are multiple difficulties, the yoga challenge for two can be completed solo or with a friend co-op. Save photos/video to view afterwards or share. You can unlock great prizes like avatars and backgrounds.

There are many different styles of poses and disciplines. Yoga asanas, Yoga Nidra, Bikram Yoga, Kundalini Yoga, Acro Yoga, Vinyasa Yoga and more.

Team Mode(2 Player): Master yoga poses with a friend in a yoga challenge for two.
Solo Mode(1 Player): Practice your yoga in various different disciplines.

Special Features:
-Take pictures and video of your poses.
-Yoga Challenge GO, has Yoga for beginners, Yoga for kids, yoga for dummies and Yoggies.
-Difficulty Modes: Beginner Yoga, Easy Yoga, Medium Yoga. Hard Yoga poses.
-Weight Loss Goals: Encourages a healthy lifestyle, physical exercise and breathing techniques.
-Yoga Friend/Family Party: You can play this with one and two player modes.
-60+ Yoga physical exercise poses.
-Can share your yoga challenge videos and photos.
-Artistic hand drawn poses.
-Unlock avatars and backgrounds.

Please ,leave a review and feedback on what you love about that app and what we can improve :)

description: Named Best of 2015 by Google Play editors! Thank you for all of your support.One of the hottest mobile games of all time! Easy to pick up and play. Wildly addictive. See for yourself why Touch Arcade called Doodle Jump ‚Äúpossibly the best [mobile] game ever created‚Äù and Macworld called it ‚Äúa perfect micro-game, insanely addictive, and deliciously replayable.‚Äù How high can you get?Journey up a sheet of graph paper, perpetually jumping from one platform to the next, picking up jet packs, avoiding black holes, and blasting baddies with nose balls along the way. Laugh with delight as you blow past other players' actual score markers scribbled in the margins. And be warned: this game is insanely addictive! Features:-	Many fantastical worlds to play in - Ninja, Space, Jungle, Soccer, Underwater, Snow, Halloween, Frozen Ice, Easter and Pirates!-	Awesome power-ups to pick-up (JET PACKs, PROPELLER HATS, ROCKETS, trampolines...)-	Trippy obstacles to avoid (UFOs, black holes, and many, many monstrous monsters)-	Mad platforms to jump on (Broken, moving, disappearing, shifting, EXPLODING‚Ä¶)-	NEW! - More than 100 missions to complete for rewards-	Global leaderboards, fun achievements! Beat your friends‚Äô scores!How to play: Tilt to move left or right, tap the screen to shoot. As seen on TV (Big Bang Theory, Parks & Rec, Bad Girls), movies (Battleship), late-night (Jimmy Fallon) and on tour with Lady Gaga, find out why Doodle Jump is a true cultural phenomenon.* BE WARNED: This game is INSANELY addictive! * Don't doodle jump and drive!:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::If you bought Doodle Jump in the past, make sure you have it installed on your device* when you install this new version! That will remove the ads. If you have already uninstalled/deleted the old paid Doodle Jump version, you can re-download it from "My Android Apps" -> "Other apps in my library" or by going directly to: http://bit.ly/oldpaid  * This will work for most devices, but unfortunately not the ones that the old paid version is not compatible with. We are trying to come up with a solution for those. :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
descriptionHTML:
Named Best of 2015 by Google Play editors! Thank you for all of your support.

One of the hottest mobile games of all time! Easy to pick up and play. Wildly addictive.

See for yourself why Touch Arcade called Doodle Jump “possibly the best [mobile] game ever created” and Macworld called it “a perfect micro-game, insanely addictive, and deliciously replayable.”

How high can you get?
Journey up a sheet of graph paper, perpetually jumping from one platform to the next, picking up jet packs, avoiding black holes, and blasting baddies with nose balls along the way. Laugh with delight as you blow past other players' actual score markers scribbled in the margins. And be warned: this game is insanely addictive!

Features:
- Many fantastical worlds to play in - Ninja, Space, Jungle, Soccer, Underwater, Snow, Halloween, Frozen Ice, Easter and Pirates!
- Awesome power-ups to pick-up (JET PACKs, PROPELLER HATS, ROCKETS, trampolines...)
- Trippy obstacles to avoid (UFOs, black holes, and many, many monstrous monsters)
- Mad platforms to jump on (Broken, moving, disappearing, shifting, EXPLODING…)
- NEW! - More than 100 missions to complete for rewards
- Global leaderboards, fun achievements! Beat your friends’ scores!

How to play:
Tilt to move left or right, tap the screen to shoot.


As seen on TV (Big Bang Theory, Parks & Rec, Bad Girls), movies (Battleship), late-night (Jimmy Fallon) and on tour with Lady Gaga, find out why Doodle Jump is a true cultural phenomenon.

* BE WARNED: This game is INSANELY addictive!
* Don't doodle jump and drive!


:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
If you bought Doodle Jump in the past, make sure you have it installed on your device* when you install this new version! That will remove the ads. If you have already uninstalled/deleted the old paid Doodle Jump version, you can re-download it from "My Android Apps" -> "Other apps in my library" or by going directly to: http://bit.ly/oldpaid

* This will work for most devices, but unfortunately not the ones that the old paid version is not compatible with. We are trying to come up with a solution for those.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
recentChanges: We stomped a few annoying pests
summary: One of the best mobile games of all time. As INSANELY addictive as ever!
title: Doodle Jump

comments: This game could use better and easier ways to earn money for opening the chests and scoring or pay outs after each prize or game. So you can get better equipment and achievements. Would help keep players more interested. My only dislikes so far. I most definitely enjoy the game and think it's pretty awesome!

The game is rigged for you to lose so you will buy gold pieces. I only made it to 300,000 gold before the bottom fell out.  Every match I played was against a person or computer that would hole out from 200yrds every time. Hole in one on almost every shootout. Nice game but very rigged no matter what the idiots from playdemic say. Better HONEST golf games out there. Funny I only rated it 1 star yet is has 4 stars. Also rigged

Was fun at first, then massive losing streak due to other players making every single shot perfect.  But most of the time when I start spending money I do better.  Odd.  I think I found a cheater during a putt.  He lined up correctly, however with the power he should have missed the hole.  I tried to watch the replay, but it is the only replay unavailable.  Then when we do the tie breaker shootout, he hits with pinpoint accuracy on the edge of the rough/fairway to get within 2 ft of the hole.

After playing for a while it just isn't that great.  It shows too much of what other people are doing and then makes you go first.  I've now tried for a few months but honestly it's designed to make you spend cash.  I still play a little but constantly think about uninstalling it.  It gives you a free golden tee shot maybe once a week.  The rewards are meh... Because you know if you won too much you wouldn't need to spend real cash.  For the amount of rewards you get it should play the free golden tee shot 3 times a week.  The best feature is that you can save a shot and upload to YouTube easily.

Best game period. Not just golf or sports game, but any game. Wouldn't change a thing. All ya all who say, oh they need to change this or that, and why do I have to play someone who's better than me? Well it's because you suck, and you have no hand eye coordination. Just shut up and dribb, uh I mean play. #1 game for a reason peeps. Love ya. Dueces. Peace biatches.

First of all I love the game, I play every day. I especially love the tournaments. But now I have to congratulate you guys, you are brilliant. You took a push one button to go between guest and Facebook accounts, and changed it to pushing 20 buttons. And now you have to leave the game and go to the Facebook app to push most of them. Apparently you're not happy about two accounts. I don't know why, I spend twice as much money.  Tech monkeys, gotta love 'em.

comments: I used to love this game. But now all it has become is an ATM for the developer. Every good car in the game must be bought. Winning special events costs money. In game rewards have become useless. There are plenty of other racing games out there that won't require you to refinance your house to play. If I could give it zero stars I would.

Sound could use tweaking, I've driven some of the t1 and t2 cars and they do not sound like that. The grind is real in this game but the developer adds events on a frequent basis to over shadow this. Which would be great if the events didn't expect you to either have the devils luck with silver key crates or a never ending supply of cash.   Over all, great game. I still enjoy playing it even when I hit a "pay wall" and that says something about the game. I've only put $5 into this game (bought a $4.99 special pack) and I've still made it pretty far.

This is by far the greatest racing game I've played on a mobile device! The graphics are amazing, the controls are solid, and it keeps me coming back for more. The only issue I've found with it so far is the live races. Its sometimes hard to find a race and the races themselves seem unfair at times. Other than that, its a great game! Highly recommended!

Awesome game and graphics, but pretty much have to spend money if you wanna compete. Should have more races available a t all times. Need to make ALL cars accessible to purchase, with preferably money earned in the game and not $20 of real money or depend on luck to get a good car in "rare imports". Especially, when available races are so limited, supply races, etc., unless you're satisfied with just regulation races.

Easy.to control. Great.graphics!!! Keep up the great work!!!!! Next make a truck one or bike. PunisherüëçJust updated and the game gets better and better! I even got my father playing. Keep up the good work CSR!! üòâ It has lost a bit from me and my father when I bought a set of keys and all three cars were the same. Just different colors. So I felt screwed over! You'd think a popular game would make good of it!....üòû I keep winning the same cars. It's getting boring.. It started off good then went down hill. I think you should win a special car when you reach a certain level ..

Why can't you buy keys from your winnings? Should also be able to buy parts you need instead of the random stuff from " Donna Banks". Graffics are great. Online racing is ok. Wish the game wouldn't freeze in the middle of a race. Takes way to much space on your phone

descriptionHTML:
CSR Racing 2 – The next chapter to the #1 drag racing series of all time has arrived!

“Unbelievably good looking”, KOTAKU
“So real it hurts”, CULT OF MAC
“Obliterates the line between console and mobile graphics”, POLYGON

Setting a new standard in visuals, CSR2 delivers hyper-real drag racing to the palm of your hand. Compete against live players across the world with your custom built supercars including LaFerrari, McLaren P1™, Koenigsegg One:1 and many more.

Team up with friends to form a crew, tune your rides for maximum speed and dominate the competition in global crew events. CSR2 is all-new; download for free and start racing now!

3D NEXT-GEN GRAPHICS
• CSR2 redefines what you thought possible on mobile, with stunning detail on all your favorite cars.
• Meticulous level of detail inside every car, incl. original manufacturers’ trim options. Racing doesn’t get more real than this!

REAL-TIME RACING
• Race towards a new challenge! Compete against opponents from around the world or race against friends in real-time challenges.

CAR CUSTOMISATION
• Cars can be customized with a wide range of paint, rims, brake calipers and interior trims just like a real car.
• Personalize your car with paint wraps, decals and custom license plates!

UPGRADE, TUNE AND FUSE
• Car upgrades are only the start. You can now get under the hood to tune gear ratios, tire pressure, nitrous boost settings and much more.
• Stay competitive by stripping surplus cars for parts, and fuse them into your favorite vehicles.

BUILD YOUR DREAM GARAGE
• Collect beautiful supercars and show them off in your huge warehouse garage.
• CSR2 features over 200 officially licensed vehicles from the world’s most desirable car manufacturers including:
• Ferrari
• McLaren
• Bugatti
• Lamborghini
• Pagani
• Koenigsegg

CHALLENGE FRIENDS AND RACING ENTHUSIASTS AROUND THE WORLD
• Prove your skill in fast-paced, synchronous multiplayer challenges. Master the unique timing of each car to come out on top.
• Chat with other players live, and join a crew to roll with your friends.
• Compete in fresh and exciting online events and increase your rank on the PVP leaderboards.

DOMINATE THE CITY
• Compete in single-player Crew Battles across stunning race environments.
• Work your way from rookie to pro by defeating the top crews in a city where nothing is as it seems. Can you uncover the truth?
• Keep an eye out for events to earn extra cash for upgrades and win rare parts for your rides. New events added daily!


---------------------

Make sure you play with your device connected to the internet to gain access to the latest content and features, and to ensure that your profile is backed up.

PLEASE NOTE! Must be 13+ to play. CSR Racing 2 is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. You can toggle these purchases on/off in the ""Restrictions"" menu on your device.

To prevent unauthorized purchases, select “Set or Change PIN” from the Google Play settings menu, create a PIN, then enable the “Use PIN for Purchases” option. You will then be required to enter your PIN before every transaction.

Terms of Service: https://www.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy

descriptionHTML:
Extreme Car Driving Simulator is the best car simulator of 2014, thanks to its advanced real physics engine
Ever wanted to try a sports car simulator? Now you can drive, drift and feel a racing sports car for free!

description: Become a celebrated sniper hero in American Block Sniper Survival. This brutal running and shooting action game stars you as a sniper of a deadly operation. Trek through a devastated war torn city in pursuit of the enemy. Only once your objective has been met can you all the mission a success. ****READY YOUR WEAPONS****They would descend upon villages, bringing fire and death with them. Grave after grave... I couldn't bear to be a part of that anymore. The issue was so big, so consuming, and the world had forgotten about the horrors confronted on the battlefield: a child's burnt sock on the side of the road, blood spattered alleyways, the haunting stench of death and the ring of a report playing on repeat in your head as you try to sleep at night... and the look on the target's face as the blood drained from his body. But it this was war, and the law of a good soldier was a lack of feeling. Numbing my emotions and attachments to the people and places I visited was a challenge, but I soon realized the benefit... because now I was unstoppable.**** INTENSE GAME PLAY **** Launch a fun, fast-paced 3D mobile gaming experience upon downloading this addictive FPS game. Strike fast and kill enemies in this combat challenge. Collect ammo and HP pickups as you advance. These pickups will decrease though, while the number of enemies increases significantly. This ultimate battle offers the option to go at it hand-to-hand or with a range of melee and firearm weapons. The choice is yours. Choose your difficulty, earn power-ups by completing quick tasks and unlock levels on the mission map select. Features:-Pixel cube graphics-Six levels to conquer -Precision aiming -Radar map-Health meter -Perks & power-ups-Blocky weapon collect
descriptionHTML:
Become a celebrated sniper hero in American Block Sniper Survival. This brutal running and shooting action game stars you as a sniper of a deadly operation. Trek through a devastated war torn city in pursuit of the enemy. Only once your objective has been met can you all the mission a success.

****READY YOUR WEAPONS****
They would descend upon villages, bringing fire and death with them. Grave after grave... I couldn't bear to be a part of that anymore. The issue was so big, so consuming, and the world had forgotten about the horrors confronted on the battlefield: a child's burnt sock on the side of the road, blood spattered alleyways, the haunting stench of death and the ring of a report playing on repeat in your head as you try to sleep at night... and the look on the target's face as the blood drained from his body. But it this was war, and the law of a good soldier was a lack of feeling. Numbing my emotions and attachments to the people and places I visited was a challenge, but I soon realized the benefit... because now I was unstoppable.

**** INTENSE GAME PLAY ****
Launch a fun, fast-paced 3D mobile gaming experience upon downloading this addictive FPS game. Strike fast and kill enemies in this combat challenge. Collect ammo and HP pickups as you advance. These pickups will decrease though, while the number of enemies increases significantly. This ultimate battle offers the option to go at it hand-to-hand or with a range of melee and firearm weapons. The choice is yours. Choose your difficulty, earn power-ups by completing quick tasks and unlock levels on the mission map select.

Features:
-Pixel cube graphics
-Six levels to conquer
-Precision aiming
-Radar map
-Health meter
-Perks & power-ups
-Blocky weapon collect

Cardston, AB

comments: I really love playing skipbo but now the ads are getting to be outrageous. Not only are the ads after every turn you make but now they freeze constantly and I have to shut down and restart it. I would buy the 2$ but that still has ads too; so what's even the point... so dissapointed.

I get that ads should be used to support a free app.. But this game is unplayable due to every ad they insert. Literally after every action is another 30 sec ad. You can't even play the main game because they kill you with ads. Uninstalling.

I really enjoy this game but there are too many ads and it crashes every now and then. Online play is kind of bad because it pairs you with ppl that dont ever play and if they do its every couple days until you can play your turn, which could be just to discard a card. I do absolutely like this game. I play actual card game still to this day. Great app just needs work. Will update more stars after updates start coming out.

Would be nice if the game would stop glitching and making me lose coins. Edit: I was excited about the update but there's still glitches!! You pay a coin to use the extra card in your hand boost and the robots get to have 5 cards but you only get 2 or 3 or if you're lucky you'll get 4 cards in total in your hand.

I love the game, the set up is great but if you want more people to actually play the you get rid of some of the ads. I completely understand that the ads are a key point but not it is annoying while your in a middle of a game and an ad pop up. Sorry but it makes me not want to play. I have never wrote a comment or rated a game for the simple fact that if I didn't like it I would just delete the app or game but I took my time to write this one because I really love this game and it brings back lots of childhood memories and I don't have to actually sit down and play with others

So many ads they interfere with gameplay! What should be a quick turn becomes a 3 minute play. I don't ads, I support developers making money and even click on ads for bonuses, but this is ridiculous. The game is also laggy, which I suspect if from the ads trying to load. Expect game crashes as well - one occurs every gameplay for me.

comments: Awsome game. Completed all levels without any hack jzt waited  for hope   ( the lives ) evrbdy shld try this. Sry i gonna uninstall this app only bcoz i finished all levels. Each time when u invite me to rate this app i was thinking that i shall rate this 5 if i win the 75th level. Now iam satisfied.... Great timepass.. Nice tactics, waiting 4 more awsome funny levels. If anybody has any diffrnt opinion cntact me on telegram @chichu  this is my user name. Thnx 4 thiz awsome gift babe.

The game is really interesting and entertaining. The graphics are smooth and and the controls are manageable.   The thing I disliked through my game play is that you don't get any clues what you have to do and/or how to defeat the new "enemies". While you understand what exactly you have to do, you've lost some lives. But that's not so important.  I will strongly recommend this game just because of its graphics, entertainment and due the fact, that this game is not pay-to-win game.

I really liked this game. The levels are very challenging and this game is addictive and fun. The only issue is that there are only 5 short lives  that when our lives ran out, we have to wait 18-19 minutes long to have 5 lives again. Of course, there are many hard levels in the game that keeps us dying and think a way to pass the level. So if possible, please shorten the time, like 5-7 minutes only and let us really enjoy the game. It's more even challenging and thrilling if there are many lives. And this game will be really perfect for us. Thank you.

Remember the old days when platformers taught you through trial and error how to interact with new game mechanics? If you don't like that, you'll hate this game. So much fun, so creative, and once you start to get down one of the new features, it ramps it up and keeps you learning creatively how to beat the level. I love this game, it's a fantastic platformer that will challenge you to learn as you go instead of giving you a tutorial every time something new comes up.

Completed all but just couldn't get enough of it. Everyone should play Redball 4. It is D best android games I've ever played. Those who complained about the Game play and control has an abnormal thumb. Easy, Fun & Challenging but nothing impossible to get through. I just hope they make new levels.

Amazing game reminds me of the old school games . But the only problem is the lives you give us to play. They are so few and they take a lot of time to refill. PLEASE remove the life or ball things from this game it will be the best if you do that cause I was playing and level by level I was getting exited and I wanted to rate this game 5 stars but suddenly this GAME OVER thing comes and I had to give you this ratings.please let us play without stopping and waiting for the life to come.

comments: 3 stars because the spins are not giving what is needed for the game. It's a cute game. I enjoy playing with my daughter. However, shields do not spin enough. Sometimes I will go a whole day with no shields and the whole time I'm getting attacked. The other thing is the bonus spin. Never have I won more that 250k coins. I know you want us to pay for another spin but maybe award a higher number once in a while. All in all cute game.

Game is pretty cool but I won't spend money because what you get for your money is not worth it. They raise the prices of the chest to get cards and it's already hard to get the coins to build villages, get raided and attacked so much it takes months to get to the next villages. I hope y'all up the amount of coins on spins because it doesn't go up much at all but the cost of everything else shoots up like crazy.

I used to love this game. Even now I play this game everyday but I m getting sick and tired when I get the same card over and over. Even when I complete villages and buy chest I still get the same card. I buy all 3 type of chest but it's very hard to get gold cards. Most of the sets I need only 1 gold card to complete but it take ages to come...I m planing to uninstall it. And now I don't get any spins when my friend join in and the answer your customer support give was 'because one of my friend is a fake profile in my Facebook. How do I know if that account is fake or not? I invite alot of people to this game and how am I to identify who is real and fake...

Waste of time. The game is set up to try and get you to pay. If you don't, you get attacked a lot. Speaking of attack, your attackers are not matched to your level.  For every 8 coins you gain during regular gameplay, you lose 30 from attackers. In your frustration, you'll consider buying.  App trap...

Every time i get burn village within 1 HR ....and not get anything good point... See my point 382 and village7lvl.  ..but totally bad  to see others  points is totally low like 188 and her village 9lvl am totally disappointed on this game.... So I No need to play any more....

I would given 5 stars to this game. But from past few days I am not getting 40 spins as reward when my friends join coin master from the request which i have sent them. Its really annoying !!!!!!  I have sent so many mails to the support team but no one bothers to reply back.
description: Join your Facebook friends and millions of players around the world in attacks, spins and raids to build your viking village to the top! Can you travel through time and magical lands to battle it out to be the best Pirate, Hippie, King, Warrior or VIKING of them of all!Spin to earn your lootSpin the wheel to fall on your fortune, be it attack time, loot, shields or raids. Win your loot by landing on coins or gold sacks so you can build strong villages through the game and move up in levels. Win shields to guard your village from other vikings trying to attack you. Become the Coin Master with the strongest village and the most loot!Attack and Raid fellow vikings!Earning coins through the slot machine isn't the only way to get loot, you can steal it too! Take revenge on those who have attacked your village and take whats rightfully yours! Bring your Coin Dozer and get rich again! You never know what treasures you can find in someone else's village! Collect all the Cards!It's not always about the loot, it's about the treasure too! Collect cards to complete sets and move on to the next village. comments: Game is getting better with being fair. Free to play people can actually roll decent heroes after a while with persistence. IGG is still unbelievably money hungry for their newest released things - but I guess it's better to wait for everything or pay for it upfront. I chose option 1. Thank you IGG for making rolling a little more fair.

WTH HAS HAPPENED?? Been playing for 3+ years and have NOT EVER seen the game "rolling" system so broken. I have not rolled anything worth a $$@ in almost 3 MONTHS. Don't give me the it's random thing. I have never had anything like this until after an update a couple months back. You have obviously changed the system and it is apparently to screw the long timers in favor of generating more $$ but it's only making long timers like me BORED and frustrated!! I'm not spending any more money until it's fixed. Tired of wasting cash!

I've been playing for almost 4 years and CC used to be better before you could purchase top level heroes. IGG really sucked what little competitive nature was left in the game out with pay to win. If you want to spend money on a game and still be competitive, play Summoners War instead.

Some people use this for a dating app or say innapropiate things and kids play this game obviously. But that isnt the games fault its the players fault. However i would like it if the creators would sensor all of that
OMG This app is annoying in all ways... And on Certain hack things I play this for 30 seconds but still don't get a pass! Tell CoTops to give me my credits

Lol I'm changing my review once more. I love the game but every new hero you guys drop completely messes up the game and makes things unfair. I don't know if your way of trying to fix it is by making more OP heroes but it simply makes the game less enjoyable. The last few heroes that came out completely made my account useless and if I don't put in a good couple hundred dollars is just gonna stay useless. I think that's unfair so for now I'm taking off a few stars. I know you guys don't care but its the only thing I can do to express my opinion. In my humble opinion you guys should balance the useless heroes you already have rather than coming up with new ones that make the old ones  useless.

I'm still getting used to the different types of production but I just started I can definitely say I will never get rid of this game so much fun!!!

comments: This is actually a really good game. And while I would refer a flat fee to buy it without ads even the ads aren't that bad. Yes there are ads but the game is free and even the "microtransactions" are so minor and the currency so easily obtained in game I can easily overlook the ads. Some have called it a Mario clone but in a way aren't most platformers but unlike so many of them this is actually very creative and well done. Excellent job!!

A great Mario Clone.... Very close gameplay to the original. I love playing the game and have got very far through the levels but even tho I was signed in with Google account I lost my game progress after having to reset my phone. Am I missing something? Is there a way to get my progress back?

Really good game only reason I gave it 4* is because when the the toads or snails are close... they seem to be 1 - 2 steps away and you still either die or shrink into small Mario... other than that little glitch it seems really good.
Great game, my children 7 & 4 love playing it.... when they get a chance hahaüòÅ One thing I have noticed is you need to fix up the 111st to 111th after defeating the Boss! There is no st in 111

Love this app . Actually I install this app in my previous mobile but my bad luck I lost it.and in My pre.mobile I  reach 125 level .i became so sad that I will not able to play my sboy adventure game and next day I just buy new phone. first app that I install in phone is this appüåüüåüüåüu deserves 1000000000000stars.

I finished all 140 parts, the more higher the more challenging. It always made me curious about this. Wait for d next part 2,3,etc from SWorld Boy Adventures. Just need fixed for controls the pictures doesn't​ moved while we repeat at the same level that We failed. Overall for me it's good game's.

comments: Well i would give this five stars but you cant watch an add to get a power up! And you should lower the ad mount of adds i cant go in for 10 seconds without an add popping up!! Overall good great game
Way too many ads after every time I lose or go onto another level an advert pops up. Verry annoying. But the gameplay is decent.

I know it's free, so ads are to be expected but there are so many ads that it significantly impacts the experience. Win a level, ad. Lose a level, ad. Replay a level (which is by far the most common scenario), ad. I understand that the developers have to make their money but if it's at the expense of gameplay then that's absurd. Uninstalled after ~30 minutes of playing.

Look, I understand that you have to make money somehow, and ads are how you make money on a free game. But these ads are way too frequent and obnoxious. I listen to podcasts while playing games and every minute or so my sound cuts out completely to prioritize the ad. Earn the ad by giving me a decent amount of playtime before it and stop overriding my audio.
The game is good but it contains too many adds.. it sucks.. after every 2 or 3 levels an add pops up, it irritates so much... pls increase the interval of the adds

I like the game itself but when you have 3 adds coming up after one game you hardly can enjoy the game. Super annoying, so if you download it for free be prepared to buy it otherwise it will drive you crazy!

This game is really bored! I'm so stress! I lose and second you lose again why Glow Hockey is bored a bored game! But like it. I'm nervous to play because you lose... but I'm happy..

comments: It's OK but not general knowledge unless you're a historian. Also if your stuck pick answer 2 and you'll be right 65% of the time! I see your response and no, I stand by my answer, if you guess and pick 2 you will be right way more than you are wrong. Answer 2 comes up way more than any other answer, sometime 3 times in a row. No other answer comes up that many times, I made a chart, I know I'm right, you're trying to believe your programming.

It's very good, indeed! The questions are truly endless, which is veru  refreshing (literally), although some questions are a bit too scientific for me, but I can't blame the game for my lack of knowledge in this specific field. However, I can even it out because most of the scientific terms are basically in Greek, so I unerstand what most of them mean and answer a few science questions correctly. Apart from that, there is history, geography, grammar and spelling, politics, art, the pop culture in general. Being Greek, I feared that the majority of questions would have to do with USA stuff, like most of the other quizes, but it's not. This game asks questions about things that are taking or have taken place all around the world and sometimes the correct answer demands very specific knowledge. It's a great quiz!

Seems the majority of questions relate to ancient times.  Not common knowledge.  A bit frustrating. Also, loss of points for wrong answers much greater than points gained for correct answers. Seems a bit unfair.  Fun game however.
A rare gem in a sea of horrible game apps. Ads are rare and the questions challenging. A great way to exercise my brain or kill time at the DMV. I'm hooked!
I stink at math & geography. OK in literature, Nature, art, some science, some biology, so I do OK there.But really, really wish would give all measurement systems instead of just metric!!
I've been looking for a decent trivia game since leaving quizup (when they introduced pay-to-win xp boosters). This game fills the gap nicely.
description: Have fun testing your expertise with this general knowledge quiz!Contains thousands of questions from various categories.New questions are being added weekly!The quiz contains only general knowledge "fact" type of questions, no trivia questions from popular culture.Thus, this game will present a true test of your level of education!In this quiz you will find questions from the following categories:- History- Literature- Science- Technology- Geography- Arts- Humanities- GeneralThis quiz gives you an endless stream of general knowledge questions.The questions are hand-selected and are designed to test a wide range of your general knowledge. All questions are linked to Wikipedia articles so that you can learn new things after answering.You can track your progress with an Elo number to compare yourself to other players.And if you want, you can also test your skills in matches against other players.App name: Endless Quiz
descriptionHTML:
Have fun testing your expertise with this general knowledge quiz!
Contains thousands of questions from various categories.
New questions are being added weekly!

The quiz contains only general knowledge "fact" type of questions, no trivia questions from popular culture.
Thus, this game will present a true test of your level of education!

In this quiz you will find questions from the following categories:

- History
- Literature
- Science
- Technology
- Geography
- Arts
- Humanities
- General

This quiz gives you an endless stream of general knowledge questions.
The questions are hand-selected and are designed to test a wide range of your general knowledge.
All questions are linked to Wikipedia articles so that you can learn new things after answering.

You can track your progress with an Elo number to compare yourself to other players.
And if you want, you can also test your skills in matches against other players.

App name: Endless Quiz
developerAddress:
Christopher Masser
Baumgasse 25
A-1030 Vienna
summary: An endless stream of general knowledge questions
title: General Knowledge Quiz

comments: Everything was great except in the beginning it kept saying I didn't find any mice but I found them twice on the first one.. but then I restarted it and it worked fine.. until it kept freezing and I had to restart my tablet.. after doing that like 5 times it worked great thru out the whole game.. I kinda felt like it was a lot shorter then the other games. But other then that I had fun playing it and I'm super excited for other to come out so hurryyy!!!!!!! Lol

This is just like the other game you guys made, the one with the doctor in the hospital, down to the exact same thing of "play the first couple of levels for free but if you like you pay" I bet this one is for the same price. On a side note, the story is different but the game play is the same, go have a look if you want. I will say this is a good game and I take nothing away from the hard work you have done. Good looking graphics, good smooth game play. A game you can get into and do try the other games of this developers you may like it as well. Over all a good game I just do not think it is worth $15. But best of luck guys.

Thanks thanks thanks!!! I have played many of the Emily's and Hearts games.. I bought many of them as well. I understand the cost of making these awesome games with beautiful graphics... but I'm happy you are also thinking of your fan's pockets this time. Thanks for giving us the option to choose to buy a full version or keep playing free with ads for this games. Once it's over, nothing happens.  I don't get credit for work achieved and I have to restart with same result. A glitch. Waiting for update

It stays on the challenge and I have to go back to the menu and play again. Pretty frustrating. Hoping it can be resolved.

descriptionHTML:
Help rookie detective Parker solve cases and bring criminals to justice!

In Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice, a streak of murders plagues the city. Become a homicide detective and restore law and order in this unique crime investigation game!

Lily Parker is a smart and righteous detective who works hard to put criminals behind bars and make the world a better place, even if her own life is a mess. Victor Lane is a smug but charming criminal defense attorney who doesn’t care who he’s defending as long as he’s getting paid. He’s also the best at his job.

When some of the criminals Lane defended in the past start dying, Parker’s forced to work with him to find the culprit. Could it be one of the criminal’s victims? Or perhaps some kind of vigilante? Is Lane himself being targeted?

Immerse yourself in the first episode of an exciting time management story game, feel the thrill of the chase and prove that your detective skills are second to none! Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice is waiting for you.

🕵️‍♀️ Help expose the hidden killer before another victim falls!
🔎 Look for evidence while investigating 9 different locations
🕵️‍♀️ Master 18 mini games based on forensic investigation
🔎 Examine clues and analyze objects using forensic techniques
🕵️‍♀️ Play through 60 extraordinary story levels and 30 extra challenge levels
🔎 Complete your case file by collecting diamonds
🕵️‍♀️ Conquer daily challenges to earn extra diamonds for your case file
🔎 Beat your high score with a choice of 15 awesome endless levels

Try the first few levels for free! To access the full game, you can either unlock everything with an in-app purchase, or continue playing the free version with ads.

Follow Parker & Lane on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GameHouseOriginalStories/

Download the GameHouse Original Stories app and enjoy other amazing games like Delicious, Heart's Medicine and Fabulous: https://goo.gl/SXb8sa

comments: Such a Blast to Play. App never seems to grow boring like some other games. Also the apps not constantly hounding you to spend on Upgrades and Advances which is nice. Your character jumps higher, flips and twirls faster as U advance further. I play it once or twice a day at least. All in All a great/fun app....ENJOY !!

In this game once you have all of the flips it gets really boring. Also there are way to many ad breaks. This game was really fun but now that it's newer it's boring. It lags to much and kicks me out. I give this 1 star

Ads ads and more ads. And really pushy ads that you can't just close straight away too. You spend more time watching ads than playing the game, and honestly you can't advance in the game without watching ads for coins anyway, so it's basically an advertisement with a mini game in between. Scummy sell out app.

This game is great but I would only rate it a five if there were less adds. Every game I play, as soon as I finished it said "add break". This is very annoying as the adds are up to 30 seconds long. Please get rid of them.

The game desparately needs to offer more coins as skill level increases.  The frequency of coins remains the same while the skill level demands more and more coins (in the thousands).  Watching ads helps, but the player finds themselves doing that exclusively, which defeats the purpose of the game.  Physics, graphics and gameplay are good.

One Of My Favorite Games  So. Let me start of by saying I LOVE it! So I like very few games, in fact nearly no games. But this  game is epic! It's interactive, fun, motivate and time killing. But there is one problem and that's there are to many adds and most of them are inappropriate

comments: It's OK I love to play the game when I'm bored and it helps me to be settled back and have a good time. But these all happens when I'm offline. But when I'm connected to Wi-Fi there's too many ads just slapped into my face. Yes I understand that you'll get these ads but ketchapp seriously,will you give and ad while I'm playing the game??!! It's too much for me. But still I love the game so I just play it turning my Wi-Fi off in my mobile.

Well before I say my review, I would like to clear out a few of the negative reviews. There are not very many ads at all, in fact I barely ever even get any. Second, the controls don't suck, they are just wobbly, but that is the point. Without the difficult turning, the game would be too easy. With that all said, this game is pretty fun.
I know people were asking for different controls, but the new tap contols are turning the game into something so much less original.  Why don't you make the steering wheel work like in real cars?
THIS GAME IS THE WORST!!! Save yourself some time and DON'T install this thing I can barely move the car so please make easier to control. I know your trying but I,m sorry I,m uninstalling this game.
It's stupid. It's really boring after your first try! And, when you come to a turn, the car doesn't turn fast enough. When you turn before a turn, it turns too fast. This thing is hacked.
Difficult to master, weave through the road and collect gems on your way. Simple and addicting. Ads get a little annoying and are placed in a bad way (bottom of the screen).

comments: lnstaII 'VEARN' App Enterr (CRETA) to Start Earning So far so good.Fun way to get money. Won't make you rich but the extra cash is helpful. It's also the best exchange rate on points. McEarn points equals mc instead of like some of the others where it takes VEarn points to reach vc etc...Also, lnstaII 'TOYOCASH' App Enterr (TRDG) very reliable in paying you when you redeem to toyocash. You can choose assorted giftcards as payment or transfer to Walet for cash. Your choice. I love these guys thanks for addingsome fun to my day.

I love the game play and graphics. But I payed for adidas female clothing and an aquarium previously on the game, and then when I restarted, they have gone. I spend ¬£3 on it in total and I actually spent more money on other things that didn't come back in the next game, but it's understandable because they were lifestyle points and you know it's currency not clothing or furniture. I uninstall sims sometimes a bit of always go back and before my items were there, but now they're not and that really frustrated me. I actually ended up in 2017 spending  ¬£10 on sims freeplay and that's the only money I think I will ever spend on ot now because if you restart,  you don't get anything you wanted. Please fix this because I spent that money and I could've bought something else with it but I didn't because I like sims.

Overall,  this is a great game. Two requests.  1) Selling multiple items at once.  I bought a load of junk and I need to sell it!  2) Make the schools "playable",  like the police station. I was talking to my sister about this and it'd be cool if the schools were playable and you could build clubs inside it. Anyway,  I loved everything in the game! So fun,  so creative.

First, I don't like that the game is in realtime it makes it a lot less fun and more boring. Secondly, I don't like that you HAVE to buy things just to get vip. I know that the prices are quite low but if you're just a kid like me then that limits what you can do. Lastly, I want more jobs and maybe even school to be playable it would just seem reasonable and make the game more addicting. Overall the game is really enjoyable but could do better, still keep up the good work!

im not sure what's the cause of the problem but what i know is the sims' act a lil bit freaky. i just redownloaded this game bcs i cant log in this game before bcs i just updated it. before this, the sims is ok, but now they act really awkward. when they're walking, they legs dont even move! it's like they're flying, plus when they're doing any action like "clean the dishes", they dont move, they just stand still in front of the sink. this is freaky. please reply to my review bcs i really want to know more about this. i really like this game except what i said above. this game is really addicting:).

For the fact that we can't sell multiple items at once is a big downer. I have accumulated so many windows, computers, chairs etc with watching the daily news ads and it's a complete pain to delete 30, 50, 70 or even more! items one by one. Please consider adding this function in the app as it's in the real The Sims games.

comments: Do not waste your money on the game. I use to enjoy it and had no problem paying for things. I believe a company should make money if they do their job. Since it was sold to a new owner they no longer answer anyone's questions. They send you to a link that has everyone else scrambling for answers. They also do not replace items you lose when the game has problems. They do not care if you purchased them. The old company use to replace items and gold bars when it was the games glitches. They actually cared about the people playing it. The owners now can not even be bothered to reply. If you play it only get the free stuff. Do not waste your hard earned money on this game. They will not spend any time to make sure you get what you paid for
Why did bubblegum hill disappear in the middle of the day today? Also the power ups are not staying the allotted amount of time either? I've spent money on this app but won't spend anymore!

The game is fun, but customer support is terrible. I've had a number of issues with booster bonuses - infinite boosters are activated for 2 hours or more, but after a short time they vanish. I get no reasonable response, nor effort to make up for lost items, from support team.

Stuck at level 705 no more levels available? Everytime I load the app it tells me I'm not connected and to go online to download more episodes, I'm obviously connected on my device or I wouldn't be here.(update) Stuck back at level 705 again can't get past it to the level I'm actually at so annoyed, it's now been 20 plus days of this issue can't even play the game unless I want to play levels I've already done what is going on fix this already!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Yet another update and still the same issue, it's been a month or longer starting to think this won't be fixed total bs

theres a message saying cannot connect, download episodes...again. So I updated the app and it put me back to lvl 705 or something. Can you fix please?? I will give 5 stars. I was at level 1200 or so I think

Great game, however with the last update it will not let me move past level 705 even though I am on a level in the 1400's. It keeps saying it cannot connect and that I need to go online to update episodes.

descriptionHTML:
Start playing Candy Crush Soda Saga today - already enjoyed by millions of players around the world!

Candy Crush Soda Saga is the divine puzzle game from King, the makers of Candy Crush Saga, Farm Heroes Saga and more! Switch and match candies to create 3 in a row, or match 4 (or more) to make delicious special candies! Complete the goals before you run out of moves to progress through deliciously fun levels. It's that simple!

Switch and match scrumptious candies to make mouth-watering combinations and play challenging game modes brimming with purple soda and Candy Bears! Take on this Sodalicious Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Candy Crush Soda Saga is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

New Candy Crush Soda Saga features: 

* Over 1000 Sodalicious levels
* New Game Modes include:
Soda – switch bottles and candies to release purple soda and save the Candy Bears
Frosting – match candies to smash the ice and set the Candy Bears free
Honey – match candies next to the honey to release the trapped Candy Bears
* Scrumptious new candies and sublime new combinations:
Match 4 candies in a square to make a Swedish Fish
Match 7 candies to create the remarkable Coloring Candy
* Explore juicy new environments and meet the kookiest characters
* Mouth-watering new graphics, Candy Crush never looked so tasty
* Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master
* For players that Facebook Connect, there are leaderboards for you and your friends to compare your Sodalicious scores
* Easily sync the game between mobile and tablet devices and unlock the full game features when connected to the internet

This mouth-watering puzzle adventure will instantly quench your thirst for fun. Join Kimmy on her juicy journey to find Tiffi, by switching and matching your way through new dimensions of magical gameplay. Take on this Sodalicious Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Are you already a fan of the new Candy Crush Soda Saga?  If so then visit our website, like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:

www.candycrushsodasaga.com
facebook.com/CandyCrushSodaSaga 
twitter.com/CandyCrushSodaSaga

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Candy Crush Soda Saga!

King.com Limited
Aragon Business Centre, Level 4, Dragonara Road, St Julians STJ3140, Malta

comments: (REAL REVIEW! NOT A PAID REVIEWER) Really enjoying the game. It's a good time killer. Some levels are a lot of fun and actually require a little bit of skill. The only thing keeping me from giving it 5 stars is there are way too many ads. It will randomly make you watch a video to upgrade your ride or character, and/or to play a level. There's been a few times where I had enough tickets to play, and coins to upgrade my character the two points recommended, and I had to watch a video for all three. Three ads before you can even play a level is ridiculous. I understand that it's a big part of making money for the developers, but I've never had a free game with this many ads. Get rid of some of the ads and I'll gladly update my review to 5 stars.
