descriptionHTML:
Welcome, Doctor! We've been waiting for you. Everything is prepared for you to take over and start cultivating bacteria to initiate BACTERIAL TAKEOVER!

We will start by taking over the smallest planets and move on to more difficult ones with a larger population and stronger infection resistance. We will need billions, trillions, quadrillion and even more bacteria to attack these planets. Which means your expertise in expanding and upgrading our bacterial colonies will be irreplaceable!

Build colonies, buy upgrades and generate bacteria on your own till you have enough to destroy planets and discover new powerful mutations! Remember that Plague is caused by the bacteria and it is our strength.

When i was building on that high score, the screen glitched and swiped a number of times, ruining the order of the numbers. This has happened on multiple occasions only in this app. It's not such a big problem for people that are newer, but when you've got big numbers, such as 8192, it makes the game unplayable.
description: - The classic 2048 puzzle is a fun, addictive and a very simple number puzzle game. You join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile! - This 2048 game is an upgraded version of the current popular 2048 game. This is a super 2048 puzzle, it supports classic (4x4), big (5x5), bigger (6x6) and huge (8x8) board sizes. Be ready for a new challenge! HOW TO PLAY: Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one. When 2048 tile is created, the player wins! 8 .. 16 ... 1024 .. 2048. To access Leaderboard, you will have to sign in using google plus account.FEATURES- Classic (4x4), big (5x5), bigger (6x6) and huge (8x8) board options!- Super 2048 Plus puzzle game- Keep playing for High-score after collected 2048 tile- Game is automatically saved- One Undo move support- Beautiful and simple UI- High score- Leaderboard- Completely native implementation
descriptionHTML:
- The classic 2048 puzzle is a fun, addictive and a very simple number puzzle game. You join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile!

descriptionHTML:
Teil 2 des beliebten Spiele-Klassikers Galgenmännchen oder Galgenspiel ist da!

Errate das vorgegebene Wort bevor der Galgen aufgebaut ist und rette das kleine Männchen.
Vermutlich kennt jeder das Spiel aus der Schulzeit und hat schon die ein oder andere langweilige Minute damit überbrückt.

Die beliebte Galgenmännchen App wurde komplett überarbeitet.
Neues Design, bessere Performance, mehr Wörter, neue Animationen, Erfolge und vieles vieles mehr...

# KATEGORIEN #
🌟 Berufe
🌟 Comics
🌟 Computer
🌟 Deutsche Städte
🌟 Film
🌟 Fußball
🌟 Geschichte
🌟 Körper
🌟 Länder
🌟 Marken
🌟 Mode
🌟 Musiker
🌟 Nahrung
🌟 Namen
🌟 Naturwissenschaften / Labor
🌟 Pflanzen
🌟 Promis
🌟 Religion
🌟 Sport
🌟 Städte
🌟 Süßigkeiten
🌟 Tiere

# MULTIPLAYER #
🌟 2-4 Spieler

Spiele gegen deine Freunde im Multiplayermodus. Bis zu 4 Spieler können an einem Gerät spielen und sich messen.

Weitere Updates werden folgen mit neuen Kategorien, neuen Wörtern und anderen coolen neuen Features.

Das Worträtsel ist ausschließlich für deutschsprachige Leute geeignet oder für diejenige, die die deutsche Sprache und Rechtschreibung gerne erlernen möchten. Die kostenlose Galgenmännchen App ist komplett auf Deutsch und für Kinder aber auch Erwachsene geeignet. Das Rätselspiel beinhaltet außerdem einen Multiplayer-Modus. Hier können bis zu vier Spieler gemeinsam Spaß beim Erraten von Begriffen haben. Nachweislich ist Lernen durch Spielen das bestmögliche Lernverfahren und deshalb ist die App optimal geeignet um Deutsch zu lernen und das Gehirn zu trainieren. Durch das tägliche Gehirntraining kannst du deine Stärken und Schwächen in der Rechtschreibung und Wortgewandtheit steigern.
Die App ist für Kinder, Jugendliche und Erwachsene konzipiert, um das Erlernen oder Auffrischen der eigenen Rechtschreibfähigkeiten zu gewährleisten. Durch spielerisches Lernen wird damit nicht nur das Gehirn von Kindern und deren logische Denkfähigkeit trainiert, sondern kann ebenfalls für Erwachsene zu der ein oder anderen guten Erkenntnis führen, wenn es um die deutsche Sprache und Rechtschreibung geht. Außerdem entdeckst du vielleicht auch einen Begriff, der in deinem Vokabular noch nicht vorhanden ist und kannst diesen direkt nachschlagen. Galgenmännchen ist also eine Mischung aus Worträtsel- und Sprachspiel mit dem du kein schlechtes Gewissen haben musst, dass du deine Zeit verschwendest, da du dein Gehirn anstrengst und somit trainierst.
Spiele mit deinen Freunden in der Schule, auf dem Pausenhof, in den Schulferien oder im Schulbus und erfinde Wörter, die deine Schulfreunde erraten müssen und lerne dabei auch noch etwas, womit du intelligenter wirst. Rocke die Schule und habe Spaß mit deinen Schulfreunden. Mit Galgenmännchen spielst du nicht nur ein Spiel, du lernst außerdem für die Schule und deinen späteren Beruf. Viele vergessen, dass Bildung der Schlüssel zur Bekämpfung von Not und Elend ist und deshalb kann nur nahe gelegt werden, dass sich jeder jeden Tag etwas Zeit nehmen sollte, um etwas schlauer zu werden.

# ANLEITUNG #
Beim Galgenraten hast du das gesamte Alphabet zur Verfügung, um ein Wort zu erraten. Ist der geklickte Buchstabe nicht im Wort enthalten, baut sich ein Galgen auf. Gelingt es dir das Wort zu erraten bevor sich der Galgen vollständig aufgebaut hat, gewinnst du. Viel Spaß beim lustigen Wortspiel Galgenmännchen!
Im Mehrspieler-Modus werden abwechselnd Begriffe eingegeben, die die Mitspieler zu erraten haben.

# SUPPORT #
Zögert nicht mit Verbesserungsvorschlägen oder neuen Wörtern. Schreibt einfach an support@nextwebgeneration.de oder besucht die Facebook Seite:
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Galgenmännchen/145954518860869

# BERECHTIGUNGEN #
Die Berechtigungen werden ausschließlich zur Einblendung von Werbung und für die Möglichkeit die Werbeeinblendungen durch einen In-App-Kauf zu entfernen, benötigt.
Galgenmännchen steht kostenlos zur Verfügung.

Viel Spaß beim kostenlosen Quiz, Rätsel und Lernspaß für Kinder und Erwachsene.

Made in Germany :-)

comments: Cute game, but not without it's flaws. I forgot the reasons I deleted the game in the past, but remember them now. It drains your battery, the life refresh time is high (20 minutes) and starting at a certain level (30) you really can't progress WITHOUT friends (this is not a positive for everyone. I personally don't like it), or money, or a ton of patience. You need keys to progress. You can either buy, ask friends, or play for one every FOUR HOURS. This is the exact point where I uninstalled the game last time.

I would taste this game higher if the only way you could progress wasn't by having to purchase extras. Having to waste all my extras to get through a gate with 3 keys sucks and so does knowing that really the only way through is to buy your way through.

I have enjoyed this game immensely up until level 240. In this level, rated HARD, there are most often no options to make strings and you're stuck with only strings of 3 of just plain air. When you see the game itself changing the color of treats several times during one game to give you a move, you know you're not imagining that this level is designed to screw you over into making fruitless purchases to overcome it.

I'm uninstalling game! I was really happy with game when I started,  now there is an ad every next life and sometimes more! Same ad over and over, enough to drive you CRAZY! Also you can't answer quick text or do anything off screen without the game totally rebooting,  it's supposed to be relaxing to play on phone,  NOT IRRITATING!

Why bother having an X on the Level Rush notification if it doesn't work so you have to press Begin and wait for the animation to finish before you can carry on with claiming the Daily Challenge. Also 'play with friends' on the tournament never does anything. Otherwise fun.

I have to uninstall. I love it, but it gets to the point that you cannot win.  So disappointed!!!!! I will say, this game has the very best customer service of any game I have ever played. Every single time, they go above and beyond. It's so sad when it becomes so frustrating that you can't keep playing a game that you love. I've spent b money trying to keep it fun, but I can't do b it anymore :(

descriptionHTML:
Simon’s Cat in Crunch Time! - a Match 3 puzzle adventure
Published by Strawdog.

The devilish crows have swiped Simon’s Cat’s favourite Tasty Treats and only YOU can help him find them!

Join Simon’s Cat, Maisy, Chloe and Jazz, and a cast of determined kitties on a colourful adventure through some pawsome new places where Treats are just waiting to be eaten.
Be ready to collect Tasty Treats, fight off big baddies and befriend a host of animal critters in this FREE puzzle game with added CATitude!

Simple and addictive puzzle gameplay! Connect the same coloured Treats to make a delicious chain!

Play your way through the neighbourhood in six different game modes and hundreds of challenging levels!

Challenge your friends! Can you beat your friends purrfect high score?
Can you beat the villains? Use your Treats and special boosters to fight off Sir Royston the Pug, Mr Potts, hungry hedgehogs and even a treat crazed vacuum cleaner!
Play with Simon’s Cat featuring brand new animations

Simon's Cat is the internet’s most mischievous cat and has become a global phenomenon. Star of over 60 films, which have been watched over 870 million times, and winner of several major industry awards, Simon's Cat has captured the hearts of a worldwide audience.

We are working hard to update the game with new levels that are purrfectly crafted and will leave you feline great!

description: Prepare yourself for a battle unlike any other when you enter the 3D world of Rescue Robots Survival Games. Constant challenges await you in this fast-paced game where you must overcome every obstacle and overpower every enemy in your quest to dominate the playing field. Unlock an arsenal of powerful army-grade weapons as you progress. Use your ammo wisely and take care of your health as an onslaught of enemies are poised to strike around every corner. It is up to you to save the blocky universe from a mass invasion.After the nations outlaw nuclear, biological and chemical weapons, the military develops a new way to obliterate enemies: thousand-foot robots. The mechanical marvels work wonders, until it becomes discovered that these automatons can use raw materials from the world around them to build duplicates of themselves. Suddenly these robots where were once allies, have turned on the humans and now a new war rages. The government has called upon their every reserve and still these new enemies have refused defeat, wreaking havoc on the cities of the world.You are the world's last hope‚Äì you, the engineer who brought these monsters to life. Only you know the secret to triumph over these deadly droids. Avenging your fallen comrades, you embark on an epic journey to protect your planet from these foes and the take-over they plot. This will be no easy task, it will take all of your skills, lightning fast reflexes and quick thinking to battle your way to victory. Expect hard hitting fights and double the action as you tear through waves of enemy bots in this addictive combination running and action-shooting combat game where survival is everything. Prepare yourself, this FPS showdown is about to begin.

comments: I have loved Hot Wheels for years and this is a good game. Fun and challenging. However I have been a bit frustrated because sometimes I just explode for touching a wall like on level 6. Awesomeüòí Not to mention I sometimes just hit a ramp and don't reach the end and fall into a void. Also fix your Poppa Wheelie's handling. You killed it, literally. Just try and fix your game a bit and I will give a 5.

Horrendous abuse of in game ads like I've never seen before in an app. At some points, you literally cannot proceed until you open the play store. The game races are short balancing acts wherein you simply try to keep your car on its wheels. Do not download, and do not let your kids start playing.

Game is good graphics are also good but it tends to get crash several times when I played it. I have a moto g5 plus phone with 4gb ram and adreno 508 GPU and all the games played very smoothly in my phone even asphalt 8 also ,i don't think so it's my phone who is not handling the game so there should be some bugs in this game  please fix as soon as possible.

The game is my little boys favourite but the recent batch of adverts in game (Yahoo specifically) don't close - meaning you have to force quit the game. Lazy programming and terrible QA process from the developers. Avoid.

Whoever decided to put the HW Poppa wheelie in the game is an idiot. Loved this game until i came across that car. Im seconds away from fully upgrading and moving on but i couldnt let it go. That car is a load of frustration.

Yahoo ad is obnoxious!  The only way off the ad screen is to ap store, the x in the corner does nothing, closing app store without installing=back to ad.  Only way to kill ad is to close game and lose anything you had going.  That gets you a minute or so of pretty good game before you run intk the yahoo ad again...im uninstalling...too bad because the game is pretty fun.

description: Peppa's Paintbox is a drawing application designed specially for Peppa fans! It brings together traditional drawing tools and some magical surprises that little ones will love. You can draw straight onto canvas or choose a background or character to color in. Peppa and George will pop in from time to time to see how you are getting on and once you are done drawing, you can have your very own exhibition at Peppa's school! Features: 7 paintbrush colors 7 paint tin colors 39 character and prop stickers 10 animated stickers 6 magical drawing tools 3 Peppa backgrounds 3 characters to color in Eraser Choose to play with Peppa or George Exhibition space on the wall at Peppa's school Save your drawing to camera roll No adverts, no in-app purchases, just lots of painting fun!

description: This is a collection of singleplayer / multiplayer games which can be played by 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, or even as many as 6 players on the same device (smartphone of tablet). Each of the games has very simple rules and is easy to pick up. You don't need wifi or the internet because this game is for offline, local multiplayer.You can play the games with random people on a dance party, or use them as icebreaker in awkward situations like your first date. The app is also ideal for married couples to play together, for brothers and sisters, kids and parents, and for friends to pass the time. For some reason, these two player games tend to get very competitive and funny.Each of the games is a two player game with extra modes for 3, 4, 5 and 6 players. The more people playing together, the more fun! But if you have no one around to play with, you can also play alone in the 1-player mode to train your skills for your later victories when you play with your friends.We've got mini-games here with unique rules, but also re-makes of famous mobile hits. They are all adapted to the crazy requirement of letting up to 6 players play on the same screen. For example:- multiplayer endless runner- multiplayer birds with flapping wings- platform jumping game- 3-in-a-row with Tic-Tac-Toe like rules- crossing a busy road together- bingo- a strategy game where you send armies to capture castles (has nasty AI in single-player)- football / soccer (close to Pong and hockey)- a multiplayer version of the 1024/2048 puzzle- tapping only your own tiles- balloon poppingWe regularly add new mini-games. Stay tuned for updates and recommend this game to your friends!By installing the game you agree to privacy policy of Google (AdMob): https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/privacy and Unity (Unity Analytics): https://unity3d.com/legal/privacy-policy
descriptionHTML:
This is a collection of singleplayer / multiplayer games which can be played by 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, or even as many as 6 players on the same device (smartphone of tablet). Each of the games has very simple rules and is easy to pick up. You don't need wifi or the internet because this game is for offline, local multiplayer.

You can play the games with random people on a dance party, or use them as icebreaker in awkward situations like your first date. The app is also ideal for married couples to play together, for brothers and sisters, kids and parents, and for friends to pass the time. For some reason, these two player games tend to get very competitive and funny.

Each of the games is a two player game with extra modes for 3, 4, 5 and 6 players. The more people playing together, the more fun! But if you have no one around to play with, you can also play alone in the 1-player mode to train your skills for your later victories when you play with your friends.

We've got mini-games here with unique rules, but also re-makes of famous mobile hits. They are all adapted to the crazy requirement of letting up to 6 players play on the same screen. For example:

- multiplayer endless runner
- multiplayer birds with flapping wings
- platform jumping game
- 3-in-a-row with Tic-Tac-Toe like rules
- crossing a busy road together
- bingo
- a strategy game where you send armies to capture castles (has nasty AI in single-player)
- football / soccer (close to Pong and hockey)
- a multiplayer version of the 1024/2048 puzzle
- tapping only your own tiles
- balloon popping

We regularly add new mini-games. Stay tuned for updates and recommend this game to your friends!

By installing the game you agree to privacy policy of Google (AdMob): https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/privacy and Unity (Unity Analytics): https://unity3d.com/legal/privacy-policy
summary: A bundle of games which 1 to 6 players can play on the same device.
title: 2 Player Games Free

descriptionHTML:
Help your people! Join the fight against the Skeleton Boss, and become the best hero in the dungeons.

Live a real adventure with this online Action MMORPG game. Enjoy Dungeon Legends for free, and discover an endless world of battles, quests, and epic creatures.

Dungeon Legends is a hack & slash game optimized for mobile devices. A classic ARPG experience adapted to touch screens.

Fight against other players in the pvp multiplayer modes like the Arena, and become a legend of the dungeons. Go over the dungeons looking for incredible adventures, and legendary treasures, or ask for help to overcome the quests of the online cooperative multiplayer mode. Join a clan and fight the most epic battles to conquer the dungeons.

Adapt your hero to your gameplay. Turn your Dwarf into an epic warrior, a healer, a hunter or a protector. Train your hero in the adventure quests, and fight other heroes in the online pvp multiplayer arena.

🐲 BUILD YOUR OWN ADVENTURE
It was a long time ago, but Dwarfs remember the Skeleton Boss. He attacked the villages with his army of goblins, skeletons, trolls, and balrogs. But Dwarfs do not surrender, they fear nothing, and they cooperated to hunt their enemies, and battle that army.
Dwarfs defeated the Skeleton Boss, and force him to hide in the ancient Dungeons.

Now, the Skeleton Boss is back.

He is summoning an army to leave his prison, and take revenge on the Dwarfs.
The Skeleton Boss is waiting in his throne, deep in the Dungeons.The only hope for the Dwarfs is to find him, cooperate, and hunt him before he recovers his power.

🔮DISCOVER AN ENDLESS ADVENTURE RPG GAME
Each quest in this Action RPG is unique. Unleash your arcane powers, and hack and slash the evil creatures with a good strategy to obtain legendary rewards. Hunt the evil in the campaign or take part on the multiplayer battles onlines.

⚔️ FIGHT IN THE ONLINE MULTIPLAYER ARENA
Fight epic PvP battles with other heroes, or the online multiplayer modes. Enter the arena alone or with friends, and prove you are the best evil hunter in the dungeons.

🏆 PARTICIPATE IN PVE/PVP EVENTS
Help your fellows dwarves in the PvE events, and compete with them in the PvP battles. Each week there is a new opportunity to prove yourself as the best dwarf.

🎮 ENJOY A TRUE ACTION RPG GAME
This mmorpg controls are designed for touch screens. Hack & Slash game mechanics adapted to mobile devices.

🎁SHARE YOUR ADVENTURES ONLINE
Explore the online multiplayer coop adventures with your friends. Cooperate with other epic heroes online to complete the hardest quests or fight against them in the online multiplayer PvP arena.

⭐️ AWESOME FEATURES:
- Play a true Action RPG adventure
- Enjoy the Hack & Slash mechanics
- Fight in epic multiplayer battles against other heroes online
- Join other heroes to complete the online coop quests
- Play PvP fights in the dungeons
- Participate in weekly PvE events
- Team up with your friends in the online coop adventure
- PvE events, PvP battles, online multiplayer battles, and coop battles can be played for free

If you are looking for a new hack & slash game and mobile action rpg game, this mmorpg adventure game will be your new favourite RPG, action MMO, online RPG, and PvP game. Will you be the best dwarf? Be prepared for amazing boss battles, legendary online PvE quests, coop multiplayer levels full of action, and a new world full of arcane magic.

Please note:
- This epic MMORPG game is free to play, but in-apps items can be purchased with real money. To restrict in-app purchases adjust the settings on your device.
- Dungeon Legends is an online ARPG game, and requires an Internet connection to play.

---

Join the Official Forum: http://forum.codigames.com

descriptionHTML:
Help the rolling ball escape the traps and unlock featured themes.
An addictive thrilling game “Scrolling Ball in Sky” landing on Google Play market now. The future door opens for you from the moment you tap on the screen.
The game features:
● Unique gameplay: help the balls rolling farther and farther away by swiping left or right.
● 3D scene design combined with rock music brings you addictive pleasure.
● Exciting levels: volcano scapes, city scape, desert scape, garden scape and rolling sky scape etc.!
● Fantastic balls: discover all the secrets it holds by rolling balls, or equips in rainbow shop.
● Invite your Facebook friends to challenge your unbeaten record!
Be attention to the roll ball story, you may get a chance to play spin wheel to obtain an unexpected surprise. Do not indulge in the game or you may costs 24 hours in rolling the balls. Very easy to play but very hard to reach the top records!
Scrolling Ball in Sky is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's Restrictions menu.

descriptionHTML:
Get Bomber Friends now and join the immensely hectic and fun online multiplayer game! Bomb your friends and be the last to survive to win the match!
Collect powerups to get more powerful bombs! Use the explosive bombs to blast your friends from across the map!
And don't worry if you get blasted, then the fun has just begun! Dead bombers can haunt the living players and make their play harder with curses!

Game Features:
- Online multiplayer for 2-8 players! Challenge your friends or play against random opponents.
- Campaign mode with over 300 levels! Find your way through 6 different worlds full of devious monsters!
- Classic Bomber style gameplay, with controls polished for touchscreen!
- Collect powerups and watch out for evil curses.
- Customize your bomber man or woman with cool hats, taunts, and greetings!
- Different bombs to blast the enemies to smithereens.
- Includes google play achievements and leaderboards.
- Bomber Friends has universal game controller support!
- Supports Android TV!

Have fun!

*Important message: This game includes in-app purchases. You can set up password protection for in-app purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app.*

comments: I play this game regularly, and I enjoy the differing modes available. You can play happily without paying for any additional content, however at higher levels paying will help you progress. By this time you will have poured hours into it, so I do not think it is unreasonable. Save your gold until later levels (player level 15+) and you can get by without in game purchases for quite a while.

I'm rating this high because I've played it before and I absolutely love it. However, I cannot currently trying get it to load. I get the initial splash screen and it says 'Building camp...' The loading bar fills and then.... Nothing. It just hangs there forever. I've tried clearing cache and reinstalling. Any ideas? I'd love to play again.

I absolutely love this game. Turn based tactics are one of my favourite types of games. Since playing the game more I've decided that there's not enough gas for me to be able to enjoy the game like I want to. I think the car should either hold more, or gas should be easier to get. This is just a game that already has inconsistencies with reality. Otherwise I love the game

Just loved it... I am at council level 18 now... Weapon upgrade xp cost should be reduced or just remove workshop. No use of WORKSHOP with such high xp cost because its REASONABLE to upgrade your SURVIVOR than their WEAPONS.... Please for next update reduce weapon upgrade cost....

I have this game, and I play this more than watching the actual show. You can bring together a motley crew of survivors for missions and get gear to make them stronger. Build a camp, in order to multiply resources, because you will need them to improve other buildings. Also, to note, this game will not allow you to get stronger unless you improve your camp. I have survivors who cannot level up until I Improve the council. The training grounds will not be built any further unless you improve the council. Its like a city/fort building game with tactical rpg feel to it.  There is a leaderboard, that actually awards you for being at a certain tier. You can join guilds to help get better gear. I love this game!  ...The con that I have with this is that every time of logging on, deals are thrown in my face, and it is enticing too.

I've been playing this game for two years now and I can never put it down. It's such an amazing game. I'd like it even more though if the characters we originally fell in love with were available. Like Andrea, T-Dog, Lori, etc.

descriptionHTML:
Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!

The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle.

• FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat
• COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission
• HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards

“Throw in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.” - Pocketgamer

“Each aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.” - Mashable

“Imagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC’s The Walking Dead. That’s No Man’s Land in a nutshell.” - Gamezebo

For more, please visit:

http://www.facebook.com/thewalkingdeadnomansland

comments: The game is alright. Still too early to give it a proper review. Only here to say that the timers are way too long in the early stages of the game. Waiting an hour or four for thirty seconds of gameplay. They need to work on scaling the progression timers. A game like this is okay with long timers in late game when you have more than one thing to keep track of. But for these pay to win games to be profitable it helps to bait the hook a little harder before making you wait hours for more content.

It's rare I would spend money on a game for my phone but on this one I tried.  Good news is I saved the money and didn't because I can't.  I wanted to buy gems to get the goblin and the store isn't working the customer support links don't work and the main reason for the bad  review is because I emailed them and never heard back. Hate to think how they would treat us after they get our money if the customer service is this bad before they get it.

This game is a solid mix of "clash of clans" and "fallout shelter". Just like COC, you have to learn to let the timers cool off. The long term time investment can be very rewarding. The questing/pvp is also well done considering you can't choose what to attack or when during battle. Wholeheartedly a good game.

Would be a great game if it wasn't blatantly pay to win.  Everything in the game is designed to push you to pay.  I enjoyed it at first and usually toss about $15 since it was decent.   But then, the system pairs you with opponents you can't defeat which then hampers your progress greatly which then means you either pay or hope you don't get attacked too much and lose all your resources.

This is cheat to win, honest people paying still loose  There are so many people cheating, especially the top in clan. they all cheat and use scripts and developer company doesn't even care, they just care rip off more money, and cheaters owns in this game and all the resources. Developers keep those cheaters around just force regular people to pay more money

Tournaments are terrible if you have 500k power 90% of people in the tournoment will have 800k power . If you have 600k others have 900k. I played 136 tournaments and only won 3rd place 3 times and 90% of the time i was 10+ (from 14 people) . Absolutely pay to win. But still fun
description: Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress! Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they‚Äôll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies‚Äô castles! All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who‚Äôll soon grow up and serve you too! Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game: - Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy ‚Äì the end justifies the means! - Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You‚Äôve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now! - Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes‚Ä¶ and then swap them with each other! - Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don‚Äôt like‚Ä¶ And you don‚Äôt like all of them, right?We are now working on:- Clans: Join an exciting cooperative gameplay! Create clans together with other players, talk in chat, develop you kingdoms, train your champions, conquer territories and dominate other kingdoms.- Portals and mazes: even more options to earn unique chests with precious rewards. New enemies, new bosses and new territories!- Caravans: if you are tired of war, go into business!- The extension of the storyline campaign: get to the chief villain and triumph over the universal evil!- Collections and unique heroes- Daily log-in bonuses- The improvement of the visual elements of the game- The optimization and balance of the game process- Performance improvementsAll of these and many other innovations are waiting for you in the upcoming updates!
descriptionHTML:
Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress!

Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they’ll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies’ castles!

All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who’ll soon grow up and serve you too!


Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game:

- Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy – the end justifies the means!
- Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You’ve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now!
- Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes… and then swap them with each other!
- Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don’t like… And you don’t like all of them, right?

We are now working on:
- Clans: Join an exciting cooperative gameplay! Create clans together with other players, talk in chat, develop you kingdoms, train your champions, conquer territories and dominate other kingdoms.
- Portals and mazes: even more options to earn unique chests with precious rewards. New enemies, new bosses and new territories!
- Caravans: if you are tired of war, go into business!
- The extension of the storyline campaign: get to the chief villain and triumph over the universal evil!
- Collections and unique heroes
- Daily log-in bonuses
- The improvement of the visual elements of the game
- The optimization and balance of the game process
- Performance improvements
All of these and many other innovations are waiting for you in the upcoming updates!
developerAddress: Barbara Strozzilaan 201, 1083 HN in Amsterdam
recentChanges: Fixed bugs and improved game performance
summary: Your castle, your rules!
title: Hustle Castle: Fantasy Kingdom

Get ready for some babysitter madness, with newborn baby cuties and baby twins. First days are hectic! Baby care takes a lot of work! Let’s hope these adorable babies like you! You’ll have such a blast babysitting. Feed them, play with them, give them baths, and more, in this crazy fun kids game!

These adorable newborn baby cuties and baby twins are so lucky - they’ve got the best babysitter in the world - yes, YOU!!!
The little ones are in need of a super babysitter. Let’s see if you got what it takes! You’ll need to take care of them and do everything you can to keep them happy. But don’t worry - baby care is hard work, but also SO much fun! Enjoy this fabulous kids game, and become a babysitting pro!

comments: Maybe add an option to disable some graphics. Like the fimish animation. It does not add much to the game experience but it affects the performance quite a bit.  About the ads: I have premium, and I only have to watch an ad if I choose to get a reward in return. There are no sudde, unwanted or random ads anymore.

Simple game. Ads galore. Also when ads pop up better not be listening to music because it's gonna pause your music even if the ad has 0 sound. Thus the one star rating. You can advertise all you want but don't interrupt any background apps to force me to look at your ad. That's just messed up.

Not the most challenging game but its okay if you need something to do on the toilet. Unfortunately there is only ONE menu to open for the entire game and every time you click on it you are forced to watch an advert. EVERY TIME!!! i wouldnt give this game 5 stars in a hurry but the constant bombardment of adverts kills what would otherwise be a far mkre decent game.  Side note: yes i know there is a premium version which is basically the same game but without ads. This isnt a game i would spend money on and definately not (at least to me) worth killing with adverts.

Potential to be a great game but wayyyy to many ads, like every 10 seconds of gameplay there's a 30 second ad, and when you choose to watch an ad to get a reward you never actually get it. Waste of time. No idol earnings so you have to have the app open to advance and forces you to watch more ads.i get you want to make money but this app is basically unplayable.

First of all the game it self is a great little game. Graphics are fine game play is simple and easy to pick up it's a good game. Now for the reason it only gets two stars. WAY TO MANY ADS! I mean for f@$k sake every two seconds there's an ad. Click on the car buying button there's an ad. Sit there to long there's an ad. I understand this is how you make your money but come on there's a line and you didn't just cross it you swan dived over that bad boy. I'm sorry but I do not recommended this game for anyone.

Far too many ads. And being forced to watch a 30 sec ad before continuing! Sorry, uninstalling. Try banner ads only, and I will play this game for ages. Now you won't make any more money out of me. Also, look at the reviews, you obviously haven't got a clue about what irritates people.

description: Enjoy one of the best free First Person Shooters that will challenge your skills and help you to become a master of the block survival world.If you are young and fragile, expecting a fairytale, this is not a game for you‚Ä¶ We need heroes, warriors that master their skills through difficulties, always ready for the ultimate battle!**** TRUTH IS CHALLENGED****Enter a corrupt world where an evil government is working with the so-called New Intelligence, who have made an illegal alliance. Play as the hero in an explosive solo campaign where officials are covering up the truth about the dangers of guns, and the freedom of thought and religion have been all but been banned. **** YOUR MISSION ****The world is immersed in war and the fight for victory has begun, but to conquer, you must navigate the dangers of the armed enemies, who carry high-grade military weaponry and shoot to kill without a thought. It is up to you to protect the innocent and destroy those who have brainwashed the foot soldiers to obey commands without question!**** INTENSE BATTLES ****Battle your way through the edge of survival in a challenging life and death struggle as you navigate enemy territory and face aggressive mobs. Uncover hidden weapons to add to your arsenal as you move through stunning retro-styled pixel-art levels! The dramatic intensity of this undertaking is an adventure like no other, as you struggle in the fight to save the population before they are annihilated by the snipers and assault rifles of the enemy. See and feel the action while you bring down this conspiracy from the inside. You are the last guardian, unaffected by the new world‚Äôs lies. It is up to you to be the hero your people need. Don‚Äôt trust no one, you don‚Äôt have friends here, don‚Äôt get fooled by anyone.**** AN AMAZING EXPERIENCE, FROM START TO FINISH ****Hear the roar of your gun as you see another enemy defeated, always moving towards your goal! With the world at stake, Diverse Block Survival Game is difficult to put down! Battle through stunning levels while choosing from among twelve weapons collected as you play!What are you waiting for? Save the world, one block at a time!
descriptionHTML:
Enjoy one of the best free First Person Shooters that will challenge your skills and help you to become a master of the block survival world.

If you are young and fragile, expecting a fairytale, this is not a game for you… We need heroes, warriors that master their skills through difficulties, always ready for the ultimate battle!

**** TRUTH IS CHALLENGED****
Enter a corrupt world where an evil government is working with the so-called New Intelligence, who have made an illegal alliance. Play as the hero in an explosive solo campaign where officials are covering up the truth about the dangers of guns, and the freedom of thought and religion have been all but been banned.

**** YOUR MISSION ****
The world is immersed in war and the fight for victory has begun, but to conquer, you must navigate the dangers of the armed enemies, who carry high-grade military weaponry and shoot to kill without a thought.

It is up to you to protect the innocent and destroy those who have brainwashed the foot soldiers to obey commands without question!

**** INTENSE BATTLES ****
Battle your way through the edge of survival in a challenging life and death struggle as you navigate enemy territory and face aggressive mobs. Uncover hidden weapons to add to your arsenal as you move through stunning retro-styled pixel-art levels!

The dramatic intensity of this undertaking is an adventure like no other, as you struggle in the fight to save the population before they are annihilated by the snipers and assault rifles of the enemy.

See and feel the action while you bring down this conspiracy from the inside. You are the last guardian, unaffected by the new world’s lies.

It is up to you to be the hero your people need. Don’t trust no one, you don’t have friends here, don’t get fooled by anyone.

**** AN AMAZING EXPERIENCE, FROM START TO FINISH ****
Hear the roar of your gun as you see another enemy defeated, always moving towards your goal!
With the world at stake, Diverse Block Survival Game is difficult to put down! Battle through stunning levels while choosing from among twelve weapons collected as you play!

What are you waiting for? Save the world, one block at a time!
summary: Enjoy one of the best free First Person Shooters
title: Diverse Block Survival Game

descriptionHTML:
Cute baby panda Lu goes to an amusement park with adorable animal friends! Ride a carousel and fun carnival rides, visit a spooky haunted house, eat sweet treats and take photos with the cutest owl, penguin, bear and turtle!

Enjoy the magic of the colorful unicorn themed Carousel and take an exciting ride on the Ferris Wheel. It is so high you can reach the stars! Ride the park’s famous Roller Coaster and see what the highest speed you can handle is! The faster, the more fun, right?

Visit a mysterious witch’s house full of spiders, ghosts and pumpkin lanterns! Find your animal friends: they are hiding in unexpected places to scare you. Play Space Defender at the Arcade: fight with aliens and protect your spaceship! Spin the Lucky Wheel to win toys, tasty treats and other surprises!

Take a break: enjoy yummy candy apples with your friends! Choose glitter frostings and decorate them with colorful sprinkles. Time to take some cool pictures at the Photo Booth! Dress up panda Lu in adorable outfits, add fun accessories and choose a background.

Enjoy the most fun amusement park adventures with baby panda Lu:
· Have fun at the Carousel!
· Ride the super fast Roller Coaster!
· Enjoy the view from the Ferris Wheel!
· Visit the spooky Haunted House!
· Spin the Lucky Wheel to win exciting prizes!
· Decorate yummy candy apples!
· Visit the Photo Booth: dress up panda Lu in cute outfits and choose a background!
· Watch funny videos for kids to collect bonus coins!
· Explore the fun park every day, get rewards and unlock exciting items!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

ABOUT TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through the games they love. Dress up games can develop creativity and art skills, cleanup games build good every day habits, cooking games show how to help parents at home, pet games teach to share and care. These are just a few examples how TutoTOONS games let children explore the world around them and develop on their screen time.

comments: I love Beat the Boss 4! But there are some things that I would like to be fixed. For example, when naming your custom boss, the name duplicates. The way to fix it is by putting spaces after it. Another example is that the boss customization screen sometimes switches back to boss selection screen and can't go back after being there for long periods of time. I would love to give this game 5 stars if these issues were fixed.

I loved it. I understand the ads are so that you can continue your work. However, there is a few probelms. First of all, when you click on the judgey/uneven eyes, they change to even eyes. Second of all, when you click on a custom character, the game doubles the name, and following along with that, sometimes it undoes it. I understand if it takes a long time, but i'm asking you, if you can, to please fix these when you can. Sorry for bothering you.      Doge is waiting

Too many ads. It's annoying especially when you are connected to the internet. The King Boss is not working and is always saying "Something went wrong, please try again later" and crashes the whole gane. On the other hand it's a super addictive and fun game to play.

I'd happily purchase this game but that doesn't seem like an option. Tge ads, especially the LOUD BLOW UP EXPLOSIONS game that go on for 30 seconds are especially annoying. I'll gladly buy it, if only to not deal with Fing ads all the Fing time!!

Game is now unplayable due to ads and KIIP rewards popups. The ads bring up my status bar so I can't X out of the ad, and the app hangs when trying to load the KIIP program. I have no interest in trying to play something that shovels ads in your face more often than you can actually play.
Recent updates have made this guy unplayable. Now you have to wait  through a 24 second ad that keeps reoccurring.  Not fun for kids and worse for their parents. Kids loved it before these updates.

descriptionHTML:
What’s your favorite holiday? Thanksgiving? Christmas? Why, it’s BLACK FRIDAY, of course!!! Get psyched - this year, you get to experience Black Friday for as long as you want and enjoy all the new fashion trends! Get ready to shop your heart out at your favorite fashion stores, to take advantage of the hottest sales at the mall, and to get your shop on in this mall world game!!! You crazy shopaholic, you!

Hey there, shopper! Your expert shopping mall skills are finally about to pay off! With this amazing shopaholic Black Friday shopping mall game, you get to shop ‘til you drop at every fashion store in the mall and find the coolest fashion trends. And don’t worry about running out of money - compete in fashion contests to win coins for you to shop with! Read, set, SHOP!

Features:
> It’s the big Black Friday shopaholic sale season - enjoy it at the mall!
> Participate in catwalk contests with other shoppers. From movie premiere to red carpet, there are so many fun fashion contest themes! Will you win first place?!
> Get incredible Black Friday discounts for you to use at your favorite fashion stores in the mall, to your heart’s desire!
> Uh-oh! All the shoppers are eyeing that last item! Get ready to fight those shopaholics so you’re the first to grab the latest fashion trends!
> So much makeup for you to try at the shopping mall! Experiment with face tattoos and a cool new eyeliner color!
> Dress up, dress up and more dress up! Buy the coolest new outfits, accessories and jewelry in awesome fashion stores like Supreme, Fashionara and Bling Me!
> Have a blast in the shopping mall photo booth! Make silly faces and keep the pictures as a crazy shopping day souvenir!
> Get supercool new fashion hairstyles at the hair salon! Maybe it’s time to dye your hair a new color!
> Come back every day to get a daily bonus! Win more money to spend, spend, spend!

comments: I absolutely love this game & all criminal case games... we need more energy faster...
It is a fun game & can be challenging.  I like to be as speedy as i can against the clock.
It's a great game. You're not bombarded with ads and energy refills at a nice pace.
Good games

This is all I needed: another Criminal Case game to take up my free time! I love the whole four of them. The the hidden objects tease my brain to no end. Each game  is intriguing with an original story line. I do have my favorite crime scenes,  and plenty of friends(all over the world) whom play as often as they can too!

It would be nice if you level up and get full energy but your energy had some if not all left before you got it restored that you just increased by the full amount, the way it is now I lose energy when levelling up because it doesnt add any more to the 110 that is standard. I dont think it is fair to those of us who play daily. I never know when my pet will find that last batch of XP and cause the level up to happen. If I am over the 110 already, I don't even see the new energy. Some concessions need to be made for this. I love the game though, it is fun and challenging.

description: One Man. One War. Now You Are The Hot Sniper Killer.*There you play the game was the fantastic 3D FPS game .As the sole surviving special forces of a renegade attack against a ruthless terrorist organization, you are stranded on the battlefield and hell-bent on payback. You must use all of your specialized skills to survive the onslaught of the enemy forces and avenge your fallen soldiers.Faced with this situation of you have no choice but to grasp the nettle.From the M16 to AK47 and sniper guns, as you have access to a variety of light and heavy weapons, as well as powerful grenade too!In the battle you will be sent to different locations to perform the difficult task.Such as IceWorld,Desert,City.Game Features:**Fight in difficult terrainYou will face different environmental challenges spacing case.But nothing can stop you to destroy the enemy's confidence.**Providing advanced weaponryMany full power firearms will be available to give a fatal blow to terrorists for you.AK47,M16,WA2000,AWP,M400.**Experience the perfect touch operationThe awesome 1rd person shooter with stunning console quality visuals, precise controls, advanced physics and destructibles. Jump in the heat of battle and push your Android device to the limit!**Complete Dangerous MissionsThe number of enemies and the AI you face are different depending on your selected tasks in each level.In short, the more the enemy killed, the more reward you get.What are you waiting for, let's take a journey and start killing.
descriptionHTML:
One Man. One War. Now You Are The Hot Sniper Killer.
*There you play the game was the fantastic 3D FPS game .As the sole surviving special forces of a renegade attack against a ruthless terrorist organization, you are stranded on the battlefield and hell-bent on payback.

You must use all of your specialized skills to survive the onslaught of the enemy forces and avenge your fallen soldiers.Faced with this situation of you have no choice but to grasp the nettle.From the M16 to AK47 and sniper guns, as you have access to a variety of light and heavy weapons, as well as powerful grenade too!In the battle you will be sent to different locations to perform the difficult task.Such as IceWorld,Desert,City.

comments: I hate the new upgrade. Spending at least 20 tokens on average players. When I can get them for 1 token sometimes in the auctions previously. Top eleven will have to change it or I'm uninstalling this app. hate the fact if you miss a match 9 times out of 10 you'll lose no matter what tactics or training you've done.

This game is indefinitely one of the worst football simulation games ever created. Idk if you guys are just a bunch of morons just naive about football. My team has the highest rating and the highest team value and yet still I'm losing to a low rate team. So pathetic. I play this game every single day and the mangers I face are not even active but they win against my team. Who wrote the algorithm for the game. Come on !! MORONS

Good game but a few things are rather annoying.  Players morale continuously goes down never up. Training expectations ruin your chances when playing 2 games in a day. And without spending money on the game you can never truly improve your team because tokens are the only way and you nevr get many tokens for free.

Transfer market is totally unacceptable. How can lower level managers come to higher level players auctions. You have right to use real photo profile? If looks like all are faint account in player transfer market.

The Bad You can play this game with others but can't add friends who are not on facebook. The reliance on facebook is almost ridiculous, there are other IDs and ways that people connect and they should be incorporated into the game. Please add a way for me to add friends by username or manager name!   The Good There are too many things to explain...the game is considerably enjoyable.   Advice I recommend limiting the amount you invest in your team in the first season, get yourself a slight competitive edge and then focus on season 2. Don't waste your tokens on speeding up buildings YOU WILL NEED THEM FOR TRANSFERS!  Enjoy the game!

Biggest problem are managers who purposely tank every season get rewarded by keeping a stronger team while managers who try to play as the game was intended get "punished" every new season. No need to spend any money on this game, just tank on purpose. The only "fair" competition is the league. Cup, champions and association tournaments are a joke infested with tankers. Worse part of all is Nordeus does nothing about it. Players lose morale regardless if they win a match, they even lose morale overnight. I played this game for over 2 years hoping it would get better. It is time to let go.

comments: The MOST AMAZING racing game in the mobile device. The gameplay, graphics, and the controls were perfect. Also, the tracks in the game were so real like I was racing in real life. I also loves the cars that were added in this game, it looks so amazing. But, what I like the most from this game was online real-time racing. There were no other racing games that has this feature. Just have suggestions, add custom race mode. In this mode, you can chose tracks, daytime, amount of opponents, and also the laps. And also enable to invite friends to custom race mode. Also, probably adding weather system will be better. Last, make the cars could do rev-bombing. So, at the start of the races, you could have some pretty good start. Although, keep it up Electronic Arts & Fire Monkeys. Hopefully, these suggestions could help the game become much better and better.

Absolutely amazing game!!! I'm a huge petrol head and this ticks all boxes considering it's a phone game. Love the controls. Personally i use accelerator on right, brake on left and tilt to turn. Feels bang on. Graphics top notch. No need to spend money to progress. Literally one downfall... upgrade costs when you get higher spec cars. Apart from that... GOOD JOB!!!

Excellent game! I have no doubt that the game is one of the most perfect games. Everything but one thing. I just ran one race that comes with the actualization and I won around 5k, te first upgrade for the camaro Nascar costs around 130k does that even make sense. In the real life if you spend that money to make a competitive car to win that money... I hope you get my meaning

Good game, good graphics,good sound. I like that it is on going, not like some similar games. I found it fairly easy to get used too. Plenty of choices and cars. I like that you are not constantly forced to spend real money in order to progress. That is a big plus for us game players. Well done all at EA, you have a real winner with this game. I personally am loving playing this game. Update, I have been playing for a few days now, the only drawback I have noticed is, the game takes up a lot of space on my device. Having said that, its so good its worth it. As previously, well done all at EA.

Well,to start off, game really speaks for itself.Everything is pretty dope. I'm just going to name some things that I'm sure most of the people wants. -Dynamic weather conditions,how amazing snow day on Bathurst would be?Rain,wind,foggy... -Breakable parts, mirrors, spoilers,even wheels,and those should be on the tarmac whole race. -Drift events, I'm just going to say,we all want it. -More hatchbacks definitely,and more cars like its Jeep,or Ford Raptor,and you can add unique cars from movies,etc. -And sprint events,point to point.How fun is that. -More mountains!!! Please. Peace!

It's a great game where you can race and customise your own car. However here are some ideas I would like you the imlament please  1. If the cars from the NASCAR can get the custmizeing like all the others.   2. To extend the custmize can yo add a tab where you can put spoilers, air intakes And other things you would put on a car.  3. Finally to make this game real racing 3 if when a race of just go to see all the car you have.  There be a "i" button that will give the player real information about the car the player is looking at.

descriptionHTML:
**#1 Top Free App in over 100 countries**

Real Racing 3 is the award-winning franchise that sets a new standard for mobile racing games – you have to play it to believe it.

This app offers in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings.

Over 200 Million Downloads!

TabbyAwards 2014 – WINNER: Best Action, Adventure, Arcade & Racing Game
Mobile Excellence Awards – WINNER: Best Mobile Game 2013
Game Connect Asia Pacific – WINNER: Game of The Year 2013, Technical Excellence, Excellence in Art
Meffy Awards – FINALIST: Best Mobile Game 2013

Real Racing 3 features an ever-expanding roster of officially licensed tracks with 39 circuits at 17 real-world locations, a 43-car grid and over 140 meticulously detailed cars from top manufacturers. Plus Real-Time Multiplayer, Social Leaderboards, Time Trials, night racing, and innovative Time Shifted Multiplayer™ (TSM) technology, allowing you to race anyone, anytime, anywhere.

**This is a resource-intensive game featuring extremely high quality visuals. Please make sure you have at least 1.5GB of free space on your device.**

PRAISE FOR REAL RACING 3
“Feels a full generation ahead of the competition” (IGN, 9.1/10, Editors’ Choice)
“A stunning visual masterpiece on mobile” (Touch Arcade)
“Sets the new standard on mobile for racing games” (Pocket Gamer, 9/10, Gold Award)

REAL CARS
Take the wheel of over 140 intensely detailed vehicles from iconic manufacturers like Ford, Ferrari, Lamborghini, Aston Martin and Mercedes-Benz and test your skills on an authentic 43-car race grid – the most epic racing experience on any handheld.

REAL TRACKS
Burn rubber on a full lineup of 17 real tracks in multiple configurations from top worldwide locations, including Silverstone, Hockenheimring, Le Mans, Dubai Autodrome and many more.

REAL PEOPLE
Go bumper to bumper with friends and rivals in global 8-player, cross-platform, real-time racing with drafting. Or drop into any race to challenge their AI-controlled versions in Time-Shifted Multiplayer™.

MORE CHOICES THAN EVER
Compete in over 4,000 events including Cup races, Eliminations and Endurance challenges. Choose from a wide range of upgrades to maximize your car’s performance. Customize your car with a huge collection of paints, vinyls and rims. View the action from a variety of camera angles, tweak the HUD and fine-tune the controls to your personal preference.

THE PREMIER RACING EXPERIENCE
Powered by the remarkable Mint™ 3 Engine, Real Racing 3 features detailed car damage, fully functioning rear view mirrors, and dynamic reflections for truly HD racing. Enjoy a rich, next-gen game with the most advanced cross-platform social and competitive racing community ever. Real Racing 3 delivers it all and pushes the boundaries with every update.

Welcome to the definitive racing experience.
__

Visit https://help.ea.com/ for assistance or inquiries.

description: Baby Ava Daily Activities is a game about learning activities of our day to day life. This game is a collection of many activities with fun tasks, which are necessary in our regular life. In this Daily Routine Activities game, there is cute and little baby Ava who requires your help to complete her daily routine activities. There are so many routine activities which are not easy for Baby Ava like proper washing of hands and face, brushing teeth, taking a bath, cutting nails, doing hair, dressing up, eating healthy food, maintaining cleanliness, maintaining sleep time and many more. This famiy educational game covers all the activities we do in our routine life. So become a babysitter in this baby care game and help baby Ava to complete these activities in a proper way and don't make her cry. This game helps Family to learn quickly daily activities with lots of fun.Key Features of Baby Ava Daily Activities game:- Quick learning game for Family- Manners of routine activities- Over 40+ daily activities- Maintaining cleanliness- Watch Ava with different moods and expressions- Read and enjoy Bedtime stories- Know How to eat food properly- Family learn everything with fun in this daycare game- Entertainment with AvaHelp your Family by giving them such a wonderful learning game that teach them, how to do their daily life activities and baby Ava will entertain them for hours.

comments: They made me misspell Rabbids, including "games" like Sword Art Online and Attack on Titan, and had obscure art that gave really bad visualization of very simple things. Just play a better trivia game. Moreover. Don't give us awful games like Unity, Watch Dogs, and League of Legends. Anime is anime. Video games are video games. Video game adaptations of anime are still, at there core, anime. Leave those out of these kinds of apps.

Overall super fun game and I'm really enjoying it, however some of these levels are really easy, and then there are others that are super challenging and nearly impossible to find out. I just wish there was a difficulty setting so you start off with easier games and then it could get harder as it progresses, because at the moment I can't pass 70% of the levels without using hints.

Legit only mobile games its not I gaming quiz. They could of at least put more console or pc games who would even know all of the mobile games out there.aswell if you don't know it you will have to watch a add that can be 1min long. You might as well just watch youtube or twitch.

Very great game, had me thinking of the gold old days of gaming. SPOILER: One issue I had was on the section of main characters where I did not sufficiently have the letters to spell Dragon Ball Xenoverse

Overall... Amazing game but some games are very obscure and others are blatant. I love these kinds of games and can't wait to see the next update, hopefully more games to guess from! I love the diversity of games though

comments: I love horses and this horse game is soooo good! Its really fun!! But I think it needs more detail like when u do dressage and jumping u use a English saddle not a western but in the game they use a western saddle, in steed. And I think that u wouldn't need to pay for different horse breeds. Overall it needs to have more realistic details.

Love it! I remember saying to myself while playing Dog Hotel "man I wish they'd make one for horses" and you did!! I love the game play, a tad bit repetitive but over-all a fantastic job. I especially love the wide range of horse breeds (the unicorn was a surprise indeed), and how easy (but not too easy) it is to get Coins. Buying the horse breed pack really isn't that expensive, a fair price, and definitely affordable. Thank you, can't wait to what else you come up with!

I live this game and hopefully you can make more improvements such as more to do. Also, I used $2.99 and bought the paddock expansion pack after I unlocked them all thinking there would be more to it and there wasn't!!  I want my money back. I'll keep the horse variety one but I want the money back regarding the expansion because there wasn't anything different after I bought it and you didn't have any kind of statement saying anything.

Really repetitive, and all the horses are so similar and everything you do is always the same. The care tasks went quickly at least, but the riding style ones were dull and long. Graphics are very nice, just not much to do.

Wow this game is awesome.  I was a lil skeptical at first.. But for a free game it's pretty great. You can do lunging, show jumping, dressage , etc. You can look after the horses that are in your hotel and do chores/missions.  Has a variety of different horses and achievements.   Really love this game. Thank you. 5 stars. ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ  I just wish there was a lil more to do as it does get boring and repetitive. ..

My fav animal is horses and all but the only 1 thing I hated about this game is. 1st I would like more to do. If y'all fix it I will give ya'll 5 stars. :D but other then that I loved it.Oh and almost forgot I never get any other color of horse except Black and Grey I would like more colors pleasess
description: Run your own Horse HotelHorseHotel makes you the owner of your own horse ranch. Take care of the horses, look after their needs, and discover exciting games, until they return to their owners happy. You are responsible for their health and well-being. There is enough space on your green pastures for up to six horses. Each horse has to be examined in order to see if it‚Äôs healthy. Feed them, nurse them, and play with them. Make sure they have everything they need before they go back to their owners.Exciting horse games and challengesThere are six different horse breeds waiting for you, and each breed has its own individual needs. Take a look at the horse‚Äôs file to find out what exactly the horse needs. This will help you to provide the best care for the horse. If your horse needs more endurance play the obstacle course minigame. If the horse is lacking in confidence, you can build it up with flatwork exercises in the riding arena. To increase its ability, just play the dressage minigame. But one thing all horses have in common: they need your affection, so don‚Äôt neglect to give them treats and pet them!Expand your hotel to take in more guestsTo turn your horse ranch into a luxurious hotel, you will find lots of expansions in the shop which will create more space for more horses. But bear in mind that the bigger your hotel gets, the more demanding your guests will become. Earn more coins by completing missions so you can afford to improve your hotel and take care of more and more horses. Besides maintaining your hotel, caring for your horses is the order of the day: clean out their stables everyday so all the horses enjoy a comfortable stay with you!‚ùÄ Run your own hotel for horses and turn it into a luxurious hotel‚ùÄ Discover exciting minigames‚ùÄ Feed and take care of up to six different breeds of horse‚ùÄ Collect coins, complete quests, and spin the wheel of fortuneVisit us on Facebook: facebook.com/tivolamobile
descriptionHTML:
Run your own Horse Hotel
HorseHotel makes you the owner of your own horse ranch. Take care of the horses, look after their needs, and discover exciting games, until they return to their owners happy. You are responsible for their health and well-being. There is enough space on your green pastures for up to six horses. Each horse has to be examined in order to see if it’s healthy. Feed them, nurse them, and play with them. Make sure they have everything they need before they go back to their owners.

Exciting horse games and challenges
There are six different horse breeds waiting for you, and each breed has its own individual needs. Take a look at the horse’s file to find out what exactly the horse needs. This will help you to provide the best care for the horse. If your horse needs more endurance play the obstacle course minigame. If the horse is lacking in confidence, you can build it up with flatwork exercises in the riding arena. To increase its ability, just play the dressage minigame. But one thing all horses have in common: they need your affection, so don’t neglect to give them treats and pet them!

Expand your hotel to take in more guests
To turn your horse ranch into a luxurious hotel, you will find lots of expansions in the shop which will create more space for more horses. But bear in mind that the bigger your hotel gets, the more demanding your guests will become. Earn more coins by completing missions so you can afford to improve your hotel and take care of more and more horses. Besides maintaining your hotel, caring for your horses is the order of the day: clean out their stables everyday so all the horses enjoy a comfortable stay with you!

❀ Run your own hotel for horses and turn it into a luxurious hotel
❀ Discover exciting minigames
❀ Feed and take care of up to six different breeds of horse
❀ Collect coins, complete quests, and spin the wheel of fortune

Visit us on Facebook: facebook.com/tivolamobile
developerAddress:
Oeverseestr. 10-12
22769 Hamburg
Germany

summary: Take care of different horses and be the manager of the horse hotel!
title: HorseHotel - Care for horses

comments: i just started to play the game and was really enjoying it. Nice story line and fun to play. Then it got to the point at level 2 where the crib section was and the ads stop loading try again later. I keep trying to go back after waiting to play and it still gives me the same response. $10 to pay for a game is extremely expensive, I have never seen a game on google play for that amount of money. Most are free or free trial but not at the rate you guys charge. Seriously? you guys need to be more reasonable because the majority of your players are kids. So a word to the developer. If you want to attract and keep your content enjoyable for all ages, make it affordable to all young and old. Im just saying. I myself enjoyed the game overall, but I honestly will not pay that amount to play the game when there are so many other games to play that are free for all.

Love all the delicious Emily games, however I don't like how you have to connect to Facebook to earn a trophy, and some of the game controls didn't work correctly all the time. The swipe motion didn't seem to work very well on a lot of levels making me replay the same level multiple times because swipe wouldn't work and would mess up the whole level. I almost deleted it because of this but I'm glad I stuck with it.

Great game, love the back story and the different levels. Only issue was on level 51 the story telling part/intro didn't work, there was no dialogue, all I could do was press skip. I tried updating the app and clear the cache and it still didn't work.

I love this game! Storylines amazing, graphics amazing, levels amazing, music amazing... the only problems I had with the game were a couple glitches with the advertisements, and level and i had to skip level 51 because of some weird glitch,  but otherwise the game was the best!

I think it is hard for few people to purchase it. I personally love thus game but cannot purchase it. I hope and request game house to remove those purchase things will be removed so that I can play easily and so as other people.
Love delicious Emily, Fabulous Angela and Hearts Medicine. I'll always buy them and I can't wait for the next game to come out.

descriptionHTML:
Join Emily for a very special chapter of her life! One thing's for sure, her family will never be the same again after this...

Right after Emily starts her very own cooking video blog, she receives some heart-warming news... She's expecting a new bundle of joy! But how's Emily going to combine everything that's going on in her life with getting ready for the baby? 👶 🍼

🍼 WELCOME THE NEW DELICIOUS FAMILY MEMBER and be a part of this heart-felt stage in Emily's life
🍼 PLAY 60 TOUCHING TIME MANAGEMENT LEVELS and 30 extra challenging bonus levels
🍼 GUIDE EMILY THROUGH HER PREGNANCY and witness her many ups and downs first hand
🍼 DISCOVER 6 DIFFERENT LOCATIONS and visit Emily's Kitchen, a Yoga Studio, a Day Care Center and other super cute baby-related places
🍼 HANG OUT WITH EMILY'S FRIENDS AND FAMILY and say hi to Angela, François and Allison, plus many others
🍼 CUSTOMIZE THE NEW NURSERY and surprise Emily with the perfect baby room
🍼 TRY NEW FEATURES LIKE DAILY CHALLENGES and take on a new challenge level every day
🍼 CREATE YOUR OWN DELICIOUS POSTCARDSand earn all the trophies to share special messages with your loved ones

Will you be there for Emily when she needs you most?

Having your very own cooking video blog and sharing delicious family recipes with the rest of the world doesn't come easy. 🎥 🍝 It's hard work - and with a family like Emily's, you never know what might happen...

On top of everything, Emily's really tired and hasn't been feeling well lately. She and Patrick have been trying to have another baby, but without any success. Is it simply not in the cards for them? Yet just as they try to accept this, Emily receives some life-changing news... She's not feeling well, because she's pregnant! 👶

Emily and Patrick couldn't be happier! But how are they going to manage everything that's going on? Preparing for the baby, filming the cooking vlog, handling their over-excited family... They could use a hand!

Help Emily through this emotional rollercoaster and get ready to experience the miracles of life! ❤

Try the first few levels for free! The full complement of levels can be unlocked with an in-app purchase.

Follow Emily on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DeliciousGames/

description: Border Security Wall Construction is a fascinating edition created by TwoTwenty games. In this special defense strategy games you are going to enjoy the mixture of the building and defending at the same time. This wall construction games will allow you to play the role of the builder and army force at the same time. It will give you the height of the full fun and a captivating gameplay. Do not forget to recommend your friends and family members if you like this combination of check posts and construction crane. Moreover, you are going to have the experience of handling construction crane. Here you are going to enjoy the army duty games for the country defence and for your home defense. Let us assure you that all the construction vehicles have easy and smooth control. You have to build security wall on border for security. In this airport security wall all process of cutting and simulation are divided into different levels of border crossing wall. This boarder wall is the necessity of the security fences. There was a boundary wall but the enemies have destroyed it with their attacks. So, the mayor of the city has given you an assignment to work on it in palace security wall to save your home from the attacks. The first level of concrete security walls is to break the old wall. You have to take the help from the bulldozer while working on this level of israel west bank wall. The second step of this home security walls is to dig the area with the help of excavator. Now you need to make rod structure using drag and drop in residential security. Then you are supposed to place structure on dig area in high security wall. The gravel is already filled in the truck in chinese security wall. Drive this truck and take it to the construction site in ind border wall construction and park it near the concrete mixer. The concrete mixer is ready now you can fill the dig area with it in defensive wall construction strategy. In this mission of Palestine security wall you have to place structure of walls by using tower crane. Then fill wall with the concrete in school security wall construction. In this mission of airport security wall construction you need to place tower structure by using mobile crane. Fill the tower with concrete in security wall design. Gate is already there take that gate to the site and place it in pak border wall construction and enjoy!Border Security Wall Construction: Wall Building Features:‚òÖ Play our security construction games for FREE on any Android device‚òÖ Buckle up your seat belt and take control of awesome country defense‚òÖ High-quality 3D graphics‚òÖ Many hours of free fun of security wall construction‚òÖ Awesome environments of security games‚òÖ Enjoy super immersive environment and realistic sound effects.‚òÖ Finish all levels, with different objectives and challenges.  Download Border Security Wall Construction: enemy attack sim created bye by  TwoTwenty If you enjoy this FREE game, be sure to rate us 5 stars.
