descriptionHTML:
My Cafe is an addictive bakery & restaurant story game where you set off to help chef Ann open a classy cafe and serve her guests delicious drinks and baked goods.

The first episodes of your coffee shop adventure begins as you set off to a quiet town and open your own classy cafe with your friend Ann! Serve coffee, cook bakery goods and immerse yourself in an addictive kitchen & restaurant simulator that’s brimming with exciting tales and stories.

Download My Cafe: Recipes & Stories and tell your cooking story!

Exciting features in this restaurant simulator lets you:
★ Build and scramble a diner, pizza bakery, or restaurant – hire staff, buy furniture, improve the kitchen and set prices on the menu.
★ Design your coffee shop with tons of glamorous decorative items – After all, comfort is in the details! Be the brightest café on the street.
★ Discover baking and cooking, including special food and drinks like the Sweet Tales Latte, the Mojito Cupcake, and more. Feel the cooking fever in our eating game!
★ Develop your own business strategy and management take big risks or go for slow to ensure you make a profit and thrive in Cafeland game.
★ Bring your restaurant to life with impactful stories and colorful customers for kids and adults. Gossip with regulars and choose your own responses to influence the direction of the story, and make new friends in your neighborhood. Each story is unique in My Cafe: Recipes & Stories!

Features:

My Restaurant, My Cafe Story
• Story mode with unique characters and meaningful relationships. Learn the stories of your regulars, influence their gossip life, make new friends and experience your own Kitchen Craze restaurant adventure in this nice life simulator.

Cafe Treats & Bakery Sweets
• Coffee mania, fast food, dinners, desserts and hot drinks for cafe fans of pizza games from crazy kitchen!
• Bakery treats and restaurant eats!
• Special baking and cooking recipes like the Sweet Tales Latte, the Mojito Cupcake!

Restaurant Mania & Cafe Simulator
• Design your own coffee shop with over 900 decorative items
• Make a business paradise at your cafe by taking big risks or going slow and steady.
• Manage restaurant staff, hire, train and fire your employees in our making food game

Customized Cafe & Bakery Story - Gossip & Intrigue Abound
• Coffee shop gossip goes a long way! Investigate the town’s story, see how characters fall in love, make their choices and discover secrets the whole cartoon city wants to know!

Play with friends
Go social – see how your Facebook friends are running their own coffee shops and townships in your favorite game!

My Cafe: Recipes & Stories is the restaurant story of a lifetime inside a casual game! Gossip with cafe guests and meet new friends in a story mode so deliciously addictive for girls, you’ll never want to put it down! Become a happy world chef and build your bakery, sushi cafe, diner or restaurant with cooking dash to make the best dishes and drinks in a story game that lets you play your way, choose your story and start a true!

However, some in-game items can be purchased for real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

My Cafe: Recipes & Stories is FREE to download and play with no obligations to pay.

Note:
An internet connection is required to play our cooking game

SUPPORT
Chef, are you having a problem with the game? Please contact us by going to the game Settings > FAQ or visit https://goo.gl/Bw6QVb.
Our support service: http://melesta.freshdesk.com/support/tickets/new

Play the best episode of games with your friends, including friends from Facebook, and bring your exciting restaurant story to life in the exciting new business simulator My Cafe: Recipes & Stories. Join in the fun!

Time management games fans from all over the world have already started their restaurant story.

How to develop your coffee shop and choose your own story:
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame

descriptionHTML:
-Over 3,000,000 Downloads!-
Thanks to your support, we now share the happiness and joy of toy games with millions of players all over the world!

-Description-
Time can change many things, but not everything. Take a time travel to your dearest childhood, continue your unfinished adventure and join this toy game!
Lead your green army soldiers, remote-control planes, rubber ducks, transformers and many other toys to defend your bedroom, hallway, living room and backyard against the invasion of the Evil Legion! To experience a great war game!

-Features-
Lilliputian Toy War:
• Build Headquarters in your bedroom, use the moneybox as your treasury, transport resources with your little train, and collect metal with magnets. Every houseware has its unique function in this toy world!
• Fight the enemies in the kitchen, the living room and even the bathroom! The adventurous and playful battlefields will make war interesting and fun!

Grow Your Army:
• Design and assemble ultimate strategic bomber to strike out your enemies!
• Recruit the elite toys as heroes to lead your army, let the toy war commence!
• Upgrade and promote your green army soldiers, flamethrowers, snipers, tanks, artillery units and many more troops of various types to teach your enemy a lesson!

Expand and Exterminate:
• Compete with real players for more territory, greater power and higher prestige.
• Build fortifications to keep invaders at bay.

Strategize to Win:
• It takes patience and strategic moves. Build and deploy your troops with heroes wisely. With a good strategy, you can defeat enemy troops much bigger than yours in size!
• Outwit your enemy with intelligence and timing rather than brutal force.

Play with Global Players:
• Get to know friends with the same interest and ambition as yours in the alliance.
• Compete or cooperate with other alliances. Diplomacy or War, it’s up to you!
• Chat with players from all over the world without barrier anytime and anywhere.

-We Are Waiting For You!-
Childhood is unforgettable, and the toy soldier game is irreplaceable. Join us in the toy world and it will be a better place with your participation!

PLEASE NOTE: Army Men Strike is free to download and play, Some Game items that can also be purchased for real money. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.

Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/ArmyMenStrike/

Room 735, 7/F, Run Run Shaw Tower Centennial Campus
Pokfulam Road, Hong Kong, China

title: Army Men Strike

comments: I played this a while back and decided to come back and see if anything had changed and it sure did. There have been several updates that I love (the new maps, new sharks, equipment, etc.) and I'm glad I'm playing it now. In game currency price for items has been balanced out which I love and the missions system is much better now. I would highly recommend this game to anyone who likes progression-based time-killing games like Hungry Shark World.

Finally! For the the longest time I've been waited, the gaming performance has been improved! No more annoying lag and the gameplay feel a lot smoother now and I am so happy about it. But the graphics still needs to be improved because it doesn't look too good and some minor bug needs to be fixed.

Favourite Shark game in the entire world. I became obsessed because it's so addictive and fun. The graphics are amazing, disappointed when I got my new phone I lost my progress even when I used the smart transfer to transfer the app. I've had to start all over again... but the fun continues!

This game is really addictive and i love it but i own everything now so I don't play anymore. I occasionally get on just to check for new stuff and they do put out new stuff but it takes a long, loooonggggg time. Please put new sharks out and don't make us wait foreverrrr!

It's a fun game and I'm enjoying it. However, I've come from Hungary Shark Evolution and find that the tilt controls in World are vastly inferior to Evolution. Is there a way they can be made more effective? As it stands, I actually have to bend over just to get my shark to swim to the surface. Not fun at all.

This game is amazing! Everyone needs to play this. I would've given a fifth star however you need to not only buy all XXL sharks to unlock the "!!" Sharks but max them out. Definitely download this, just one tip. Don't delete when you have progress. I've downloaded, played, got bored, and deleted 3 times. Now I'm never deleting it. I have so much progress, if I never deleted it the first time I would have everything in the game

descriptionHTML:
*** Hungry Shark World Selected in Google Play’s Best Games of 2016 collection ***
The Sharks are back in the bigger and badder sequel to Hungry Shark Evolution!
Control a shark in a feeding frenzy and eat your way through many oceans feasting on everything from bite-size fish and birds to tasty whales and unwitting humans!
***This game is only compatible with devices running on Android 4.2 or above***

MORE THAN 20 SHARK SPECIES
Choose from a range of sharks in 7 different size tiers, including the most iconic ocean predator: the Great White!

HUGE OPEN WORLDS
Explore the lush Pacific Islands, frozen Arctic Ocean, exotic Arabian Sea, and now the South China Sea, a vibrant urban destination full of fresh, unwary victims!

FEAST FOR YOUR EYES
Experience the feeding frenzy in stunning console quality 3D graphics that will blow everything else out of the water!

SURVIVAL OF THE HUNGRIEST
It’s eat or be eaten in waters packed with 100s of delicious and dangerous creatures… Whales, submarines and wandering locals BEWARE!

SMASHING SHARK SWAG
Level up your shark and equip jawsome gadgets to bite harder, swim faster and grow even hungrier! No shark is complete without headphones, umbrella and a freakin' jetpack!

MANIC MISSIONS & BADASS BOSSES
Take on more than 20 different types of mission including high score challenges, prey hunts and epic boss fights!

HELPFUL PREDATORY PETS
Baby sharks, whales, an octopus, and even a bald eagle are happy to help with special abilities to increase health, score and more!

SUPERSIZED MEAL DEAL
Unleash your shark's predator potential: SuperSize mode, rushes, explosion, hypnosis and more!

INTUITIVE TILT CONTROLS
Back by popular demand, now you can control your shark simply by tilting your phone!

Google Play Leaderboards and Achievements enabled.
Use Facebook to synchronise your progress across your GP devices.
Hungry Shark World is regularly updated with new features, content and challenges to keep you coming back for more!
This app contains In-App Purchases which allow you to buy Gems and Gold currency which can be spent on upgrades and accessories. Gems and Gold can also be collected in game without requiring purchases.
This game contains advertising. Advertising is disabled if you make any purchase.

Like the game on Facebook for the latest news: www.facebook.com/HungrySharkWorld
Follow us on Twitter @Hungry_Shark
Or Youtube: http://youtube.com/FutureGamesOfLondon

comments: Excellent Game overall. Good graphics and controls (once you get used to how a ship moves) feels very real. Gameplay is fair but challenging and is addictive when trying to LVL up. Costs are reasonable but bonus cold be higher for premium account when compared to console prices. Customer service very good. I had a loading issue and advice was prompt and issue is resolved. Would edge about 4.7 out of 5 for me.

Okay, the torpedo issue is a bit better now, we can enjoy this game more. But DD is still OP. Anyway, your next homework is how the ship move. We talk about another player ship that play with us not ship that we drive. Their move is rather like a truck than a ship.  They have to move like our ship,  the stern drift first, right.

Great game! Love to play it. Had 1 problem so far. Was playing a battle ship. Was rammed by a destroyer... Had all my guns on him. His ship went OVER mine which meant all my guns were now facing the wrong way. He on the other hand torp'd me to death....

Great game, stunning graphics, simple controls, challenging but fair. Great to pass away time, isn't one of those 'pay to play' games.. Could add more British ships (as a thought) considering it was deemed one of the best naval fleets during this time... Not to mention German ships as well.. *Bismarck' other than that. Its great

Had fun for few days, then wouldn't get pass loading screen. Keep saying Server connect fail. Advised By tech support to reinstall and all good now. Somehow when playing solo battle, turning control keep flickering, hardly able to control the ship at all. This never happen to co-op battle. Not sure if other player has this issue.

Very good engaging gameplay. I think destroyers are a bit op. Maybe battleships and cruisers should have aim assistant like destroyers have... Because sometimes it really painful to lose against one pesky destroyer :) or maybe limit them like 2-3 per battle or something. When you see 4 or 5 of them and you are in a battleship then it's no fun :) other than that it's a great game.
description: World of Warships Blitz is a free-to-play mobile MMO action game by Wargaming and is based on the award winning PC version of World of Warships.World of Warships Blitz brings the World War 2 naval strategy and action of PC to the highly immersive, quick and fast paced action on mobile and tablet.You can now master the steel juggernauts from a variety of Battleships, Cruisers, Destroyers and even Aircraft carriers , and jump straight into quick, action-packed 7vs7 epic warships battles no matter where you are!A truly free-to-play game. No timers, energy bars, fuel‚Äîplay as much as you want and whenever you want.
descriptionHTML:
World of Warships Blitz is a free-to-play mobile MMO action game by Wargaming and is based on the award winning PC version of World of Warships.

World of Warships Blitz brings the World War 2 naval strategy and action of PC to the highly immersive, quick and fast paced action on mobile and tablet.

You can now master the steel juggernauts from a variety of Battleships, Cruisers, Destroyers and even Aircraft carriers , and jump straight into quick, action-packed 7vs7 epic warships battles no matter where you are!

A truly free-to-play game. No timers, energy bars, fuel—play as much as you want and whenever you want.

comments: Ok, so I will be calm in this review. Whenever I have the same car in a battle with red, we ram each other, but they push me off the map with ease. The main reason why I wrote a review for this game is that you should make the alien levels a little easier. The last level for it is way too hard, you can barely aim at the boss. The controls are hard too. Also can you optimize the game for the Samsung Galaxy tab A?

I would have given this game a higher review than three that I have given it, the problem is that I have noticed a problem when trying to save some money. For me at least when trying to save money through the daily giveaway/present of playing the game everyday it has stolen money from me discreetly whenever I get around the 1000 coin mark sometimes it is one hundred sometimes I have lost 400 with no explanation as to where the money is. It is for this reason that I have lowered my rating. (Besides the disappearing money I enjoyed the game.)

This game is pretty good, for the most part. The only problem is the bots you go upagainst are  way to hard. I can never win. I would have gave them 5 stars but I gave them 4 stars because of the bots. And the game is kinda hard to control. When I move backwords on a veichel it goes up.

This Game is really fun but the Spicky car is really stupid because it's so easy to die... really stupid... but other than that, the games awesome and I got the fist car thing but when I want to use it I can't find it üòë... the games the büí£mb. But the update I don't have so you should probably not get the update because people are complaining about it. AND ALSO ...CARS KEEP SPAWNING ON TOP OF MY CAR KILLING ME!!

Good for killing time. Some of the computer driven opponents seem to have a very decisive advantage at initial start of certain stages, and some of the smaller vehicles are too sensitive on the controls  but overall decent game.
This game needs major fixes, on mission mode, I get my reward after completing a level but I can't ever go anywhere after it. So I never get to move on the next level. üòí
description: Drive Ahead! is a gladiator car fight. Wreck your friends by knocking their helmets with a variety of cars from monster trucks to alien saucers! Hundreds of cars and levels bring endless hours of helmet-crashing action and freak accidents!You can play Drive Ahead! in four game modes. Battle your friends in two-player matches in local multiplayer on the same device or over WiFi! Explore stadium missions featuring dinosaurs, aliens and robots! Reduce the unworthy to wrecks and reign supreme in King of the Hill! Share your best Superstar Stadium replays for a shot at featuring inside the game! Will you be the next Drive Ahead superstar?!Customize your battles or go random for crazy matchups! Can you best a monster truck with a go-kart? Hiding won't help - sudden death brings sawblades, rain of fire and flash floods. descriptionHTML:
Drive Ahead! is a gladiator car fight. Wreck your friends by knocking their helmets with a variety of cars from monster trucks to alien saucers! Hundreds of cars and levels bring endless hours of helmet-crashing action and freak accidents!

You can play Drive Ahead! in four game modes. Battle your friends in two-player matches in local multiplayer on the same device or over WiFi! Explore stadium missions featuring dinosaurs, aliens and robots! Reduce the unworthy to wrecks and reign supreme in King of the Hill! Share your best Superstar Stadium replays for a shot at featuring inside the game! Will you be the next Drive Ahead superstar?!

Customize your battles or go random for crazy matchups! Can you best a monster truck with a go-kart? Hiding won't help - sudden death brings sawblades, rain of fire and flash floods. The only defense is ruthless offense!

Collect virtual credits and use them in the Prize Machine to unlock tons of cars and loads of arenas as you play!

comments: Classic tetris with modern graphics, you can use one touch controls or classic directional pad if you wish, both have their own advantage. I am afraid I can't find Bradinsky song. It's okay for me with advisement because EA need something to eat right? Lol

Enjoyed it at first, and short adverts were expected, but recently adverts have become longer, and now last longer than the game. The latest video advert lasted inbetween games lasted 8 mins....ridiculous!!!. I understand the need for adverts, but if you can't play the game, the adverts are pointless, espeacially if it makes players quit.

I just wanted to play Tetris. Happy to pay for it, was hoping I could pay a $5-10 purchase price and then have the game and play it to my liking. No, need to join the T Club (who comes up with this) and pay an ongoing fee. It's TETRIS from the 80s, EA must you milk everything. Nothing is sacred
Great game, but there's an annoying window that pops up everytime I try and start a new marathon. The window is pretty much useless and wastes my time. Would give this 5 stars if it gets patched

Great game and builds on. The original. The only thing stopping it getting the 5* rating is that the ads on it are sometimes several minutes long and at times when they have finished you can't return to the game. I don't mind watching them as I know that's what funds it, but they are putting me off playing now.

Trying to play Tetris with these abysmal touch and swipe controls is an absolute abject mess. Just add some virtual buttons in, since your loot-boxing asses are supposedly so focussed on 'player choice' lately.

descriptionHTML:
Don’t miss out on one of the best-selling mobile games of all time – free to download! Rediscover the world-famous Tetris® game you know and love, with all-new features and ways to play. Keep your lines clear and keep your cool as things heat up in this puzzle game that’s easy to pick up, but difficult to master. This is Tetris®, reimagined.

GO THE DISTANCE IN MARATHON MODE
Create the perfect strategy and keep your lines clear with endless Tetrimino action. Choose between original Swipe and One-Touch controls in this traditional Tetris® mode.

DISCOVER THE TETRIS® GALAXY
Dig for the galaxy’s core using as few Tetriminos as possible in this multi-level puzzle mode. Exchange Coins for Power-ups and transform Tetrimino blockades into amazing rewards.

COMPETE FOR THE TOP
Show off your skills in the new Explorers Mode. Challenge yourself and other players when you go head-to-head with the competition.

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS
Keep a tally of every line you’ve cleared, or link to Facebook to compete with friends in Tetris® Rank. You can even brag about those sky-high scores on your newsfeed!

Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy (privacy.ea.com) and User Agreement (terms.ea.com. Visit http://help.ea.com/ for assistance or inquiries.

descriptionHTML:
Take control of some amazing police drift cars (speed car, SUV, and 4x4) in a huge driving environment ready to explore, with a big city, forests, canyons, hills and mountains: more than 16 km² of area and 30 km of roads!
Drive fast and drift hard on 8 amazing different tracks.

!! Police Drift Car Driving Simulator contains 24 free levels !!
It is the latest and one of the best police car drifting simulators!

Make your choice between city cars, offroad cars, and speed cars.
Customize them with brush and decals, then change tire, wheel, smoke colors, and more...
Drift in a whole city with realistic and intense traffic, and try 8 tracks to pull off super long drifts.
Complete tons of missions to become a professional drifter and a good cop!

The city is very big with real traffic cars, buildings, houses, bridges and traffic lights.
Drive around and see the sights like rivers and lakes, an ancient Japanese temple, airport with other aircrafts and planes, secluded houses and farms, ruins, a camping place, and more...
The road system is also very dense, with highways and 2x2 lanes, to the very small roads of mountains, with hill-climb.


Features :
- Hugely open-world driving simulator with city, construction, dockyard environments... filled with wide open roads, mountains, hills and forests
- Miles of roads to drift and drive on and do stunt jumps
- Full customization for police cop cars
- Dynamic traffic with real and intense traffic AI
- Realistic driving simulator, ultimate driving experience
- Realistic drifting physics
- High-quality vehicles
- Dynamic camera angles
- Easy to play driving controls, use touch, wheel and tilt controls!

You can adjust the quality button to play without lag.

Show off your amazing drifting and car driving skills, perform awesome car stunts in one of the best free car driving simulators available!

comments: Whenever I try to open the app the screen starts flashing black and it'll stay like that or keeping turning back to the screen I was on and off, which ends up somewhat strobe-like. The actual game itself is amazing despite having a hard time trying to beat the bacteria level but, what's the point of a good game concept, if the game won't work properly

I thought the new scenario was a free-trial only like the simian flu. (At least you can unlock it after being a brutal pro at the game) I'm gonna enjoy playing this a good few times and unlock even MORE scenarios. Keep up the good work! I wanted to make a suggestion, but I just can't remember now. Oh well...

Quite an enjoyable game and different to games I normally play.  It is a strategy game were you have to try and create a deadly virus and wipe out the world, before the scientists find a cure.  What makes this game different is that instead of trying to save the human race, you try to destroy it.   Just a good job it isn't real.

The game is addictive but when you get to a certain point the cure kicks in and it stops giving away DNA points and it makes it hard to advance in the game. I have read the hints in the news it gives, but I still can't manage to beat the game. I want to delete the game. Butim going to continue to try. I just wanted to mention it idk if its the game or just me. I won't tell others about the game only because its frustrating to play. These games are not good for people to play that has any type of mental issue unless they want to buy a new phone.

Fun game. I wish the rate of death was more consistent. 37,000,000 a day at one point, but waiting 6 months for 100,000 to die towards the end. The disease didn't change, the rate of death shouldn't decrease just because there are fewer people. Good game otherwise

From beginning to end I've been pleasantly surprised and let down but mainly let down. I was all for this game when it came out but now you wanna make a quick buck on a scenario app... pay more for something that should be part of the game. Overall good game business practices not so much.

descriptionHTML:
Can you infect the world? Plague Inc. is a unique mix of high strategy and terrifyingly realistic simulation.

Your pathogen has just infected 'Patient Zero'. Now you must bring about the end of human history by evolving a deadly, global Plague whilst adapting against everything humanity can do to defend itself.

Brilliantly executed with innovative gameplay and built from the ground up for touchscreen, Plague Inc. from developer Ndemic Creations evolves the strategy genre and pushes mobile gaming (and you) to new levels. It’s You vs. the world - only the strongest can survive!

◈◈◈ #1 top game globally with 200 million+ games played ◈◈◈

Plague Inc. is a global hit with over half a million 5 star ratings and features in newspapers such as The Economist, New York Post, Boston Herald, The Guardian and London Metro!

The developer of Plague Inc. was invited to speak at the CDC in Atlanta about the disease models inside the game!

▶ “The game creates a compelling world that engages the public on serious public health topics” – The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
▶ “Best Tablet Game of 2012” - New York Daily News
▶ “Plague Inc. will snag your attention in all the right ways and keep it there” - Touch Arcade
▶ “No denying Plague Inc.'s high-level of quality” - Modojo
▶ “Plague Inc. should not be as much fun as it is” – London Metro
▶ “Will leave you hoping to destroy the world, all in the name of a bit of fun” – Pocket Lint
▶ “Plague Inc.'s gameplay is infectious” - Slide to Play
▶ Winner – “Overall Game of the Year” – Pocket Gamer
▶ “Killing billions has never been so fun” – IGN

◈◈◈

Features:
● Stunning HD graphics with a highly polished interface (Contagion guaranteed)
● Highly detailed, hyper-realistic world with advanced AI (Outbreak management)
● Comprehensive in-game help and tutorial system (I am Legendarily helpful)
● 12 different disease types with radically different strategies to master (12 Monkeys?)
● Full Save/Load functionality (28 Saves Later!)
● 50+ countries to infect, hundreds of traits to evolve and thousands of world events to adapt to (Pandemic evolved)
● Full game support for scoreboards and achievements
● Expansion updates add the mind controlling Neurax Worm, the zombie producing Necroa Virus, Speed Runs and real life Scenarios!

Localised in English, German, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, French, Japanese, Korean and Russian. (more coming soon)

P.S. Give yourself a pat on the back if you got all the themed literature references!

Special sale price to celebrate being the 15th most popular touchscreen game of 2012!

◈◈◈

Like Plague Inc. on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/PlagueInc

Follow me on Twitter:
www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations

comments: So I LOVE THIS GAME. I beat it once and had to uninstall it due to space issues. I couldn't find it until now. It is a very nice game controls graphics everything on point. Overall my review is 4 stars. ONLY because it needs more levels as the difficulties aren't extra levels but just harder  versions of those so maybe more levels and islands if possible and more stick warriors and it can even go into the skies or galaxy or so although I don't know if that sounds like too much but more levels. If it had multiplayer (online as optional) also, so u can play offline but if u want multiplayer u get online. I'm not trying to be picky. Such an awesome game finished too quickly.

I loved the original. I've gotta say though, the part with the wizard dying and the endless mode game over scene is kinda sad. Also i found a glitch, if you go to tournament mode and select an icon you haven't unlocked yet and then go to the main menu. You can go back into tournament mode and you'll have the icon even though you didn't unlock it.
Its a good game up until you play on anything other than normal. The upper difficulties make it impossible to progress past spartans unless you buy gems and get power ups, smh

I love the game but its frustrating when you have all 8 Spartans and the sword guys get in the way so maybe an extras set of controls to control where your men start or something. Also for me the screen keeps jumping I try to look at enemy and I catch a glimpse but then it jumps to my side then back again and again and again please fix this.

Great game. Seriously like my fav app. One minor glitch they needed to patch though is that, at least for me, it's not giving me the achievements for the zombie mode. Like I've survived 24 nights but I don't even have the achievements for"survive 5 nights". I should have all the achievements unlocked but I don't because some of the zombie achievements I'm not receiving for some reason. description: One of the most popular and highest rated web games of all time now comes to mobile!Play the game Stick War, one of the biggest, most fun, challenging and addicting stick figure games. Control your army in formations or play each unit, you have total control of every stickman. Build units, mine gold, learn the way of the Sword, Spear, Archer, Mage, and even Giant. Destroy the enemy statue, and capture all Territories!New Features:‚óè	Endless Deads zombie survival mode! How many nights can you last?‚óè	Comic book style cinematic intro for Endless Deads! ‚óè	Tournament mode! Battle your way through dozens of Ai challengers to win the "Crown of Inamorta!"Campaign Mode:In a world called Inamorta, you're surrounded by discriminate nations devoted to their individual nations technology and struggle for dominance. Each nation has developed its own unique way to defend and attack. Proud of their unique craft they have become obsessed to the point of worship, turning weapons to religion. Each believe that their way of life is the only way, and are dedicated to teaching their polices to all other nations through what there leaders claim as divine intervention, or as you will know it... war. The others are known as: "Archidons" the way of the archer, "Swordwrath" the way of the sword, "Magikill" the way of the mage, and "Speartons" the way of the Spear. You are the leader of the nation called "Order", your way is of peace and knowledge, your people do not worship their weapons as gods. This makes you a mark for infiltration by the surrounding nations. Your only chance to defend is to attack first, and obtain the technology's from each nation along the way.

description: A thrilling ride through jungle, caves and treetops. Play as Kong! Banana Kong!Run, jump, bounce and swing on vines as you help Banana Kong to outrun a huge banana avalanche! Keep full control with highly responsive single-finger tap and swipe controls. Ride the boar or fly with the toucan to overcome dangerous obstacles like massive boulders, crocodiles, piranhas and boiling lava. Nature can be a cruel enemy‚Ä¶ While you dash through the jungle you'll be able to outrun your friends! Thanks to full Game Services integration you can see your friends best distance right in the game. Compare your high scores and unlock achievements while improving your playing style. A highly dynamic game engine will provide endless fun in this neverending run. Each session is a new challenge as the level is built randomly on the fly.Collect as many bananas as possible to fill your energy bar. Use a power-dash to destroy obstacles or take alternative routes like the deep underground cave area or treetops. Find secrets and unlock extras to get the most out of the game. Features: - Cloud Save- HD Display support- Full Game Services integration- Ride animals- One thumb controls- 10 seconds from launching the game to playing it.
descriptionHTML:
A thrilling ride through jungle, caves and treetops.
Play as Kong! Banana Kong!


Run, jump, bounce and swing on vines as you help Banana Kong to outrun a huge banana avalanche! Keep full control with highly responsive single-finger tap and swipe controls.

Ride the boar or fly with the toucan to overcome dangerous obstacles like massive boulders, crocodiles, piranhas and boiling lava. Nature can be a cruel enemy…

While you dash through the jungle you'll be able to outrun your friends! Thanks to full Game Services integration you can see your friends best distance right in the game. Compare your high scores and unlock achievements while improving your playing style.

A highly dynamic game engine will provide endless fun in this neverending run. Each session is a new challenge as the level is built randomly on the fly.

Collect as many bananas as possible to fill your energy bar. Use a power-dash to destroy obstacles or take alternative routes like the deep underground cave area or treetops. Find secrets and unlock extras to get the most out of the game.


Features:

- Cloud Save
- HD Display support
- Full Game Services integration
- Ride animals
- One thumb controls
- 10 seconds from launching the game to playing it.

comments: I'm really fond of this game and love the gameplay and quick paced matches. The new update is AMAZING!   There are a few things that would make this game extra perfect for me!   Must have character customisation. This would be amazing to me. Char customisation makes me bind more to certain characters. The rings we get don't have much value to them except for upgrading the characters.  Could have non-ranked matches. I would love the option to play/practice against rivals or my own friends.   Should have quick chat responses. Would like to communicate before and after the match with simple reactions. Like Good luck and I win, tee-hee!

This game is if Sonic Dash mixed with Racing. And I LOVE IT!!! One suggestion I have that I don't think many online multiplayer games have, add some sort of singleplayer mode. Otherwise, great game! I like that it's free with ads being removable via in game purchases (which I did), controls, graphics, and soundtrack are outstanding, overall, I love the game, and I look forward to more updates in the future.

To many ads unless you make some kind of purchase. Loading screens seem to take longer than I'd like. You can't at this time play with friends as Opponents are automatically chosen. There is still some characters ability noise in the game even if you have music and sound off. I'd like to see characters abilities not to be so similar, but it isn't taking away from the game at the moment for me. With all that said though the graphics are great, the game is fun, and it's worth the $1.99 purchase I made.

This is one of the best mobile games I have played I a while. I probobly have a bias sense I love Sonic so much. However, if one thing could be added I would say it should be a converter for the Red Star rings to normal rings. Unless you want them to be payed for. I don't really care either way I'll just buy the Red Star rings but I brought up that idea because I currently have 23,000 rings just kinda waiting to be spent. Maybe incorporate phone backgrounds or some customizations for the game that cost extra rings? Thankyou so much for the new update and if anyone I'd debating on installing it just get it. You'll have fun, trust me.

Please add a custom character, there is one in the main game so there should be one here to. Also please add infinite, cubot, orbot, and eggman. Also some more variety of music and areas would be good. Thank you for reading and for the great game! :)  (Edit): we need a friending system and to be able to customize our characters so that we have SOMETHING to spend rings on. And Espio needs some serious buffing because right now, he is pathetic.

This game is absolutely amazing, but I have some gripes with this.  1. The game constantly lags very badly, even in the lowest graphics quality and occasionally freezes, costing me races. 2. Sometimes when I slide in one direction, it goes a completely different direction and screws up my gameplay.  3. Sometimes, the connection gets lost for an unknown reason and I still lose trophies for it. Can you fix these problems, especially the 1st one?

The world's #1 HIT word search app! The MOST addictive word games EVER!

DOWNLOAD the latest word puzzle game – for FREE！

Word Connect is an exciting puzzle game for TRUE WORD geniuses! Concentrate to find all hidden words in given letters and connect them anyway you like to catch the word! It starts off as an easy word game and becomes challenging! You will have fun improving your vocabulary and spelling skills. Your brain will thank you for the workout!

HOW TO PLAY?

- Correct swipe the letters horizontally, vertically, diagonally, forwards or backwards to form a specific hidden word.
- Find as many words as possible to unlock levels and earn extra bonus coins.
- Fill in every block with a word! Earn coins when you discover star words.
- Have difficulty coming up with the word games? You can use coins to buy a hint to help sovle the level.

comments: To those thinking u gotta pay for everything, ur wrong; it's just a waiting game. You gotta have patience. I really like this game - started it on PC & have been trying it on mobile. The mobile version is pretty efficient with the visits & I don't lag, but it hugely lacks a lot of things from the PC version. U don't get the 3-6 daily prizes when u make visits, can't use Ancient Wonders nor donate KP's, can't use Magic Academy nor use spells, can't see private messages, the FS Adventures & tourneys aren't available.. I often don't get to log in on PC so I can't do several things for my FS. Please fix this.

This game MIGHT be fun, I don't know though, because I got to play for about 30 minutes.  Turned off to continue life, came back and for the last 3 days it won't let me log in. Just opens to the loading screen and stays that way. Try again guys.

Hello, I loved the game when I tried it out and have been logging on since without problems. I haven't linked the account to any email or even FB though so I was shocked when I wasn't able to log in just now, told problem with password or something then can't even create a new account. Any help would be appreciated. Thanks üòÉ

I will resume playing this game when they optimize the app for Android Tablets, not just phones.  I have a Galaxy Tab and there is no animation of buildings when I play on it.  More importantly,  the app is missing important  functions from the PC version of the game. certain buildings,  like the academy are not useable on the app.

Mobile version is very limited. Hard to find fellowships willing to take us because we can't participate in major gameplay advantages such as Tournaments, Fellowship Adventures, or using Our Magic Academy. I was excited at first but updates come out weekly and for weeks now the have said we would get the Magic Academy and every week we don't. We have not gained one function the whole time I have been on mobile. We can't even change our picture to reflect if we are male or female....

This app still needs work.   The play is good and it is a fun game however there is too much that doesn't do anything on the app version.   Perhaps this should be a 'lite' version that doesn't allow you build things that don't work.   Other players are very helpful and informative.

descriptionHTML:
BUILD THE CITY OF YOUR DREAMS IN MAGICAL ELVENAR

Choose between elves and humans to build a beautiful, fantasy city. Discover a world of magic and mystery as you constantly build, develop and expand your realm. You decide how to advance your city as you gather resources, trade with other players and research ancient technologies. Whether you want to build a whimsical paradise or a well-organized metropolis, it’s easy to create a home for fantasy creatures and enjoy the detailed beauty of Elvenar.

CHOOSE YOUR RACE
Play as powerful humans or magical elves to build as you see fit

START INSTANTLY
City building is quick and easy with a friendly introduction and active community

EXPLORE THE WORLD
Discover new provinces to expand your city

TRADE WITH FRIENDS
Trade goods and resources with fellow players and merchants in the marketplace

ADVANCE YOUR CIVILIZATION
Upgrade your buildings to supply your growing population

WELCOME NEW CREATURES
Create a home for dwarves, fairies, dragons and other charming fantasy races

Elvenar is based on the successful browser city-builder, published by InnoGames. Now players can enjoy the online fantasy fun on mobile, tablet and PC browser – all from the same account.

Elvenar is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. A network connection is also required.

Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/en/imprint

All the brides-to-be want you to be the shopkeeper and they have prepared everything for you. Come and run it now!Game tasks:*  Sign in and clean the shop first, creating a more comfortable environment for your     customers.*  Dress our lovely shop assistants up to greet brides.*  The brides filled with happy dreams have arrived, waiting for your designing.*  Measure first and then write down each bride‚Äô size. *  Picking the most suitable one from various wedding dress templates.*  Rich lace and wedding dress fabrics which can make you intoxicated are waiting for you     to unlock.*  Pick the fabric first, cut to the right size, design and cut it based on your design.*  Make the prettiest wedding dress with the sewing machine.*  Don‚Äôt forget to add some small accessories for the wedding dress, for each bride is     unique.*  After the brides get dressed , take pictures for them.*  Each wedding dress needs to be wrapped carefully after finished and then handed over     to the brides, striving to offer the best service.*  A romantic and gorgeous wedding dress making will be totally different in your hands.*  Saving the finished wedding dress in your phone and sharing with your friends, you will     be the top wedding dress tailor.Now, as a shopkeeper, do you get it? Large numbers of fabrics and dress templates are waiting for you to open. Come to be a great wedding dress tailor with your friends.
descriptionHTML:
As more and more girls are going to get married in town, it is time to open a bridal boutique. All the brides-to-be want you to be the shopkeeper and they have prepared everything for you. Come and run it now!

Game tasks:
* Sign in and clean the shop first, creating a more comfortable environment for your
customers.
* Dress our lovely shop assistants up to greet brides.
* The brides filled with happy dreams have arrived, waiting for your designing.
* Measure first and then write down each bride’ size.
* Picking the most suitable one from various wedding dress templates.
* Rich lace and wedding dress fabrics which can make you intoxicated are waiting for you
to unlock.
* Pick the fabric first, cut to the right size, design and cut it based on your design.
* Make the prettiest wedding dress with the sewing machine.
* Don’t forget to add some small accessories for the wedding dress, for each bride is
unique.
* After the brides get dressed , take pictures for them.
* Each wedding dress needs to be wrapped carefully after finished and then handed over
to the brides, striving to offer the best service.
* A romantic and gorgeous wedding dress making will be totally different in your hands.
* Saving the finished wedding dress in your phone and sharing with your friends, you will
be the top wedding dress tailor.

Now, as a shopkeeper, do you get it? Large numbers of fabrics and dress templates are waiting for you to open. Come to be a great wedding dress tailor with your friends.

comments: Great game app!

I love playing slot machine games, and Pop Slots feels like the only game that does not immediately shoot me down when I get a little crazy/ ambitious with my betting. It is the ONLY game I have ever played where I've hit the jackpots on multiple occasions. Now maybe it's all completely luck on my part, but it feels like a game that doesn't immediately take all of your money faster than you can collect it. It's very easy to level up with a good win streak, and those hourly and daily bonus grow pretty quickly. Love this game!

Used to be fun to play when there were decent rewards. For some reason the comp room rewards are gone besides small discount options. Ticket rewards are available for shows nobody would want to pay to see.  I have been playing for a few years now and have saved up quite few loyalty points. I guess we are playing for an occasional comp buffet. What a shame

I like this game..but once i got to a certain level my daily bonus stopped going up.  It has reamined the same and it would be a little more exciting if it would increase the higher you go.  Win or lose is ok with me, it's something to pass free time.

Game is really fun to play probably my favorite, and is the best slot machine app. I've been playing at least 5 years But have recently stopped because it's not fun if you hardly win. And I totally get that it's supposed to be like Vegas, Win some could lose a lot. But it's just a game, it's for entertainment and I get that you can redeem the gold chips for real rewards in Vegas, but that's not why I play. I play because the games and different casinos are fun along with the bonuses. I spend 11 million just to play the pirate gem bonus and only win back 5 million. I could really care less how frequent the gold chips are, you only get 1 in 4ish balloons anyway. I just want to PLAYYY. Especially the bonuses, but it takes forever sometimes for them to be triggered in some casinos. Any chance it can change?

Great game at first but when you progress you pretty much play for 10 minutes wait for bonus. Started purchasing chips and then they seem to go quicker! I like that is not all win win but damn, throw a dog a bone every once in a while. Basically you throw money away paying for chips and NEVER, and I repeat, NEVER win!

comments: Big fan of Beyblade since I was a kid, from the first generation. So this is cool to play this game and see how far its came. Though there are many glitches in the game, this is the second time I'm gonna have to download because it won't open. Overall, it's a fun game when it's not glitching

Garbage game,is now infinitely looping on a challenge tournament. Once I defeat the first opponent the screen goes black and the game freezes. Reopening the game puts me back in the same match and ends in the same endless loop.   Dev team needs to fired and a patrol of lemurs hired instead because they'd at least be entertaining.

As much as I love Beyblade, this app is really disappointing. The gameplay isn't anything special but the worst is the players. There should be a serious punishment for disconnecting. I cannot enjoy the game - I should have won two matches but I got nothing for them because my opponents disconnected the last second. Truly unsatisfying.

Everything is great but it can there be like a story mode cause just battling that is kind of boring. Still I think that the app is great, still could use a story mode where u can customize your own cherareter
You really don't do anything but press orbs and press to buttons. Plus, just to get cool stuff, you need to go out and buy only beyblade bursts. The game is boring and confusing.
Greatly improved since launch. Achievements are bugged and some Beyblades don't have the correct Bit Beast yet, but most earlier bugs have been fixed. Online play is also a big plus.

comments: It would be better if there were more tile choices, besides the basic 3. What really annoys me is that if you pause for a few seconds to look up or think of a move, an ad pops up. A 30 second, non skipable ad. The ads are also there after you finish every match. I know you need to make revenue but jeez. Calm down.

When I first downloaded this game, there were some issues, such as not being able to sync this game. So when I had to do a factory reset on my phone, it removed my stats. So after completing just over 600 games, and all the daily challenges, with over 110 "hints" and then having to do the reset, wiped out everything. The game kept going back to the first level when I selected next level after removing my stats. I uninstalled the game. Not going through each level again. It would be a much better game if it allowed syncing or even saving.

The amount of ads is ridiculous! Especially from that "Tune Blast", it's really annoying. And, w/some of the ads you have to wait 30sec before they're done, there's no "x" button. The actual mahjong game itself is decent.
Would be a great game to pass time if there werent an ad every 5 seconds. Seriously an ad when you click on options? Thats just greedy and stupid. Id give this less than a star if i could

Like the game BUT WAY TO MAMY ADS. No game needs this many ads, I can't do anything without an ad popping up. It is really getting on my last nerves, ecut down the amount I don't mind a few but not that many.
Overall, I love the game. The only thing wrong is that there's too many ads! I can't even go from menu to menu without an ad popping up. It's very irritating.

At least give a full year of ad free gameplay. Not impressed.

comments: Love playing but have 2 suggestions. We need another mill.  When we have large orders to fill it takes forever to complete those orders because the mull is tied up all the time. Maybe every 40 levels add a mill purchase option. When selling on the market, we need an option for a blind add or a neighborhood only sell or trade.. make these upgrades and so far game would be perfect!

It's great to be able to buy from other farms in theory. But there are WAY too many times that you click on something and it's either sold or not even in the roadside stand at all. The for sale paper needs to update quicker.  Also, it's very hard to accumulate any 'west bucks' in this game and you need them to do almost anything, so the game is a big money suck too. I'm deleting it.

I love these type of games just like hayday. I have noticed it freezes and takes ages to load the newspaper. Also would be helpful if it could tell you who needs help in the newspaper would help filling orders quicker. Also I have noticed alot of people selling the same parts and harder to get others and it's extremely rare to get the land parts without paying

The game doesnt give enough case vs things to buy or fix.  Also have issues with getting product into the alloted spaces.  I thought it was my screen but had it cleaned thoroughly and it still happens.  It takes several attempts!!!  The story is cute.  The graphics are cute as well.  Ive noticed it has a couple of choices from other games Ive played on older phones. I would suggest the game to others but get the issues fixed and itll be a 5star game.

I love playing these games. I'm not sure why we are rating gameplay they offer apps not a game. It's crazy how they ask us to rate game at the beginning of game. We haven't learned the bad points. This game makes us pay for treasure chest instead of giving us to them free like most games. Which means we have to pay for everything. Totally not fair. Takes the fun out of game.

comments: I wish I could post pictures, but the game is too easy. I beat the first 2 levels both on one attempt. Though I am an experienced geometry dash player. But if I can beat a level first try, not knowing the course at all, that's some easy stuff. I highly recommend geometry dash sub zero though.

I love every Geometry Dash version! And this one might be the best. But my only downfall is that the music, which is freaking awesome,gets ahead of the actual gameplay and I miss my jumps. Plz fix and I'll rate 5 stars! But keep up the good work!
Great fun but needs more levels. I laughed when I saw a review made by an idiot because he said this was a copy of the Impossible Game LOL it's the other way around, dumbass.

I think this game was made because with new levels in original version they added new effects, but the levels were very hard for normal players and they were designed for pro players, so they decided to make easy levels with new effects (like wave...). The goal has been met and this is very good game.

Hardly worth downloading. I love the full version of the game and figured this world be similar, or at least have some interesting levels, but much to my dismay it does not. The levels are easy and somewhat boring, which is unfortunate because Geometry Dash is usually neither of those things.

I think this game is going to change your life once you start is going to test you all you know you need to be focused to pass the whole entire thing and make sure you try to get all the coins good luck out there and may the best guy win or woman

descriptionHTML:
Episode 1 - FREE - THE ADVENTURE OF A LIFETIME IN THE WORLD OF MINECRAFT

***Continue your adventures with the New Order of the Stone by purchasing the Adventure Pass (via in-app), which includes access to download Episodes Six, Seven, and Eight***

In this five part episodic series, play as either a male or female hero named 'Jesse,' and embark on a perilous adventure across the Overworld, through the Nether, to the End, and beyond. You and your friends revere the legendary Order of the Stone: Warrior, Redstone Engineer, Griefer, and Architect; slayers of the Ender Dragon. While at EnderCon in hopes of meeting Gabriel the Warrior, you and your friends discover that something is wrong… something dreadful. Terror is unleashed, and you must set out on a quest to find The Order of the Stone if you are to save your world from oblivion.

• Created by award-winning adventure game powerhouse Telltale Games, in partnership with Minecraft creators, Mojang

• Featuring the voices of Patton Oswalt, Brian Posehn, Ashley Johnson, Scott Porter, Martha Plimpton, Dave Fennoy, Corey Feldman, Billy West, and Paul Reubens

• You will drive the story through the decisions you make: what you say to people (and how you say it), and what you choose to do in moments of thrilling action will make this YOUR story

Minimum specs:
GPU: Adreno 300 series, Mali-T600 series, PowerVR SGX544, or Tegra 4
CPU: Dual core 1.2GHz

description: Get in the car and start your lessons in the most realistic city driving simulator. This game will test your driving skills and it will need your full attention to traffic rules. You have to watch for traffic and pedestrians, stop signs, traffic lights, speed and much more. If you are looking for a real driving experience, Driving School 3D is the game for you.You will learn how to drive a manual transmission vehicles or stick to the classic automatic gearbox. You can pick a simulation in a large open city, country town and open highway. After passing individual levels, you will enter the final exam. On each map and level you will collect points and unlock many different vehicles. In addition to career driving mode, you can also compete with your friends by inviting them to online challenges.UNIQUE SPORT CARSIf you drive carefully and without mistakes, you collect points and unlock different vehicles such as sport sedan or racing car.REALISTIC TRAFFICCity streets can sometimes have heavy traffic so you will have to watch for other vehicles and pedestrians. Driving on a highway can be even more difficult if you are fast so be careful.ONLINE CHALLENGEChallenge your friends in online mode. You drive on a selected map and you have to obey the rules. This way you collect points and when you both arrive to the target parking lot, the better driver wins.GAME FEATURES+ multiplayer mode to race with players around the world+ sport and SUV vehicles to unlock+ more than 50 levels on 3 maps+ smooth car handling and realistic physics+ manual transmission with clutch+ switch cameras on vehicle
descriptionHTML:
Get in the car and start your lessons in the most realistic city driving simulator. This game will test your driving skills and it will need your full attention to traffic rules. You have to watch for traffic and pedestrians, stop signs, traffic lights, speed and much more. If you are looking for a real driving experience, Driving School 3D is the game for you.

You will learn how to drive a manual transmission vehicles or stick to the classic automatic gearbox. You can pick a simulation in a large open city, country town and open highway. After passing individual levels, you will enter the final exam. On each map and level you will collect points and unlock many different vehicles. In addition to career driving mode, you can also compete with your friends by inviting them to online challenges.

UNIQUE SPORT CARS
If you drive carefully and without mistakes, you collect points and unlock different vehicles such as sport sedan or racing car.

REALISTIC TRAFFIC
City streets can sometimes have heavy traffic so you will have to watch for other vehicles and pedestrians. Driving on a highway can be even more difficult if you are fast so be careful.

ONLINE CHALLENGE
Challenge your friends in online mode. You drive on a selected map and you have to obey the rules. This way you collect points and when you both arrive to the target parking lot, the better driver wins.

GAME FEATURES
+ multiplayer mode to race with players around the world
+ sport and SUV vehicles to unlock
+ more than 50 levels on 3 maps
+ smooth car handling and realistic physics
+ manual transmission with clutch
+ switch cameras on vehicle
developerAddress: Zarovnica, Croatia
summary: How fast can you get a driver's licence?
title: Driving School 3D

Every gun has its purpose but it takes a good pilot to make them work.

Only real option they give is purchas. Don't be fooled. This is a pay to win game.

Investing afew tens to smoother the growth? But you can still have plenty of fun without spending a dime.  Until it slowly draws you in deeper.....

I like how the game has gotten better over past year in many ways.. But could you guys quit making the puzzle peice stuff to get newest goodies? I get you added lots of cool ways to get extras that's cool and all.. But who wants 7 puzzle pieces out of 7,000? Not worth the effort. Keep it gold and silver guys!!

descriptionHTML:
War Robots is an action-packed multiplayer game with 6 vs. 6 team battles in real-time! Join the ranks of the Metal Warriors!

"If you are looking for something new and love robots and multiplayer battles it's worth the download to check it out since initially it won’t cost you anything." - Droid Gamers

"War Robots is an excellent game that works well no matter if you play it on your Android smartphone or tablet, and it’s such a good multiplayer game that it can give people a competitive challenge while on the move." - AndroidHeadlines

"As a high-end, team-based online multiplayer mech game on Android, it's also fairly unique to the platform." - Android Police

It's a time of war, pilot! Are you ready for surprise attacks, intricate tactical maneuvers and the many sneaky tricks your rivals have in store for you? Destroy enemy robots, capture all the beacons, and upgrade your weapons to increase combat strength, speed, and durability of your battle robot. Prove yourself in each map and use different strategies and tactics to emerge victorious from battle!

MAIN FEATURES:
– 31 battle robots with different strengths;
– more than 20 weapon types, including ballistic missiles, energy and plasma guns. What will you choose?
– many possible combinations of robots and weapons. Create a war machine to fit your own play style;
– create your own clan and lead it to glorious victories;
– join epic PvP battles against rivals from all over the world;
– complete military tasks for bonuses and earn the Best Pilot title.

Onward, soldier! Victory is yours!

Want to talk about the game or find allies?

comments: The game is fun, but results take 2 and 3 days and if other people are on higher levels they have access to better tableware and vases, pictures etc, so their rooms stand out more and they have a better chance at getting 5 stars. And some items I've purchased don't work it gives a message saying they couldn't find it in the warehouse. But the game never gave me my gems back and of money. NEED TO FIX IT

I love this game!! "it helps a lot" with my shopping addiction because I feel like I'm buying real merchandise. I really enjoy the updates and how you guys added more room to be designed!!!! Also the 2d & 3d option to view products is awesome!! and if your  studying for interior design this is the app for you! I love the voting of others designs, you get to view everyone creativity. I really love how you guys never ask for an rating....like some apps by the 1st go you get popups please rate our app you guys never asked for an rating I choose to. Thanks for getting me addicted :))

I really love this game. I love voting and seeing what other have also come up with. I love that it is really world design where you can actually shop for pieces and not cartoon rubbish. However, I have had a number of issues where the game has had to restart and have even lost diamonds and cash after trying to collecting daily rewards when it re starts, watching endless adds and not receiving rewards for them or downloading other useless games I have no interest in and actually playing them to generate rewards and not receiving them either. These are my only issues with the game. Other than these it would be five stars.

Great application. Very enjoyable. Only complaint wish app had more international design furniture to match the themes and settings. Also need to fix the bug so that the design loading screen appears.  This is the only app that I have to reset my tablet to get my results, since the last update I have had this issue. I have made an inquiry adressing this issue and it still has not been fixed. I have changed my rating because of this issue, once it has been addressed and fixed I may change my opinion.

I love this game.  The only home design game there is. Glad that that they have added items to the shelves more realistic.  Sometimes I feel it is over designed.  I wouldn't always add that footstool or bench.  It is also difficult to play without spending money and I cannot afford to do that.  Keys are required to decorate properly (plants, decor) and can take a long time to accumulate.  This is my favourite game though and I will continue to play and patiently wait just do my best with what I have.  I do watch the videos to gain more keys but woe is me...

Great game! Love it! Only voting system is not accurate. I think  designs that not reflecting the theme should not get  5 stars. It would be nice to have experts inside the game who will review designs for THEME and reward those who follow the theme and get great result  in designing. I suggest to  give one point for those who is following theme, and get one point out if someone not. Fairness is important.

descriptionHTML:
Der Toggolino CLUB – über 55 Spiele für Kinder ab 3 Jahren! Seit mehr als 10 Jahren bietet der Toggolino CLUB Kinderspiele und Lernspiele für Kleinkinder und Vorschulkinder.

- Spiele mit den Toggolino Lieblingen wie Bob der Baumeister, Caillou, Benjamin Blümchen, Thomas und seinen Freunden, den Oktonauten und vielen mehr.
- Wissen aus dem Alltag wird spielerisch vermittelt: Zahlen, Tiere, Farben, Formen, Buchstaben, die Uhr, Verkehrserziehung und weitere Themen.
- Regelmäßige Erweiterung der Kinder App durch neue Spiele.
- Alle Kinderspiele sind voll vertont, intuitiv und ohne Lesekenntnisse spielbar.
- Elternbereich mit Spielzeiteinstellungen, Spiele-Suche und Spielerprofilen.
- Im Offline Modus können alle heruntergeladenen Spiele für Kinder auch ohne Internetverbindung genutzt werden.

So funktioniert die Toggolino CLUB App:

Sie sind bereits Toggolino CLUB Kunde?
Dann installieren Sie sich die kostenlose Toggolino CLUB-App, loggen Sie sich mit Ihrer E-Mail und Ihrem Passwort ein und schon haben Sie und Ihr Kind Zugriff auf alle Spiele.

Sie sind noch kein Toggolino CLUB Kunde?
Für die Nutzung des Toggolino CLUB ist der Abschluss eines Abonnements notwendig. Weitere Infos dazu finden Sie auf http://www.toggolino.de/einfach-anmelden

Ihr Tablet/Smartphone wird unterstützt, wenn es mit dem Google Android Betriebssystem ab Version 4.4 arbeitet. Es werden keine Android-Geräte mit einem Intel-Prozessor unterstützt!

Bei Problemen mit der App senden Sie bitte eine E-Mail an: info@toggolino.de

comments: Lost another These constant updates caused me to uninstall this. Fun game - very good game!But if it ain't broke don't fix it. I will not sacrifice all the other good games I have for this single one. Now with google only allowing so many apps ( no writing to sd card). Atleast if you update you should let people keep playing with version they have. Make updates optional.

Awesome graphics, and for what you get on a phone, it really is an amazing game. The only complaint (if you can even call it that) I have is the controls can be a little tricky as sometimes when you're trying to swing left or right you can accidentally change your weapon instead of swing to either side. Aside from that, tremendous gameplay, multiple modes to play, amazing graphics, really just an awesome game. Make sure you have a really good internet connection.

It's a fun game. If you're a COD player you'll love it. In general It does good on it's own as a solid shooter. Only thing I think you really, REALLY need to change is the way to get weapons. Using rentals is great, picking up enemy or ally weapons, sure, but having to spend money to get most weapons, if not all, seems a little unfair. It's good that there's a grind to get them but I think it's a little overkill how difficult it is. I think levels should determine what you unlock, then use silver (make it easier to get) to purchase it. Or, if players want to speed up the process, use gold.

I really like the game. Fun, exciting, and addictive. The only problem I have is that the rewards you get are not nearly enough as I think they should be. Exp gains are good, but cash gains are so bad and you will have to play for hours to accumulate cash and then you can buy HALF of a weapon, because they require a lot of cash to get one. You also can barely upgrade weapons without any gold and you can just forget about that unless you put some real world currency in this game, which is a real shame. As a player I know we would like to buy and upgrade our own weapons instead of having to "rent" which is an option in the game.

One of the dumbest cod ripoff i have seen and played in 2k18 so far. You need 20 bullets to kill someone with head shot. Dont waste your time with this dumb game. Play something else and yea a FREAKING TANK IN A MAP THIS SMALL. like were you under the influence of some substances when you made this game. Wast of time. Dont download this abomination.

Great game play, Great graphic, but after 1 month, I think this is another pay to win game ; the great Gun need to buy,  the Armor need to buy, almost every wining key things need to buy. But some people really like it because they have money to buy all those and "WIN" other pool guy. it is not about skill, it is about money.

descriptionHTML:
WORLD WAR HEROES
Fight soldiers from all over the world in the best World War II online shooter for Android!
This game will take you to World War II, where you’ll able to use military vehicles to conduct battles.

The game features 7 game modes:

✯ Hardcore Mode
Mode increase the damage and makes the game more realistic;

✯ Deathmatch
Free fight for all. You fight for yourself. Player with the highest score wins the round, 1-2 hits and you lost, just like in real life.

✯ Team Deathmatch
Two teams fight for domination. The team with the highest score at the end of the round wins.

✯ Bomb Mode
One team should bring and plant a bomb at the indicated point, the other team must prevent it!

✯ Team Squad
Two teams fight each other with no respawns. The team which has at least one member alive wins.

✯ Team battle on panzers
Two teams are fighting each other for superiority using heavy machinery. The team that has the most points at the end of the round wins.

✯ Custom Modes
Create a game with your own rules! Tell your friends game number in the statistics window when you create a room and play together!


Features:

✯ 7 legendary World War II battles!
✯ 4 types of battle vehicles from different countries: USA, Russia, Japan, and Germany!
✯ 5 game modes and a custom mode with your own rules!
✯ 57 unique weapon types: pistols, assault rifles, machine guns, shotguns and many more!

*Reminder: Join tournaments to win prize, raise your clan!


More features:
✯✯✯ Login to Get Daily Free Gifts ✯✯✯
Login to Get Daily Free Gifts, Login to get Free Daily Quests!
Login to get daily free items. Don’t also miss the bonus EXP and Credits time!
　
✯✯✯ 50+ Weapons, Customize yourself ✯✯✯
50 types of weapons: guns, pistols, tommy-guns, subguns, grenades, rockets and body armors!
Customize your weapon and get a unique test piece – change the color and get all options, from barrels and stocks to scopes.

✯✯✯ Upgrade gear system ✯✯✯
Upgrade your gear and become stronger!
Claim first place and give a headshot to the one who will dare to contest the air!

Regular updates and new elements are waiting for you. This year’s best graphics and perfectly matched sounds will make you spend your time playing WWH!

GOOD LUCK SOLDIER!

========================

comments: It's honestly a fun game, and I'd love to use it as a stimulating activity (ah, who am I kidding, it's just a great time killer), but it makes my head hurt-- and that's a problem. I'm not even the type of person that is negatively affected by fast-paced graphics or rapidly changing colors. It'd be five stars if it didn't give me headaches, but, for now, it gets three; good graphics, smooth gameplay, but no matter how great the app, it isn't worth physical discomfort. (Note: if you are looking for something similar, try "Run". It has the same sort of concept, but without the advertisements and headaches.)

I would not have a problem with that but you have to farm survival mode to get lvl 7. No problem right well no there is a problem you get 2 xp for beating survival 2!!!!! And you need 400 this is freaking ridicoulous. Plus when you get lvl 7 he is like a regular oppenent. The difference between 1 lvl should not be this high

Game is awesome. But for past 2 days whenever i open the game, it closes after intro showing that unfortunately SF 2 has stopped. Pls do something as i dont want to uninstall it. Also I hv sent feedbacks 2 to 3 times but no reply or fixation. Do something about it.

Way to many adds. I've never had this problem until today but the ads are even popping up DURING a fight and COMPLETELY blocks the WHOLE screen. VERY annoying. Another major problem is you can't turn off the push notifications. ALSO, very annoying.

I have been searching for a game that suits me and i just found it SF2 is on my top three list of martial arts games. But there's a problem, your opponents who r not shadows are shadows so please change that. And could u add a multiplaer mode. Anyways good game

comments: A very fun and addictive game. I make bows all day, but it's nice to be able to shoot from my couch at night.  The influence of wind on the arrow is accurate when it comes to drift. A little costly on the upgrades for those that don't buy their way to the top, but all games are that way.

The game isn't bad however the customer service is poor and apparently there is a bug in the system. I completed a free cash reward by downloading another game and I was sent a message from Tapjoy saying congrats you have received the reward but I never did. I have sent out a request in game to get my reward but still have not received it.

I personally would like to see my opponents record like you can in other games. I understand that in the higher price games its difficult to get even matches but when im a level 12 and i end up playing someone ranked 100 or higher thats a bit much.
Ok game, but bingo mode is a huge pain.  My shots filled out the opponent's card better than mine.  Stupid way to lose a lot of progress/coins.

Love the game, BUT there's a glitch in chest bow where it locks up for 1 shot, multiple times a day. After you shoot without being able to aim, the bow works normal until the next jam. Looked for a place to submit info for possible fix, BUT game doesn't provide a place for feedback. This is only place to air complaints :(

Game was fine. Lately, keeps freezing and somehow opponents are getting 10's when I CLEARLY see them hitting nowhere near the middle. Matches are freezing while i'm ahead, then match ends and says I lost. Somehow i've lost 20 million coins, and not from legit losing either. I also just played a match for 1 million coins, i had over 1 million in the bank. I know sonehow have 0 after I clearly won the match but it said I lost. Either people are using cheats or the game is not functioning properly

comments: Most puzzles are self explanatory. The odd few appeared to be impossible without some instruction. Few levels I had to skip probably around 7 levels. Couple due to pieces not moving or stuck. Very happy to be able to skip levels.  Would have been great to have a certain bank of hints for some of the  difficult ones. I found the later levels easier than the ones around 100. Max levels 120. Great fun!

Not responsive to most touches. I finally got a cheat only to realize it was the game.  Ads were not frequent but had a strobe light going off (health issues) and would not turn off. Had to close out of the game every time so I just quit playing. Typo many similar more challenging games out there to try and work with this one.

Some things are hidden in such a place makes it hard on note 8 due to curved screen. Level 89 doesn't work, as well as other levels where touching the same place over and over and over might get something to work.  Most puzzles are extremely easy,  it's just a matter of the game not working.

Good concept but a lot of the puzzles are stupid or they totally don't work unless you restart the game which is annoying. There's so many glitches I felt like uninstalling so many times! I'm just glad it's over so i can get rid of this app. 3/10 wouldn't recommend
Fun and challenging for awhile, but I found most of the levels after 50 impossible to figure out without a cheat sheet. Got frustrating. I'm at level 60 and about ready to throw in the towel.

I play this game in 2hrs and got stuck on level 42. It's challenge your mind. It's good for you, if you like doing brain games.. It helps you think about.. Like you really have to think about it or you will get stuck. But all the above, it's a awesome awesome game.

comments: This game is just impossible to finish, even if you spend lots of real money. 66% of the game (trick and powder) is about pulling tricks out and you can't even choose which ones. Controls are very bad and graphics also. The only thing that makes it more fun is the online challenges, but other than that this game sucks. I would expect a whole lot more from Red Bull.
What's with the slo-mo while you're in the air? Makes it hard to spin and flip fast!
It's hard to find a winter sports game that's slick and easy to navigate. The tricks are easily achievable. The graphics are pleasing to the eye. Don't like having purchase items to advance.

Did you write this program on a 2007 droid razr? Cause the loading times are ridiculous for the amount of processing that should be going on in this game. Also, the tutorial was frustrating, and controls terrible.
It's REALLY laggy and the tutorial goes on forever about upgrading loading is really long too but the graphics and such are good. But please fix this
The game is okay, but you can't really expect much from a game that takes 90 MB, graphics and gameplay aren't bad at all but could be better.

comments: I have only had the game a few hours and I am already falling in love with it. It is great to go on when you have a spare 10-15 minutes. The grid is larger than others so I can read the words fluently and quickly without them being hard to see. You get points after each time you complete the grid so if you are really stuck you can receive a hint for some points. I would highly recommend this excellent game.

Only been playing for a few days now, and so far, I love it! Forgot how fun Word Search puzzles can be, and to have it on my phone is priceless lol.. No complaints with the app so far. I will say though, maybe they should tweak it just a tad, instead of giving a hint only after a short moment, possibly creating 'the option' to have a hint may be a little better. Not a big deal to me. It truly is a great app, love the simplicity of the graphic design too. Glad I came across this game.

I enjoy ALMOST the whole game, being a word find and all, simple, yet deceptively hard at times. Still, I wish there was a way to turn off the 'hints' it gives, as they get annoying... unless there IS a way that I haven't discovered yet...otherwise, I REALLY like the game, and would suggest it to all ages, as it's not too tough for the young ones, but still challenging enough for experienced players.

Pretty good word search game. It's sometimes hard to hit the right letters, especially toward the bottom of the screen. Occasionally words share more than one letter in common. Sometimes  (especially in the  lower levels) a word will show up more than  once in a puzzle. Maybe extra credit for finding a word that's not on the list?

It's a good game but there needs to be a way to turn off hints. If you don't find a word in the time it thinks you should, it keeps giving hints which ruins the gameplay. I pause for various reasons like talking to someone, cat catching a mouse, watching tv at the time, etc.. Or sometimes it might take longer to fins a word than seconds allowed before the hint.

I love this game. Really nice and well thought out game. It's educative too. But I have just one issue with it though: The flashing hint. This gets me distracted each time it flashes. Maybe there could be a hint button at the bottom of the puzzle. That way instead of it flashing and getting us distracted, we could just click on it whenever we need help. Apart from that, it's just perfect. Will give it a 5 when the flashing hint is worked onüòÅ
