description: Step into a PEPI HOSPITAL and become doctor, patient or just a curious explorer! Our new addition to a rich family of PEPI PLAY games offers a vast medical centre with tons of items, activities and ways to play. Join our characters in their workplace, soothe and treat patients, create Your own stories, discover and understand the everyday routines of a busy hospital.MEET THE PEPI BOTWe're delighted to introduce a medical Pepi Bot, our new character built to accompany little players in our games. Pepi Bot is a cute, versatile friend able to follow you around the building and provide immediate help, to You and Your patients. Armed with the latest tech, Pepi Bot is a perfect sidekick to Your interactive stories. Cute little droid will provide medical tools and even carry a wardrobe for all those moments when you feel like playing in style!TONS OF ACTIONExperience the daily life of a hospital full of action - from the small and cosy cafe to a busy pharmacy shop or the operating room, there are various experiences for players to toy with. Ambulance car will arrive regularly with new patients to take care of and new friends to meet. Only the most curious players will be able to find all the ways to treat their patients. This offers an amazing opportunity to set up various scenarios to take part in.FUN & EDUCATIONALEven though the game is dedicated to a young audience, everybody can and should find a way to join in. The game encourages parents to play together and use the games educational values - while your child is discovering the opportunities throughout all 4 floors of the hospital, you can help him by moderating their experiences, creating and going through character stories, explaining the nature and use of items, expanding child‚Äôs vocabulary and basic medicinal knowledge.  HUNDREDS OF INTERACTIVE OBJECTSEnhance your gameplay with hundreds of interactive objects that can be easily transferred through floors. Medical instruments, toys and even yoga balls can be given to the dwellers of Pepi Hospital for the most unpredictable results. Not to mention many opportunities to dress up your favourite characters!COLORFUL AND UNIQUE CHARACTERSPEPI HOSPITAL has a wide variety of characters. Dozens of cute, cheerful and unique humans, pets, monsters and aliens are there to have fun and join your playful exploration of the Hospital building.FEATURES‚Ä¢ Vast medical centre packed with tons of items and machines!‚Ä¢ Multifunctional companion bot.‚Ä¢ Run your own lab ‚Äî measure blood pressure, perform X-ray scans and much more!‚Ä¢ Get comfy in customisable dentist chair. ‚Ä¢ Become physical therapist, create your own fitness routines!‚Ä¢ Be among the first to welcome babies into the world. Weight and take a good care of them!‚Ä¢ Listen to Hospital dwellers talking on the phone. Each in his own unique way!‚Ä¢ Play with fishes while waiting at the reception.‚Ä¢ Ambulance regularly delivers new patients.
descriptionHTML:
Step into a PEPI HOSPITAL and become doctor, patient or just a curious explorer! Our new addition to a rich family of PEPI PLAY games offers a vast medical centre with tons of items, activities and ways to play. Join our characters in their workplace, soothe and treat patients, create Your own stories, discover and understand the everyday routines of a busy hospital.

MEET THE PEPI BOT

We're delighted to introduce a medical Pepi Bot, our new character built to accompany little players in our games. Pepi Bot is a cute, versatile friend able to follow you around the building and provide immediate help, to You and Your patients. Armed with the latest tech, Pepi Bot is a perfect sidekick to Your interactive stories. Cute little droid will provide medical tools and even carry a wardrobe for all those moments when you feel like playing in style!

TONS OF ACTION

Experience the daily life of a hospital full of action - from the small and cosy cafe to a busy pharmacy shop or the operating room, there are various experiences for players to toy with. Ambulance car will arrive regularly with new patients to take care of and new friends to meet. Only the most curious players will be able to find all the ways to treat their patients. This offers an amazing opportunity to set up various scenarios to take part in.

FUN & EDUCATIONAL

Even though the game is dedicated to a young audience, everybody can and should find a way to join in. The game encourages parents to play together and use the games educational values - while your child is discovering the opportunities throughout all 4 floors of the hospital, you can help him by moderating their experiences, creating and going through character stories, explaining the nature and use of items, expanding child’s vocabulary and basic medicinal knowledge.

HUNDREDS OF INTERACTIVE OBJECTS

Enhance your gameplay with hundreds of interactive objects that can be easily transferred through floors. Medical instruments, toys and even yoga balls can be given to the dwellers of Pepi Hospital for the most unpredictable results. Not to mention many opportunities to dress up your favourite characters!

COLORFUL AND UNIQUE CHARACTERS

PEPI HOSPITAL has a wide variety of characters. Dozens of cute, cheerful and unique humans, pets, monsters and aliens are there to have fun and join your playful exploration of the Hospital building.

FEATURES

• Vast medical centre packed with tons of items and machines!
• Multifunctional companion bot.
• Run your own lab — measure blood pressure, perform X-ray scans and much more!
• Get comfy in customisable dentist chair.
• Become physical therapist, create your own fitness routines!
• Be among the first to welcome babies into the world. Weight and take a good care of them!
• Listen to Hospital dwellers talking on the phone. Each in his own unique way!
• Play with fishes while waiting at the reception.
• Ambulance regularly delivers new patients.
developerAddress: Paplaujos 3-34, Vilnius, Lithuania
summary: Step into a PEPI HOSPITAL and become doctor, patient or just a curious explorer!
title: Pepi Hospital

comments: Very good game. I have a level 20 indominus rex even though I'm only level 50. and I'm trying to evolve it to level 40. I think that the element of creating your own hybrids is amazing. I think my personal favourites are yudon, indominus rex and ostaposaurus (in the game) and majungasaurus, T-rex and triceratops (that I have currently)  My only complaint is there's no aquatic, cenozoic or solid gold hybrids which I think would add a cool aspect to the game. And maybe some super hybrids made from 2 of the normal hybrids. (Recent) now for some reason I can't claim my reward for the Acanthostega tournament even though my game is updated to the latest version. Please fix this or send an email suggesting to/telling me what happened to stop me from getting my reward.

.     It doesn't tell you how to get past level 75. Or how super power your dinosaurs,  example the opponents dinosaurs that have the purple glow. Also unable to redeem the points on either visitor world or the world ran by facebook. Jurrassic World the game also doesn't tell or show you how to get your dinosaurs to the ultimate stage where  these issues. That's why they get a poor rating from this consumer. If everyone boycotted the game and cancelled their memberships, you can guarantee they would fix all glitches and explain away the issues that are asked.

I love the game. Its amazing. The biggest problem I encounter is the loading time of the game. I use a verry good wifi conection and even in this case it takes 35 minutes to load the game. Btw I have a huawei p9 and extra memory card of 125 gb so no storage problems. Since download I still have this long time in loading. To bad the game is amazing.

I was enjoying this game for 5 minutes, and then I couldn't get into it anymore. It tells me to make more then 900 mb space even though I just deleted a couple of gb worth of apps. Once I can play this again it will be fun

The game is very good with levelling up and progressing achievable with time. The events and some of the special unlock creature packs can be difficult and slightly imbalanced . But that's the way of a game with purchases. Overall is a good game if you stick with it haven't bought any extra bucks and I feel I'm at a reasonable level.   The only aspect which I think could be added to improve the game is a park editor style which is featured in similar games. As now I have used most the space in the park and takes forever to rearrange every item and dinosaur which I have . A simple remove all and place singularly would be perfect addition

It's a great game but it's such a money pit. 9 out of 10 times if you want something, you better get a credit card out otherwise you're waiting 4 days to unlock it. If it weren't for that, I'd have given 5 stars.

descriptionHTML:
Return to Isla Nublar with the creators of the smash hit Jurassic Park™ Builder for your next adventure: Jurassic World™: The Game, the official mobile game based on this summer’s epic action-adventure. Bring to life more than 150 colossal dinosaurs from the new film and challenge your opponents in earth-shaking battles. Construct the theme park of tomorrow in this unrivaled build-and-battle dinosaur experience.

In order to build a winning Battle Arena team, you’ll need to design the most efficient and effective park, one that will allow your dinosaurs to thrive and evolve. Discover new and amazing species of dinosaurs by acquiring surprise-filled card packs. Join Owen, Claire and your favorite characters from the film as, daily, you feed and genetically enhance your dinosaurs. Now that the park is open, it’s time to make Jurassic World™ your own!

In Jurassic World™ The Game you will:

* Defy the laws of science as you COLLECT, HATCH & EVOLVE more than 150 unique dinosaurs!
* CONSTRUCT & UPGRADE iconic buildings & lush landscapes inspired by the film.
* CHALLENGE opponents from around the world in earth-shaking BATTLES!
* INTERACT with characters from the film as you navigate exciting new storylines & thrilling missions!
* ENHANCE your experience with Hasbro® Brawlasaurs™ toys – scan each toy dinosaur & battle with it directly in the game!
* CHOOSE from multiple card packs; each can bring a special dinosaur to life!
* EARN daily rewards such as coins, DNA & other essential resources.


Membership

* Jurassic World The Game offers a monthly subscription at USD $9.99, please note prices may vary depending on sales taxes or countries.
* The user will be asked to login to his Google account (if not already) prior to the purchase.
* The payment will be charged to Google Account at confirmation of purchase.
* Additional information will be provided afterward stating that subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
* We also mention there that subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.
* The account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
* No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period.
* Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

Privacy policy can be found at http://legal.ludia.net/mobile/privacy_black.php

Terms of service can be found at http://legal.ludia.net/mobile/terms_black.php


By installing this application you agree to the terms of the licensed agreements.

Like us on Facebook for fan giveaways, the latest news and updates! (facebook.com/jurassicworldthegame)

Jurassic World™ is a trademark and copyright of Universal Studios and Amblin Entertainment, Inc. Licensed by Universal Studios Licensing LLC. All rights reserved.

Please note: Jurassic World™: The Game is completely free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money.

descriptionHTML:
Do you love fire and water (ice) style game ?
This game made for you : Luckyboy and PrettyGirl - Crystal Temple Maze.
One of best game adventure. One of best teamwork game . One of best Maze game !
Lucky boy and his lover (Pretty Girl - Ice girl) , who go with him, is a puzzle adventure game for two players.
It's an addicting and very fun to play with your kid or your lover or your friend.
Control and move Lucky boy and Ice girl through the maze in the Crystal Temple and collect all the diamonds.
This game duet bested the trials of three other ancient temples or wats.
Now they face the most mysterious one yet!
Help Fire and Water kid get through each level quickly in this challenge game.
Use the uric acid to teleport and gather gems for bonus items.
Be sure to keep Lucky boy out of the water puddles.
You have a long and difficult way of saving the planet!
Do not waste your time, and get started your journey now!

How to play :
1. Avoid obstructions.
2. Just tap the button "Change" to change from Pretty girl to Luckyboy
3. Collect gems many as you can keep him more robust..

descriptionHTML:
Paper Toss Boss: more papery, tossy, and bossy than ever before! (It’s cool, tossy is a word now, don’t worry about it.) There are tons of things to throw and oodles of things to throw them at! Score.

-16 unique items to toss, from classic wads of paper to the epic rubber band ball
-10 dynamic environments of varying difficulty in which to toss around
-Break, blow up, and burn the objects found around the office
-Toss stuff at the Boss and other co-workers to annoy them (in game, not real life — but we won’t tell if you pretend it’s real life)
-Missions offer challenges to show off your paper (and non-paper) tossing skills in exchange for awesome rewards
-Moving targets, bank shots, and bunches of baskets will test the true prowess of your paper tossing skills
-Power-ups boost your scores and mix up the gameplay for a variety of fun ways to toss
-Google Play leaderboards and achievements so you can challenge your friends and smite your adversaries

Remember those pesky “Hey, you hit me!” co-workers from the original Paper Toss? Well now you can throw right at them! (You devil, you.) You’ll still score points for flicking wads of paper into the office trash can, now with a handsome new ergonomic design! Plus, try your skills with flaming paper balls, tossable bananas, tomatoes, grenades, and other fun stuff to hurl in classic office settings and more. What are you waiting for?! Get tossing!

Install Paper Toss Boss for FREE today!
PLEASE NOTE! Paper Toss Boss is completely free to play, but some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.

Jump into the ever-tightening arena and do what it takes to be the last one standing!

【100 enter, but only 1 emerges】
100 players are scattered throughout the 6400m*6400m battlefield. Explore the map, collect weapons, take aim, and pull the trigger. Remember, there can only be one winner!

【It's a big bad world out there】
Explore islands, snow-capped mountains, train tunnels and other unique locations while you wait for your moment to strike!

【Team Up, Speed Up, Tear Up】
Storm the battlefield with battle buddies in Duo Mode, Squad Mode and Fireteam Mode. Coordinate your attacks with your teammates using voice chat to outmaneuver and crush your enemies.

【Play with your own rules】
It doesn't matter if you choose to ambush your enemy or attack head on, snipe from a distance or get close and messy, there is only one objective, survive at all costs!

*Follow Us
Facebook (English): https://www.facebook.com/KnivesOutGame/
Customer service: gameknivesout@service.netease.com

comments: I want to love this game.  It's pretty. The characters are adorable.  The concept is creative. However, the controls are challenging at best. Also, gathering enough sunshine to do anything is mind-numbingly slow.  Thank you devs for neat but unplayable game.

The storyline is a great idea, but unfortunately the execution iof this game is rubbish. Despite the lengthy and slow "click the cloud" interactions with in-game characters, instructions are so minimal that you get very bored with working out what you are supposed to do.  Graphics aren't really impressive, and although it is perfectly easy to understand how to move your character around the screen, doing so in these ways is a pain. I really wanted to like this game, but frankly it feels a bit like playing something a couple of decades older.
I really like this game, the controls are cool, the characters, story, and graphics are good, the only problems I have with the controls are because I'm not used to them.
Except for when you can't reset a puzzle and have to close out the portal I like the game.
IIT SUCKS DICK LOL Lol
I love the game it's so much more than a match 3 game

comments: Honestly, I like this one the most. I like that it keeps the mini games present, but it has a new game style as well. I also love that you can play as the characters, as well as the fact that they now have a backstory! The game itself isnt too difficult, making it a nice game to play at all times. The only thing i dont like is the amount of ads, but it is a new game, and ot needs its funding to stay up and running. Overall, good job Metro! Keep it up! :D

Nice game. I like the concept of rebuilding but this game was meant to kill time, I hope so. Keep adding characters and what we require is a hell lot of mini games so that they may keep coming and coming and coming. I do not intend to harass you but try to add more and more mini games after each update. I'm sure that in the course of  time you may be able to compete with the best games ever created but do not make the game larger than DWTD 2. Add more new locations too otherwise we will not be able to consume the tokens. The game is nice because you do not have to consume money for characters and get them through gifts instead. It is also nice because tokens can be collected easily. Please think about my opinions. I‚ù§ this game.

Brilliant! It is absolutely fantastic! Bit of lag and ads but apart from that it's perfect. Also it's very different from the other dumb ways to day which goes to show how much effort the creator(s) put into making them.They didn't just quickly make a few quick games for the money. No. They put effort. It is amazing. The deaths are funny and the characters are cute and so is the art style. Creator, GREAT JOB!!!

The first two were much better. I liked them because they were similar to warioware, in that you play randomized mini-games, and they get faster and more challenging. This game is not like the first 2 In the slightest. There are a total of 4  minigames. The main point of this iteration in the series seems to be to repair arbitrary houses and structures that have zero impact on gameplay whatsoever. You repair them "just because" I gave it a few hours, and I find this game to be a boring ad machine.

Dumb ways to die 3 gets 3 stars. No, seriously, I loved the first 2, but this one is not good. Only 4 minigames, not really different each from another. Remember FASTER FASTER FASTER ? It disappeared (I miss it), and is now ADS ADS ADS. The goal here is just to use money and play as often as you can for ADS ADS ADS. The main thing here ? Minigames ? Nooooo, just getting (or buying) tokens and use them to repair houses (no impact on gameplay). Why would this game be nice ? The graphics are still good. Yes, that's all. Have a nice day. ADS ADS ADS

The character models are cute and all, but the games are getting a bit repetitive. WAY too many ads. Like, ridiculously too many. The app forces a couple right after you finish some of the minigames. You have enough to offer us - forcing even more ads on top of that is tiresome. Get rid of them.

Now it‚Äôs time for another dumbfounding adventure!¬†Help rebuild and keep the once great town of Dumbville safe, travel to the scorching deserts of Dumbgypt, hike to the frosty summit of Dumb Peak and journey to the curious planet of Dumbtune in Dumb Ways to Die 3: World Tour.¬†Game Features:¬†‚Ä¢ Get your tools ready to help make the town of Dumbville and the rest of the Dumb World safe once again.‚Ä¢ Collect and play as your favourite Beans!‚Ä¢ Send the Beans down the steep slopes of Dumb Peak - but watch out for those cheeky penguins.‚Ä¢ Launch the Beans through asteroid fields deep in space.‚Ä¢ Soar through the skies above Dumbville in a crazy plane flight!‚Ä¢ Dash through the mighty Pyramids of Dumb-Gypt.‚Ä¢ Collect unique outfits for all the Beans!‚Ä¢ Do your best to keep the Beans safe - but if they do get hurt, patch them up in the hospital!
descriptionHTML:
Dumb Ways to Die brought you the dumb little Beans that the world fell in love with. Now it’s time for another dumbfounding adventure!
 
Help rebuild and keep the once great town of Dumbville safe, travel to the scorching deserts of Dumbgypt, hike to the frosty summit of Dumb Peak and journey to the curious planet of Dumbtune in Dumb Ways to Die 3: World Tour.
 
Game Features:
 
• Get your tools ready to help make the town of Dumbville and the rest of the Dumb World safe once again.
• Collect and play as your favourite Beans!
• Send the Beans down the steep slopes of Dumb Peak - but watch out for those cheeky penguins.
• Launch the Beans through asteroid fields deep in space.
• Soar through the skies above Dumbville in a crazy plane flight!
• Dash through the mighty Pyramids of Dumb-Gypt.
• Collect unique outfits for all the Beans!
• Do your best to keep the Beans safe - but if they do get hurt, patch them up in the hospital!

comments: The graphics aren't the best and the set up isn't totally comprehensive. Some maps are so zoomed in that it's hard to recognize the general location unless you're already really familiar with geography. It could be more interesting, but the questions are good and it has helped me learn some.

I'm extremely impressed by your app. It is not only fun, but it is the best educational app that has taught me so much! The border outline is the only thing that needs better graphics...otherwise I couldn't be happier!!! (An offline mode would make this app perfect) . Thank you!üôãüíØüí°üëç‚ùóüå†üèÜüíù‚ò∫

Excellent game. Learnt lots. Ads frustrating but can be paid for. More frustrating is when you get to higher levels and constantly run out of lives. Find myself having to hang on 3-4 days between games waiting to accumulate lives to allow me to proceed further. That's why I have not given it a 5/5

Was a great game, I learned a ton of geography. But now the ads are seriously out of control. Top players are really the ones who watch the most ads. Also, it would be nice if the encyclopedia allowed you to compare countries for a given category instead of only being able to view a single country.

Excellent and really informative game. As someone who loves geography I learned a lot of new things. However I have just one problem to adress. Religion info on Bosnia and Herzegovina is incorrect and not updated, I've sent several reports but it is not fixed yet.
The graphics/fonts and everything are outdated, but there is SO much information you can be quizzed on. I'm learning everyday!

comments: This game is one of the best Sudoku puzzle games I've found. It has a wide range of puzzle options and has detailed explanations for hints to build up your knowledge of logic tricks. The UI is clean, the design is not to die for, but the gameplay is 5 stars in a heartbeat.

Excellent, lots of options. Uninstalled a competitor app (Sudoku "Fun" Free by Smoote Mobile, which I found was riddled with Malware). Your app is very comprehensive and of the highest quality. The ("try out in pencil") option to test, in turn, different numbers in cells when the answer is uncertain in one or more cells in the Harder puzzles is particularly useful. Thank you.

Love the app, but for the last month or more the ads mute audio when they pop up. I play with podcasts or audiobooks on, so I have to rewind every time an ad pops up (because media keeps playing but is muted). If this is not fixed I will have to change sudoku apps because it's starting to drive me crazy :(.

Additive!  Great game, easy to use. Never any issues with gameplay.  Lots of difficulty levels which I love, I go for an easy one when I'm short on time but like the challenge of the harder levels too.  Highly recommended  üåü

Great sudoku puzzles and good tutorials to teach tricks. Only thing I wish I could change would be to prepopulate each open cell with "pencil" markings for all the numbers, because I prefer to eliminate numbers and it's a pain to have to add them all first.

After maxing out one of the competing apps, I found Andoku. It took awhile to get used to the interface but now I think it is far superior. Additionally, the level based tutorials are very good, though a couple of items suffer from confusing descriptions. My game has improved with this app.  I would make a suggestion for enhancement of statistics.  That would be to include statistics for unassisted games. As far as I'm concerned, if you get a hint or even check your work, you haven't solved the puzzle.
description: Andoku 3 Free is a Sudoku number puzzle game for smartphones and tablets. The game contains Sudoku puzzles of various difficulty levels and detailed instructions. It is aimed at beginners and experts alike.Features ‚úî intuitive navigation ‚úî appealing design ‚úî auto-save running games ‚úî unlimited undo and redo ‚úî enter notes ‚úî numerous assistance functions ‚úî many game variations ‚úî nine difficulty levels ‚úî cloud synchronization ‚úî enter your own Sudoku puzzles ‚úî game statisticsGame variationsAndoku 3 Free offers numerous other game variants in addition to the standard version of Sudoku: ‚Ä¢ X Sudoku ‚Ä¢ Hyper Sudoku ‚Ä¢ Percent Sudoku ‚Ä¢ Color SudokuTutorialsAndoku 3 Free comes with tutorials that teach you many solving techniques. Based on specific game situations, the tutorials explain the solving techniques step by step.The solution techniques are ordered by difficulty, ranging from very simple (Introduction, Hidden Single, etc.) to very difficult (XY Chain, Sashimi Swordfish, etc.).Enter your own puzzlesWould you like to solve a Sudoku puzzle from your local newspaper on your smartphone? With Andoku 3 Free you can easily enter your own puzzles.Cloud synchronizationThe game allows you to save your progress in the cloud. This also allows running games to be synchronized between different devices.You can start a game on your smartphone and continue to play on your tablet later!
descriptionHTML:
Andoku 3 Free is a Sudoku number puzzle game for smartphones and tablets. The game contains Sudoku puzzles of various difficulty levels and detailed instructions. It is aimed at beginners and experts alike.

Features

✔ intuitive navigation
✔ appealing design
✔ auto-save running games
✔ unlimited undo and redo
✔ enter notes
✔ numerous assistance functions
✔ many game variations
✔ nine difficulty levels
✔ cloud synchronization
✔ enter your own Sudoku puzzles
✔ game statistics

Game variations

Andoku 3 Free offers numerous other game variants in addition to the standard version of Sudoku:
• X Sudoku
• Hyper Sudoku
• Percent Sudoku
• Color Sudoku

Tutorials

Andoku 3 Free comes with tutorials that teach you many solving techniques. Based on specific game situations, the tutorials explain the solving techniques step by step.

The solution techniques are ordered by difficulty, ranging from very simple (Introduction, Hidden Single, etc.) to very difficult (XY Chain, Sashimi Swordfish, etc.).

Enter your own puzzles

Would you like to solve a Sudoku puzzle from your local newspaper on your smartphone? With Andoku 3 Free you can easily enter your own puzzles.

Cloud synchronization

The game allows you to save your progress in the cloud. This also allows running games to be synchronized between different devices.

You can start a game on your smartphone and continue to play on your tablet later!

comments: The controls are in need of work, big time!! The current setup is too unresponsive, too frequently. This was the case even when I had the game on my Galaxy S7 (it's now on my Galaxy J3 Emerge). Switch to a more conventional d-pad & action button config, already!! Otherwise, the game is pretty sweet!! Looks innocent & simple, but it's actually quite challenging. Better controls would help a lot, though!!

You should expand the game by making the existing map bigger, and by adding more maps. Also it would be cool if you added a drop to clear your traps, as there's a drop for everything else. It's a really fun, and addicting game, kind of reminds me of COD Zombies. I think it lacks a little advancement. I hope this game doesn't get lost in the mix like every other game with potential. It gets a little repetitive so by adding some stuff I would give it 5 stars and pay for this game.

This is a great game! It is very fun! The only two things that I did not like were these, No.1  You can not drive the ghost busters car! No.2 The ghost busters song is not playing well you play the game! Other then that it is a great game! I would defiantly upload this game! It is very fun!!! Ghost buster out üòâüí©

This is better for parents who want their kids to experiance the franchise. The game is VERY repetitive. The charicters hold the wand horribly, no origional voice acting or sounds, and below average graphics. Hardcore Ghostbusters fans better pass on this one.
Couldn't even use original voices with audio from the movie? Also bad controls. I usually play mobile games with a bluetooth controller. Make this game better!

Gets old really fast! And you confuse yourself with the controls as game gets faster. Over all it's not a bad game at all! Just needs some additives to the game, and maybe a directional pad and just 1 shoot button

descriptionHTML:
Du hältst das Buch „Ozeane für clevere Kids“ von McDonald's in deinen Händen und hast schon viel über die Weltmeere und ihre faszinierenden Bewohner erfahren? Mit dieser App kannst du einige der im Buch gezeigten Meerestiere auf deinem Smartphone oder Tablet lebendig machen. Ein großer Spaß!
So erweckst du die Meeresbewohner zum Leben:
• Installiere diese Gratis-App („Ozeane“) auf deinem Smartphone oder Tablet.
• Scanne eine Seite mit rotem „AR+“-Zeichen. Die Animation startet automatisch!
• Mithilfe des Joysticks links unten kannst du viele der Tiere bewegen. Durch einen Klick auf den „Action“-Button rechts – oder wenn du die Meeresbewohner direkt antippst – machen sie die verrücktesten Dinge.
• Du willst ein Foto oder ein Video mit einem der 3D-Tiere? Klicke auf den „Kamera“-Button oder auf die Aufnahmetaste rechts oben!

Was ist Augmented Reality?
Augmented Reality (kurz: AR) verbindet die wirkliche Welt mit interaktiven Animationen, die du über ein Smartphone oder Tablet abrufen kannst. So kannst du zum Beispiel Bilder in einem Buch oder einer Zeitschrift in 3D anschauen, von allen Seiten betrachten oder dich spielerisch mit ihnen beschäftigen. Mit der App „Ozeane“ lernst du eine Reihe möglicher AR-Funktionen kennen. Lass dich überraschen!
developerAddress: Drygalski-Allee 51 | 81477 M√ºnchen
recentChanges: Faszination Tiefsee ‚Äì diese App erweckt Meerestiere zum Leben!
summary: This app brings to life on your display fascinating sea creatures!
title: Ozeane

comments: This game really addictive!! The only problem is they don't give you enough energy.üòíyou either have to buy energy or play a mini game to get more energy. The highest energy points that you can get is 100. Plus the 30 points if you watch a video. Other than that the game is AMAZING. The graphics are realistic. It has a lot of romance too. You should definitely download this game if you're not bothered about the energy points.

The game has me hooked. I'm big on reading so I fly through the 300 energies. I've spent $10 repeatedly, even $20 for energy and it feels like it was gone in the same amount of time as the 300 energies. If you allowed maybe 4 refills a day, it would be amazing, or some other way, maybe to just keep playing the minigame. There has to be something more other than 20 energies for a video once a day. But despite the lack of energy, this game has me so disgustingly hooked. I love it so much.

I think this game is really good. I just have one problem. Even though it says my energy is full, it feels like I have nothing. And also the mini game 100 energy seems to last longer than the initial 300 you receive. If you could fix this taht would be great. And if it's designed like this can you make energy spending more efficient?

I love the concept and the artwork. However, I'm quickly losing interest because of how slowly the story progresses. I wait 24 hours to get 300 energy, play the mini game, and watch the ads. This means I get 450 energy each day. Today for all of that, I got maybe 100 words, all about twisted dolls and dresses.. As for the main character there has been one hint of action from him but mostly stoney silence and short one liners and I've been playing for a week now. Please consider either changing the way energy works or advancing the plot at a quicker pace. Personally, if it does pick up in another week, I will probably stop playing this one.

I downloaded this due to the narrative and the reviews, but I am not a fan of this game. 300 energies (30 sentences) is very short I get through it in about 3 minutes and then you wait an entire 24hours for another. I love the storyline and the graphics so therefore this would be good for someone who is a slower reader. It's a shame but I will be uninstalling.

I m so excited to unveil what happens next, the energy drains hell too quick. I would love if the energy is increased to a lot more because that is effecting the gameplay and annoys me a lot personally. Leaving this issue, the game is fantastic. I have always loved choice games and this current gameplay is the best of all experiences . I wish to read more through your stories..... ‚ù§

I enjoyed this game for about the first ten levels. It's fun and almost educational about civil engineering practices. However, after the first ten levels it becomes an infuriating cacophony of balancing your bridge on rocks and mountains without anchor points and hanging your bridge from hot air balloons. Levels become so frustratingly impossible that you are forced to watch the videos for hints to get enough stars to progress.
Good game. Too bad steel wire is so expensive it's almost never useful.
I like how if you don't know how to build the bridge it gives you the option under hints if you want them to show you or if you want them to build it for you
Great game but controls are a little bit laggy. Would definitely recommend

description: **Google Play Most Innovative Game 2017 - Winner**Test your engineering and improvisation skills in a puzzle game where the stakes are as high as they get. It is you who will construct bridges for cars, trucks, busses... And sometimes even monster trucks. Gather your wits and get on with the construction!During the planning phase the game presents itself with a simple, 2D interface. It is there that you select the best materials for your bridge and connect the dots to make the most resilient structure you can. You can approach each level as a complex puzzle, trying to be as efficient as possible and get the best solution. But don't be afraid to experiment too. You can just go crazy and construct something that looks outrageous but still somehow works. There's fun in both of these approaches.When you're done, switch to the 3D mode and watch a car drive through your bridge. Will it hold? Or will you watch a spectacular crash? In addition to the normal mode the game features the easy mode for more relaxed gameplayed, focused on creativity and improvisation. You can also use in-game hint system if things get too hard. With 30 levels plus hidden and bonus bridges to construct you will not run out of things to do quickly.Game features:- Different materials to build from - Wood, Metal, Cables- 36 levels of increasingly difficult puzzles - Varied, detailed environments full of interactive elements- Multiple cars to test out your constructions- Realistic physics engine - Beautiful, stylised art style- Available in 13 languages
descriptionHTML:
**Google Play Most Innovative Game 2017 - Winner**

Test your engineering and improvisation skills in a puzzle game where the stakes are as high as they get. It is you who will construct bridges for cars, trucks, busses... And sometimes even monster trucks. Gather your wits and get on with the construction!

During the planning phase the game presents itself with a simple, 2D interface. It is there that you select the best materials for your bridge and connect the dots to make the most resilient structure you can. You can approach each level as a complex puzzle, trying to be as efficient as possible and get the best solution. But don't be afraid to experiment too. You can just go crazy and construct something that looks outrageous but still somehow works. There's fun in both of these approaches.

When you're done, switch to the 3D mode and watch a car drive through your bridge. Will it hold? Or will you watch a spectacular crash?

In addition to the normal mode the game features the easy mode for more relaxed gameplayed, focused on creativity and improvisation. You can also use in-game hint system if things get too hard. With 30 levels plus hidden and bonus bridges to construct you will not run out of things to do quickly.

Game features:
- Different materials to build from - Wood, Metal, Cables
- 36 levels of increasingly difficult puzzles
- Varied, detailed environments full of interactive elements
- Multiple cars to test out your constructions
- Realistic physics engine
- Beautiful, stylised art style
- Available in 13 languages

BoomBit Games
Office 102 - 2 London Bridge Walk
SE1 2SX
London
summary: Creativity! Logic! Construct bridges and see if they hold! Multiple levels!
title: Build a Bridge!

description: Amazing Strange Rope Police - Vice Spider Vegas is a city simulator in third person view (and FPS mode), where you drive a car or a motorbike. You play is a hero / legend and whole city fears you. The style of city is similar to Miami or Las Vegas but actualy it's New York. Become a chief on the streets of anti criminality in town. Exciting gameplay: you are waiting for the most hotspots of criminality in Vegas disctrict.Are your ready for great anti criminal adventure? Be ready to rob, kill, shoot and fight all the criminals! Stealing auto cars, racing through streets, and shooting down gangsters. Do you have enough guts to rise to the top of the criminal piles? Try out all the supercars and bikes. Make stunts on a bmx or find an ultimate F-90 tank or devastating battle helicopter.Most of the missions will be on streets, some will be in chinatown district and other gang lands etc. You were on a Incredible superhero secret mission, stealing the important information about the enemies, the army base camps, rebels and the underworld Mafia. You will fight various star mafia gangsters from America, Russia, China, Mexico, Japan etc. The game contains fully Open world Environment. Explore the big city, go off-roading in the mountains, steal and drive supercars, shoot guns and more in this free open world game! Explore the crime city, full of gangs and aggressive fractions. Become citizen hope as a standard of pure law and justice, or come to the city as a new doom knight.You can also buy a lot of things in a shop to help you complete missions and release the city from all mafia sinners. Good old story about a anti car thief in a dangerous town. Dominate the city with a devastating firepower of advanced military vehicles or upgrade your hero to knock down enemies in a few kicks! Let it be as a beautiful city, do not turn into crime city with blood and robbery.You have special real powers. You can shoot dangerous laser beam from your eyes. You can shoot a rope to a building and climb over the building to the top. Your legs also very powerful. Don't underestimate them. Don't mess with the police, they are the good ones.‚Ä¢ Visually stunning graphics, character and army vehicle models, Helicopter, Air fighter, etc.‚Ä¢ HD quality graphics‚Ä¢ Hours of gameplay‚Ä¢ ingame shop‚Ä¢ Guns to buy and shoot‚Ä¢ Off road terrains to explore‚Ä¢ Realistic car driftingBy installing this app you agree to the following privacy policy: http://www.oneaudience.com/privacy/?package_name=com.hgamesart.ropeboy

descriptionHTML:
The Mills board game by LITE Games: play the popular game Mill with online multiplayer options for free on Android devices.

Mills is a hugely popular game throughout the world, characterized by the fact it is so easy to learn – and it’s even older than chess. Nowadays the game that's also well known as Nine Men's Morris, The Mill Game, or Cowboy Checkers is a national pastime in many countries.

The aim of the game is to hit as many enemy stones as possible by forming so-called Mills (3 stones in a row). However, you can also block your opponent by cleverly moving your own stones around, rendering them unable to make a move.

If you think that you're a master of strategy: try to win against the strongest players of the LITE Games community. 😉

Features

◎ Completely free and in English 🇺🇸 🇬🇧

◎ Unlock amazing achievements 🏆

◎ Climb to the top of the online highscore leaderboard 🔝

◎ 👤 Single player and multiplayer 👥

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Planet Gold Rush!

Grab your gear, Young Buck, there's gold in them hills just waitin' for you! Strike it rich in this fun-filled gold mining game where you can explore and survey gold-rich lands, pull the gold from the earth, wash it, and make GOLD BARS! This is more than just mining, this is an adventure - and its CHOCK full of GOLD!

PLEASE NOTE! Planet Gold Rush is free to download and play. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app.

Features:
- Dig in! Set up! Upgrade! And be the Boss of your own Gold Mine!
- Strike out, Navigate and Explore Huge areas of Gold Rich new Lands!
- Survey, Find new Dig Sites, Lay your Claim and Mine your Gold!
- Play Immersive and Fun Mini-Games that dive directly into Gold Fever!

Under our Terms of Services and Privacy Policy, Planet Gold Rush is allowed for download and play only for persons 13 years or over of age without parental consent.

Note: A network connection is required to play
